Facebook.com/LiVolta
story_txt:
SummaryThe LiVolta Energy System serves everyone; from wealthy to poor.This project is not about one person, or fame and fortune; its about the greater good. We are a group of engineers, scientist, physicists, electric vehicle designers, and we also have a wide range of expertise in many other fields. All of us share a common concern for the wellbeing of others and what we can do to help those who need help. We are hoping that we can convince you, that together we can improve our world. All contributes are a part of this endeavor and what it can achieve.We are raising enough money to build a fully functioning system that will demonstrate what it’s capable of. This campaign should be important to everyone who is concerned about the future, and what kind of world we will be leaving for the generations who will follow.This is a huge endeavor that encompasses so many incredible possibilities that can change the lives of so many people around our planet. LiVolta has come a long way since 1979 but our values have never changed.To whom much is given much is expectedSupporters  What is LiVoltaWe are committed to making life better for everyone and doing it in an environmentally responsible wayThe LiVolta System is an inexpensive and efficient way to produce clean electricity, store it and make it portable. The LiVolta System is a “Micro Power Plant/Exchange Station” that utilizes a host of current technologies including autonomous vehicle control and robotics to turn the impractical into the practical. LiVolta powered vehicles are mobile power platforms that can be driven to a location and used as a source of electricity and will even power your home. A LiVolta station can also be configured with equipment to purify and desalinate water. LiVolta is the perfect system for supplying electricity to small and impoverished towns and villages throughout the world.There are many advantages that only LiVolta offers; drive for free, you never need to charge your car and you don't own the battery so you will never get stuck with old battery technology. LiVolta is not specific to any single brand or type of vehicle, it can be utilized by any vehicle manufacturer who chooses to build a vehicle that uses LiVolta’s proprietary hardware components, LiVolt's battery and software that are only compatible with LiVolta’s Micro Power Plant Exchange Stations.LiVolta is easily scalable so it can expand with growth anywhere in the world. LiVolta also works with or without a connection to a grid. The stations are built in a factory then shipped to locations where they are setup and running in less than thirty days. What sets LiVolta apart LiVolta stations only exchange LiVolta batteries. This makes the batteries standardized; one physical size fits all. LiVolta is like a gas barbecue; they come in hunderds different sizes, designs and configurations but they all use the same gas tank, and thats what will make the electric car work for everyone.  LiVolta delivers far more than battery exchange; it delivers empowerment
Low cost low carbon fast clean electricity anywhere in the world
Backup to Backup Dual Battery Technology 
Stores electricity
Grid Backup
Grid connection or stand alone
Portable electricity
Power your home
Battery exchange
Drive for free
You never need to charge your car
You don't own the battery
You never get stuck with old battery technology
 Developing countries can benefit, so all of us will benefitLack of electricity locks people in poverty, and they are more likely to remain poor if they stay unconnected – LiVolta's low cost low carbon electricity is the key. Energy access reduces conflicts. "We need to start talking about energy as a conflict resolution tool in developing countries,” Nkiruka Avila, MS, PhD.Additional multifunctional platforms built in for developing countries
Mini-distribution networks 
Water desalination & purification
Grinding and husking mills
Vegetable oil presses for agricultural processing
 30 second battery exchangeOpt-in to advertising and other programs and get free exchanges(ads run during exchanges on a screen in front of you)   
Backup to Backup Dual Battery Technology
 


 

 

Integrated food service

 
 
Open platform
 




 
Comercial application

 
Micro Power Stations can be custom configured for autonomous tractors and other equipment that exchange their own batteries and work all day and night without stopping
LiVolta can benefit agriculture

 
LiVolta can benefit warehouses like Amazon by exchanging batteries in AGV's

 
 
Other aplications

 
 
Single bay grid backup with water purification & desalination High volume grid backup multi bay station Electric bicycles will be a big part of transportation in the coming yearsYou can swap your battery and get something to eat and drinkand get some cash at the same time  Multi bay grid backup with 3 different battery sizes(A) robot exchange up to 7 passenger vehicles(B) robot exchange up to 2 passenger vehicles(C) manual exchange bicycles/motorcycles and other 2 wheel vehicles  Single bay no grid with water purification & desalination remote location​   What We Need & What You GetWe already have some committed support in the way of equipment and software development from several companies. We have also had some preliminary discussions with engineering department at Cal Poly San Luis Obispo in regards to having a role in building the system. Certainly these types of support are extremely helpful, however there are still many expenses that will still need to be paid for. We will still need to raise $15M for general expenses related to a project of this size, including but not limited to; Fabrication facilities, tooling, equipment, general operations etc.This is not a typical crowd funding campaign so we are unable to give typical perks such as a product. However we are making them something you will be proud to have and or experiences, and most of all the will make a statement that says; “I did something”.In the event we do not reach our intended goal during the campaign window there are several avenues that we will explore to move forward.  At this time it is far too difficult to completely know what path we may take, because it depends completely on how much is raised.The ImpactLiVolta is a huge move forward to a cleaner, safer and more sustainable environment, it will also serve a larger number of consumers. LiVolta will create new industries and in turn create millions of job opportunities that will boost economies worldwide. By contributing to this campaign, you will not only be participating in a worthwhile endeavor,  you will also be sending a message; that people can make something happen faster, better and for less money than governments.LiVolta is a move toward to a cleaner safer and more sustainable environment, it will also serve a larger number of consumers, and give them another choice. it will create new industries and intern create millions of job opportunities that will boost economies worldwide.Risks & ChallengesNew ideas are most often met with criticism by naysayers, and they will always try to discredit them because it is in their interest to do so.We have all heard the promises and have seen slick sales pitches for every kind of so-called “new energy technology”, that would  supposedly change the world. We have also seen the billions of dollars poured into them; only to find out they were nothing more than snake oil.The fact is you can’t change the laws of physics, put simply when it comes to energy you can’t get something from nothing. We are not trying to rewrite the laws of physics or make unsubstantiated claims; we are simply taking some proven technologies and incorporating them with new technologies to arrive at a practical and affordable system that has the potential to help humanity.Large undertakings are never easy; they come with many long days and sleepless nights. This project will have many of the same problems and challenges that any large project of this scope has; and new ones. You can never foresee or be completely prepared for all of them, but we believe there is no problem we can’t overcome.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can’t contribute we understand, however you can help by letting everyone you know about the campaign through social media and Indiegogo’s share tools.Also If you have any government connections anywhere in the world, connections at the UN or any environmental agency please let them know about LiVolta.It is greatly appreciated, and from all of us here at LiVolta, thank you.Email: info@LiVolta.comSubscribe for updates: livoltaenergy.launchrock.com/LiVolta.comTwitter.com/LiVoltaEnergyFacebook.com/LiVolta

story:
BACKGROUND / Brief description

Having Migrated from Africa to study in Germany, I successfully graduated with an MSc. In Environmental and process Engineering with major in renewable Energies.

After gathering experience working for Solar companies in Europe at different positions for more than 7years, I decided in 2012 to create my own company, with prime goal to make an impact and give back to the continent where I come from.

Energy supply is one of the biggest challenge that Africa faces. Solving Energy problems in Africa means Developing the continent

More than 50% of people in Sub-Saharan Africa have no access to energy supply for lighting. An average household spends > 30% of their income for energy, most often expensive and unhealthy fossil fuel.

Africa is blessed with natural resources “SUN” to provide power. Solar energy represents the best solution, but unfortunately, the accessibility to this clean power is prohibited by the lack of capital and most often reliable products.

Your support will help us uplift these barriers, improve standards of leaving, and contribute to the development of this beautiful and rich continent

Our innovative Solar lanterns, Solar Home systems present the perfect solution in Providing access to power at affordable rates, improving lives and local economies.

Our technology shall make use of digital payment technology via mobile networks (Mobile Money) and via GSM Network (Agent distributor network). System unlocks with weekly payment via an sms code, and locks when payment is not made. Thus customers pay for what they consume.

These weekly payments of top-ups allows the system to be paid off,  and in the end, the customer can choose to either unlock their system forever or upgrade to a larger model.

With the high penetration of mobile networks in Africa, the Pay As You Go solar can provide the much needed services for people in both urban and rural areas especially.

IMPACT OF YOUR SUPPORT / Communities

Facilitating Access to reliable power means changing the living standards of millions of people:

  • Children will be able to learn at night
  • Small business will operate longer in the nights thus increasing their revenues
  • Mobile phones will be charged to be connected to the world
  • People´s health will be improving by eliminating the use of unhealthy kerosene lamps and diesel generators
  • Extreme cost savings on energy, as there shall no longer be any need for candles, kerosene and diesel fuel. Our Solar products provides power for a minimum of 5years - No more fuel cost. The sun is always there...

Our goal, is to Facilitate access to clean, affordable and reliable power to millions in need in Sub-Sharan Africa via Solar

OUR Target

We target to raise €33.760 to create a product hub (warehouse) in Cameroon. From this hub we assure nearness to the customers. 

With your support, we are able to subsidize these products, which will be offered on the market via  digital payment systems. Customers will make a little upfront payment to purchase product, and via a series of small weekly payments between 15 - 20weeks, payoff the difference.   At full payment, customers choses to permanently unlock their product and own, or trade for a larger system. 

Product embodies technology which remotely enables /disables  usage at payment and non payment respectively. Payment and management is done via a webbased digital finance platform via: 

  1. Network of 600 Agents and distributors
  2. Mobile Network operators via Mobile money
  3. Third party collectors (Banks, Micro credits etc)

SUPPORTER´s BENEFITS

  • You pride to support to improve lives, Education, Business, Health, Environment and communities.
  • You pride to contribute to the sustainable development of Africa
  • With a one solar lantern valued at €50 you have tremendously improved the lives of whole family
  • You help combine modern digital technology in facilitating access to energy to the poor

As Reward for your support

You will receive as reward for your support, our Home Work solar light as souvenir of that child in Africa who can now do his homework at night and no longer suffocates under the fumes of a kerosene lamp.

For thoes supporters who cannot support in cash form, we will most appreciate you sharing and communicating our campaign as much as you can.

Also sensitizing and creating awareness on the needs some people of the World have,is already a meaningful contribution to development.

Please use the Indiegogo tool to power this campaign.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

The major challenges we see will be in the customer´s honesty, loyalty and payment moral, 

Given that products are paid off over a certain period of time, risk of effectively paying within this time by customers exist.

To mitigate for this, the the remote controlling of the system, which automatically activates and deactivates  the system, will push customers to make timely payments.

Customers will receive reminder sms to keep their payment obligations alive.

Our goal is to facilitate access to energy to thoes extremely in need, majority of which donot have a strong purchasing power.

Energy supply is indispensable is moving every society out of subsistence. Sensible resource management has a big part to play in the sustainable development of a people and communities, and even more so when these are considered vulnerable to adverse environmental changes.

Unlifting the barriers to facilitate Energy access to those in need, is our prime goal.

story:
As coal and other fossil fuels are used less and less for energy power generation, clean energy sources are more commonly being used, and for good purpose!  Solar, wind, and geothermal energy production has greatly advanced and evolved over the past 20 years, however, commercial hydro power generation is an area where there needs to be more innovation and exploration.

Currents Power's mission is to research and develop new large scale hydro power generation concepts for commercial energy production.

story:
About Earthly and Our Product

We started out as five MBA students assigned to a nine-month project, in search of a topic. The charge was vague and broad: pick a world problem and try to solve it with a sustainable business model. It was difficult finding something we were all passionate about, but after a meal and a few drinks we found our topic--food waste.

Today, we collect food waste from nearby businesses and feed it to a certain species of worms. Their manure is a really powerful, all-natural type of fertilizer called "worm castings." Because they work so well, they've even earned the nickname "black gold" among enthusiasts. Check out this lemon tree grown with our product, fruiting in a window...in New England...in FEBRUARY.

What’s great about our worm castings is that they’re made from food waste, so that lemon tree is literally cycling food waste back into the production of food. Nature is amazing, isn’t it? We think so too.

Although they can also be used to grow most food crops, worm castings have become particularly popular with cannabis growers, many of whom have strong incentive to maximize yields and improve product quality without the use of chemical fertilizers. Cannabis growers have spread a lot of awareness about worm castings and actually advanced many techniques in using them.

We at Earthly see a tremendous opportunity to use this example to demonstrate the potential to close an open loop in society at large. By harnessing natural processes to convert food waste into fertilizer, we not only save space in landfills, but we also offset carbon that would have been emitted producing the chemical fertilizer our customers would use instead of worm castings.

What We Need

At this stage in our company's growth, demand for our product from the cannabis industry is far greater than our current production capacity. We need funding to purchase more equipment and pay for labor to allow us to process a greater volume of food waste, and to help us supply more product to keep in step with growing demand. 

Here's a breakdown of how we'll spend our goal of $20,000:

$6,000 for worm habitats, the units in which our worms live and eat.

$1,000 to purchase worms to expand our working population.

$4,000 to build or purchase basic equipment, such as a screening machine to refine our final product, and other basic essentials like buckets, scales, and processing equipment.

$2,000 to pre-pay three months of rent for our expansion, which is necessary to support us while we wait for our new production to become market-ready.

$1,000 to purchase raw materials to use in crafting potting soil mixes.

$6,000 to cover the costs of labor until we can begin harvesting our product.

If we don't meet 100% of our goal, we'll spend the money starting at the top of this list and work our way down until we've exhausted the funds. If we exceed our fundraising goal, we'll use the extra funds to increase our production capacity even further (as much as our current space will allow). After that, we'll use any additional funds to support the labor needs of the business until our new production begins generating revenue.

The Impact

All of the funds you contribute will go directly to helping Earthly save food waste from ending up in a landfill, minimizing its carbon footprint and turning it into a high-quality end product. Once we refine our model further, we plan to replicate it in other cities throughout the United States to maximize our impact.

Can't Contribute? No Problem. Just Spread the Word!

Believe us, we know what it's like when money is tight. But you can still help! Simply share our campaign on social media and with friends, family, your crazy, passionate, environmentalist aunt, or whoever you think might be interested in knowing about us. Your voice is a powerful tool!

Thanks for taking the time to read about us, and happy growing!

story:
JMCC WING, LLC – one of five finalists in Water Abundance XPRIZE powered by Tata Group and Australian Aid

March 22, 2018 (South Point, Hawaii) -- Using two technology advancements, JMCC WING, LLC (Delaware) qualified for a $50,000 Milestone Award in the Water Abundance XPRIZE powered by Tata Group and Australian Aid.  The competition began with 98 teams worldwide and now five finalist teams have been selected to compete in the final round for the Grand Prize this July (2018) to efficiently harvest water from air using renewable energy.  The McCanney WING Generator (Patents pending – JMCC WINGTM) is the power source for their line of Atmospheric Water Generators.   This ushers in “The Jet Age of Wind Energy” according to owner and inventor Physicist James McCanney.

The Water Abundance XPRIZE requires the atmospheric water to cost less than two cents per liter using only renewable energy.  Teams cannot use grid power.   Standard alternative energy sources such as the three blade wind generators or solar are far too expensive to meet this low figure.  Enter McCanney’s invention the WING Generator, which can scale to very large sizes.  McCanney says “someday the WING will scale large enough to replace nuclear and coal fired electrical power plants with a single unit.”   Other WING applications include energy for pumping water, desalinization, farms, car charging stations, compressed air, mining (both physical and crypto mining) and more.  

The WING is Eco-Friendly.  Birds see it and fly around.  There will be only a few not thousands covering the landscape.  They are graceful and beautiful people love to watch them.  They are silent (no high vibration or noise) and are easily maintained since all heavy equipment is on ground level.

McCanney states that since the WING works efficiently from low to very high wind speeds, its patented design extracts far more energy than previous wind generators.  The cost per unit of energy goes down exponentially with increasing size.   His “Distributed Energy” philosophy, published in his 2009 book “McCanney WING Generator – World Energy Project”, shows how one day a distributed network of large WING Generators will power all our energy needs including electric transportation, while providing clean water for the world. 

The JMCC WING Team needs your support to bring this technology to fruition and not only win the Water Abundance XPRIZE, but also bring this into full manufacturing for the vast world market.   We can finally bring an end to lack of energy and water for the 3.5 billion people in the world who lack these basic necessities.   With reliable inexpensive energy and water, the people will produce food and have hygiene and a new way of life.   We are on the verge of changing the world with these emergent technologies.  

What can you do?

1) Chose a donation level and give. 

2) Promote to Investors - we need large investment to build a manufacturing plant for world scale production.  

3) Other Ways You Can Help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

  • Use the Indiegogo social media share tools!

Milestone Award Trophy - James McCanney - FINALIST 

Water Abundance XPRIZE powered by Tata Group and Australian Aid

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

JMCC WING Generator

"THE JET AGE OF WIND ENERGY"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------

What can you do?

1) Chose a donation level and give. 

2) Promote to Investors - we need large investment to build a manufacturing plant for world scale production.  

3) Other Ways You Can Help:

Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

Use the Indiegogo social media share tools!

Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
Use the Indiegogo social media share tools!

story:
2016 Product Launch & Mass Production

Hummingbrush | Infiniti Makeup Cleaner v1.0

The experience on the show helped us become more determined, more resourceful, & more open to other opportunities.  ''Strike the iron while its hot'' as they say, and I did.  I was able to crowd fund with the closest people around me an launched an amazing product for mass productions, The Hummingbrush, a handheld travel-size sonic makeup brush cleaning device.  

 

 

B E A U T Y     H Y G I E N E

AMBASSADOR

 

We Have Been There & Done That

Mass production plant and assembly stations of the original Infiniti Makeup Brush Cleaner by Hummingbrush

 

 

F i n a l    P r o d u c t

Find Out More At

www.hummingbrush.com

 

The Results...

A     M     A     Z     I     N     G

 

 

 

 

 

INTRODUCING THE N E W

H u m m i n g b r u s h  |  P R O

 

                       _____   |     It's FINALLY Here!!!   |   _____

>The World's 1st SONIC Makeup Brush Cleaning Machine.  

>The NEW Standard for cleaning your makeup brushes is with sonic vibrations.  

>Scientifically proven to be up to 25x MORE effective than manual cleaning.  

>The Hummingbrush PRO promotes Beauty Hygiene by Eliminating Oil, Dirt, & Debris.

>Time Saving, Eco-Friendly, & Cosmetic Enhancing System.

>Sanitizes, Disinfects, & KILLS Bacteria.

 

The Hummingbrush PRO is a fully automated sonic makeup brush cleaning system, capable of holding 12 full-size individual makeup brushes for a deep cleaning experience.  The one-button automated process ensures the highest level in beauty hygiene is achieved with every cycle.  The Hummingbrush PRO is beautifully designed and elegantly engineered utilizing patented sonic technology to provide a unique combination of form & function.  The Hummingbrush PRO has set and introduces a new industry standard for the cosmetic world, and this is just the beginning.

 

Brilliantly Designed & Elegantly Engineered

 

 

NO TIME to clean, NO PROBLEM

THOROUGHLY Cleans, Washes, Sanitizes, and DRIES

in about 60 mins

 

 

SUPER Deep-Cleaning Action

The Hummingbrush Pro has taken the automated cleaning process a step further.  Oscillating deep cleaning prongs rotate rhythmically about their axis, making sure that the inner bristles of cosmetic makeup brushes are deeply cleaned by physically separating them into sections.  This allows for cleansers to thoroughly penetrate into the bristles and completely treat the roots of every bristle.

 

 

E C O - F R I E N D L Y 

Dual Sonic Technology

SAVE on WATER Use

 

 

Proof you can CLEARLY see

 

 

IMPORTANT

 

https://www.usatoday.com/story/tech/reviewedcom...

HUMMINGBRUSH | PRO Cleaning Solution

KILLS BACTERIA

Sterilizing & Disinfecting your Makeup Brushes

During the Cleaning Cycle

 

DERMAL HYGIENE

INFECTIOUS DISEASE PREVENTION | ***MRSA (Skin Eating Bacteria)

CLICK the Link Below for more INFO

https://www.cdc.gov/mrsa/pdf/SHEA-mrsa_tagged.pdf

 

OUR STORY

EM-TECH Innovations Inc.

F   E   A   T   U   R   E   D

on

CNBC 'Make Me A Millionaire Inventor'

Twisty Tint

(Season 1, Episode 6 "Reinventing the Wheel")

Hey everyone!  My name is Enayat, and I am the inventor of the Hummingbrush.  At the young age of about 4 years old, I was more fascinated with how my toys worked & how they were made, than actually playing with them.  I remember being so mesmerized by holograms on cereal boxes, that I completely forgot about the toys inside.  My passion to build led me to be featured on CNBC's 'Make Me A Millionaire Inventor' (Season 1, Episode 6). The opportunity alone was enough to help me to further pursue product development and business management.

 

 

N          E          X          T

 

SONIC TECHNOLOGY

 

So now I am here trying to take this a step further to introduce the world's 1st fully automated sonic makeup brush cleaning machine.  My ultimate creation to date.The Hummingbrush PRO will usher in a NEW STANDARD of clean for the cosmetic industry.  It will set Sonic Technology at the forefront for cleaning makeup brushes and promote beauty hygiene worldwide.

 

S O N I C   D E V I C E S 

Y O U

Might Already Have

 

Sonic Facial Cleaners

 

Sonic Toothbrush

 

Sonic Hairdryer

 

 

H u m m i n g b r u s h | P  R  O

The Future of Cleaning

 

 

 

EASY CLEANING PROCESS

 

 

E X P E C T A T I O N S

WOW FACTOR

 

We all know that the cleaner something is, the better it will perform.  Witnessing the cleaning process before your very eyes will give that feeling of instant gratification knowing full well that your makeup brushes & your cosmetic palette are ready to take your look to a whole new level of WOW!

 

What You Get

The Breakdown in detail:

How much funding do we need, where will it go, and how long will it take?

-We will be asking for $300K for our campaign in order to successfully mass produce, distribute, & market this revolutionary product to the cosmetic world.  

-We have selected our manufacturing plant for mass production according to their product portfolio, performance history & overall reputation.  We will be negotiating costs of our Hummingbrush PRO for a volume discount and will be working along side our manufacturing plant to ensure a high-end consumer product.

 

TIMELINE

 

a.  Engineering the molds & tooling for mass production

(12-16 weeks pending QA/QC)

b.  QA/QC with the 1st run of samples

(1-2 weeks)

c.  Re-engineering, refining, and tweaking, the mold for a high-grade end-user

(1-2 weeks)

d.  QA/QC with 2nd run of samples

(1-2 weeks)

e.  Finalizing and perfecting the mold for MASS PRODUCTION

(1-2 weeks)

f.  QA/QC with 3rd run of samples

(1-2 weeks)

g.  Raw material & Hardware acquisition for mass production

(1-2 weeks)

h.  Start of mass production- MOQ Dependent

(3-4 weeks)

While all this is happening with the engineers for mold & tooling of the Hummingbrush PRO, we will be working along side with product designer simultaneous deciding on packaging.  They include:

a.  Size, dimensions, and weight of packaging best suitable for economical shipping & delivery. 

b.  Materials used for packaging.

c.  Designing the overall look of the packing for a brilliant finish (Logo, Product & User Manual)

Finalizing the design & packaging will be completed immediately after finalizing 3rd run of QA/QC samples.

The final phase of product development is packaging, shipping, and delivery to YOU! (8-10 weeks)

The ENTIRE Manufacturing Process to Produce a HIGH-END Quality Product will take about 10-12 months from the moment the campaign ends to your door.

 

Y   O   U   R

Support & Contribution

 

Your contribution will provide an amazing opportunity for our company to establish a platform to promote beauty hygiene via the innovative Hummingbrush PRO.    Everyone whom we have talked to in the cosmetic industry has been waiting for a machine like this; especially if it actually works. Not just some gimmicky product, but an actual proven scientific concept that addresses the needs of all women looking for facial hygiene without having to compromise on hygiene while striving to look their best!  The Hummingbrush PRO is here to imprint its reputation as the world's leading product for cosmetic makeup brushes.  

For more questions, please go to our website www.hummingbrush.com or email us at: 

sarah@hummingbrush.com

info@hummingbrush.com

story:
Our dream at Volta

Volta is an international video platform full of sustainable inspiration. There are so many cool projects, initiatives and companies emerging that are working towards a cleaner & greener future. It's time to bundle our voices to form one powerful whole. At Volta, all those ideas come together. We hope you will support our movement and join the community!

We launched Volta last October with the dream to 'broadcast ideas for a turning world'. We share inspiring videos, make our own talkshow, and tell stories of cool initiatives, start-ups and movements. We are based in the Netherlands, but we want to be able to broadcast ideas from around the globe. That's why we need you - the Global Green Community - to help us! 

What We Need & What You Get

To continue to grow Volta we're hoping to fund €35,000. This allows us to set up the Global Green Community and to actively involve them in Volta.  We want to offer a platform for a worldwide network of creative people, good ideas & positive solutions. This way, people around the world can inspire and learn from each other. Help us show what's happening on different parts of the world - share initiatives from China to Sweden, from South-Africa to the US and from Brazil to India. 

This amount also allows us to produce a minimum of one new video every week for the rest of 2017, starting in week 20 (May 15 - 21). This will be a mix of short videos, interviews, reports and talkshows. 

Because we want to make videos about topics that you actually care about, we've come up with a few cool rewards that involve you in Volta as much as you'd like. You can become a Volta Judge and help decide which topics we'll discuss, you can send in a Big Green Question for us to answer in a video, you can become a vlogger or invite us to report on your initiative!

Even if we don't reach our entire goal; every Euro you donate will contribute towards new video content. Be part of Volta and join the Global Green Community. Together we can accelerate the volta to a more sustainable future!

Can't Contribute? 

If you can't contribute to our campaign, that doesn't mean you can't help! You'd do us a great pleasure if you'd share our campaign with your friends. Let your voice be heard!

story:
At Accendo Solutions is committed to bringing solar electricity and satellite internet solutions to Southern and Central America.  We are three people with experience in renewable energy, satellite internet technologies, and communications who have the same goal: to bring internet and electricity to underserved populations, and the first step is to get this pilot project in the ground so we can replicate it throughout the region. 

Our initial scouting trip in June of 2016 introduced us to two villages where we could make an impact with our solution; Torotoro and Pampa Jasi. Two criteria became apparent, the village needed to request our solution (no pushing internet or electricity onto people who don't want/need it) and there is an exchange or payment for the internet to encourage ownership and security. 

The first of 3 projects will deliver internet to the residents, visitors, and local government of Torotoro, which is a 4 hour drive from Cochabamba, Bolivia. The second and third projects will provide a solution to generate solar electricity and satellite internet to nearby (6 hour drive by 4WD road) Pampa Jasi.

The people of Pampa Jasi are without electricity and currently walk 1-2 days to access electricity. Clean water, healthcare, and improved educational opportunities are just a few of the items these people are hoping to achieve with our pilot projects. 

Providing for Satellite Internet in a rural area can provide:

  • Educational materials for the neighborhood students
  • New farming and cooking techniques
  • Access to possible new income opportunities
  • Faster communication with local emergency services
  • Avenues to treat sicknesses, and a new healthcare resource

Clean, reliable, affordable electricity can provide:

  • Four Computers
  • One TV / DVD
  • Satellite Internet Equipment
  • 10 LED Lights

Thirty-thousand US dollars is our goal and will cover the equipment, installation, and management of a solar PV system for the school house in Pampa Jasi, and to bring satellite internet to both Pampa Jasi and Torotoro. Once these pilot systems are in the ground, we can better assess the return on investment through internet sales and identify the next areas in need.

We’re excited to share this project with you, and to help Torotoro and Pampa Jasi with this new solution.  So many of us take these resources for granted, and we now have an opportunity to make a significant impact.

story:
What makes the 10 Ton Project so Unique and innovative?

     IT IS A SCALABLE, LOCALIZED SOLUTION TO OUR GLOBAL PLASTIC CRISIS.  

     Our solution does not require any changes to the current recycling infrastructure, in fact, it will make the process more simple which will save a substantial amount of time and resources and make plastic collection much easier. 

     With our solution, plastic does not have to be separated by type. A major bottleneck in the recycling process is to separate plastics by their recycling groups, such as #1 PET bottles and #2 HDPE bottles.  All plastics have different melting temperatures for repurposing, so classification is very important.  


     The current methods for repurposing plastic into new forms like bricks and blocks require expensive equipment and use a lot of energy.  By utilizing earth bag design and building principles, we are able to use the plastic once it has been ground into pellets. This means all of the plastics can be mixed and cut up together, eliminating the most laborious part of collection. 

       The shredding equipment required for recycling plastic is in every country on earth.  Our chosen method of building also does not require any heavy equipment, can be built by unskilled labor, and scaled back versions can be built for much cheaper.  

EVERY DONOR WILL RECEIVE THE COMPREHENSIVE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO ON HOW TO BUILD A PLASTIC HOUSE.

       This project will immediately alleviate plastic pollution problems wherever it is implemented.  And let's be honest, our entire Earth is covered in plastic garbage.  So if you want to get involved, please reach out to us.  

"When the solution is simple, GOD is answering."

-Albert Einstein

 

ABOUT ME

My name is Brian Sherwin and I am from the USA.  I currently reside in Panama.  I have been very fortunate to travel to 26 countries;  I have volunteered in Peru, Vietnam, Thailand, Panama, and the United States with orphanages, hospitals, and animal protection groups.  I'm an ocean and nature lover.  I am an avid free diver and bodysurfer.  And in my travels I have noticed everywhere on earth has one thing in common: they're covered in plastic trash.  My diving excursions turned into plastic clean up sessions.  It made me happy to help, but depressed at the state of our planet.  Seeing the true state of our planet left me feeling lost, I wanted to do something, but I didn't know where to start.  And finally I just let it all go and asked myself, what can I do to make a difference in this world?  So I spent years learning, researching, and figuring out how i could help.  I wanted to make the biggest impact I could because the volume of plastic pollution is of epic proportions.  And that's why I'm launching THE TEN TON PROJECT,  to help clean up the mess we are making and bring purpose into my life.  I hope you join me on this journey!

MY EXPERIENCE

I have seven years of experience in construction/excavation and a University certification in Construction Project Management.  I have spent years studying alternative home building methods, permaculture, biophilic design, and other disciplines to refine my building technique.

I have a B.S. in Marketing from Radford University in Virginia.  I have five years experience working in real estate and finance in Virginia and Hawaii.  

MY GOAL FOR THE 10 TON PROJECT

If we can find the same level of success as 4Ocean, we can prevent 40 million pounds of plastic from entering our ecosystems and build 2000 homes!!!!  So why stop there, the sky is the limit!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our initial goal is to sell 4000 keychains.

This will prevent 20,000 pounds of plastic from entering our ecosystems.

This will fund our prototype plastic house, which will cost around $30,000 to build.

For every 4000 products sold, one house will be built with 10 tons of plastic each.

We have to pay 5% to Indiegogo.  We have to pay for and produce the recycled keychains and cover worldwide shipping.   

Here is a rough breakdown of the construction costs for the plastic house:

Labor: $8,000

Recycled Plastic Pellets: $2,800

Tools: $1,000

Rental Equipment: $1,000

Wood framing/Roof: $4,000

Permits/Legal: $2,500

Septic System: $3,000

Electrical/Plumbing: $2,500

Finishings: $2,000

PP Bags: $1,000

10% overage protection



Total: $30,580

If we don't reach our entire goal with this Indiegogo campaign, we will continue to sell our production other sites until we reach our minimum goal of 4000 recycled keychains sold

 

Risks & Challenges

Building a home with plastic pellets, to my knowledge, has never been done.  And that's where years of planning comes in.  My design choice will use proven methods of construction techniques to make this home last for potentially hundreds or thousands of years if it's taken care of properly. 

 The bags will be reinforced with rebar every 3 levels, and staggered every 2 feet.  We will also pour a concrete bond beam on top of the walls to increase durability in our earthquake prone area.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please help share the project.  Our earth desperately needs answers now to this global plastic crisis.
story_txt: What makes the 10 Ton Project so Unique and innovative?     IT IS A SCALABLE, LOCALIZED SOLUTION TO OUR GLOBAL PLASTIC CRISIS.       Our solution does not require any changes to the current recycling infrastructure, in fact, it will make the process more simple which will save a substantial amount of time and resources and make plastic collection much easier.      With our solution, plastic does not have to be separated by type. A major bottleneck in the recycling process is to separate plastics by their recycling groups, such as #1 PET bottles and #2 HDPE bottles.  All plastics have different melting temperatures for repurposing, so classification is very important.       The current methods for repurposing plastic into new forms like bricks and blocks require expensive equipment and use a lot of energy.  By utilizing earth bag design and building principles, we are able to use the plastic once it has been ground into pellets. This means all of the plastics can be mixed and cut up together, eliminating the most laborious part of collection.        The shredding equipment required for recycling plastic is in every country on earth.  Our chosen method of building also does not require any heavy equipment, can be built by unskilled labor, and scaled back versions can be built for much cheaper.  EVERY DONOR WILL RECEIVE THE COMPREHENSIVE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO ON HOW TO BUILD A PLASTIC HOUSE.       This project will immediately alleviate plastic pollution problems wherever it is implemented.  And let's be honest, our entire Earth is covered in plastic garbage.  So if you want to get involved, please reach out to us.  "When the solution is simple, GOD is answering."-Albert Einstein ABOUT MEMy name is Brian Sherwin and I am from the USA.  I currently reside in Panama.  I have been very fortunate to travel to 26 countries;  I have volunteered in Peru, Vietnam, Thailand, Panama, and the United States with orphanages, hospitals, and animal protection groups.  I'm an ocean and nature lover.  I am an avid free diver and bodysurfer.  And in my travels I have noticed everywhere on earth has one thing in common: they're covered in plastic trash.  My diving excursions turned into plastic clean up sessions.  It made me happy to help, but depressed at the state of our planet.  Seeing the true state of our planet left me feeling lost, I wanted to do something, but I didn't know where to start.  And finally I just let it all go and asked myself, what can I do to make a difference in this world?  So I spent years learning, researching, and figuring out how i could help.  I wanted to make the biggest impact I could because the volume of plastic pollution is of epic proportions.  And that's why I'm launching THE TEN TON PROJECT,  to help clean up the mess we are making and bring purpose into my life.  I hope you join me on this journey!MY EXPERIENCEI have seven years of experience in construction/excavation and a University certification in Construction Project Management.  I have spent years studying alternative home building methods, permaculture, biophilic design, and other disciplines to refine my building technique.I have a B.S. in Marketing from Radford University in Virginia.  I have five years experience working in real estate and finance in Virginia and Hawaii.  MY GOAL FOR THE 10 TON PROJECTIf we can find the same level of success as 4Ocean, we can prevent 40 million pounds of plastic from entering our ecosystems and build 2000 homes!!!!  So why stop there, the sky is the limit! What We Need & What You GetOur initial goal is to sell 4000 keychains.This will prevent 20,000 pounds of plastic from entering our ecosystems.This will fund our prototype plastic house, which will cost around $30,000 to build.For every 4000 products sold, one house will be built with 10 tons of plastic each.We have to pay 5% to Indiegogo.  We have to pay for and produce the recycled keychains and cover worldwide shipping.   Here is a rough breakdown of the construction costs for the plastic house:Labor: $8,000Recycled Plastic Pellets: $2,800Tools: $1,000Rental Equipment: $1,000Wood framing/Roof: $4,000Permits/Legal: $2,500Septic System: $3,000Electrical/Plumbing: $2,500Finishings: $2,000PP Bags: $1,00010% overage protectionTotal: $30,580If we don't reach our entire goal with this Indiegogo campaign, we will continue to sell our production other sites until we reach our minimum goal of 4000 recycled keychains sold Risks & ChallengesBuilding a home with plastic pellets, to my knowledge, has never been done.  And that's where years of planning comes in.  My design choice will use proven methods of construction techniques to make this home last for potentially hundreds or thousands of years if it's taken care of properly.  The bags will be reinforced with rebar every 3 levels, and staggered every 2 feet.  We will also pour a concrete bond beam on top of the walls to increase durability in our earthquake prone area.  Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute, please help share the project.  Our earth desperately needs answers now to this global plastic crisis.

story:
Invest in energy security for Alaska, the Arctic and beyond. 

Background: Imagine if 50% of your income went to pay for electricity or heat? My friend Diantha lives in a remote village in Alaska, where she is spending upwards of 50% on her monthly budget on energy bills to heat and light a home for her four children. Could you power a computer for your child’s homework? Could you afford to cook food that demanded refrigeration? These are the questions that 500 million people globally must ask, because they rely on expensive and insecure diesel fuels for their energy. Development experts expect that renewable-diesel microgrids are the solution to bring power to the last 1.1 billion people with no electricity, and drive down the excessive energy costs in remote places considered energy poor. 

Navigant Research analysis predicts that 80% of growth in the energy sector will take place in the developing world by 2035; this is because 87% of those living without electricity live in remote, sparsely populated areas which makes energy delivery via conventional methods challenging. The United Nations’ Sustainable Energy for All initiative directly links clean energy to improved socio-economic growth in rural, remote regions. The International Energy Agency finds that 67% of all new electrification will be through an off-grid solutions — like an islanded microgrid. Taking China for example, the national strategy to bring power to the last 1.19 million people who live without electricity relies on microgrid infrastructure because connectivity to the national/regional utility grids is cost prohibitive. 

Alaska knows a lot about islanded Microgrids. Powering more than 200 remote communities, and 400 commercial sites has taught lessons that make Alaska a world leader in this sector. The World Bank and other development agencies have sought Alaskan expertise to glean lessons learned in our decades of operating 13% of the world’s renewable-diesel grids. 

Company Purpose: 60Hertz Microgrids supports the expanding global, islanded microgrid market by filling three gaps:

1) Bring capital to the credit-unproven for clean energy microgrids through loans and Power Purchase Agreements. 60Hertz is raising a Project Finance Fund composed of tax equity, impact investment and low-cost public debt.  

2) Develop business in remote sites, aggregate village and commercial projects, in order to achieve economies of scale and reduce default risk.

3) Develop and subscribe remote users a culturally appropriate Computerized Maintenance Management Software to ensure proper Operations & Maintenance suitable to low-connectivity, remote operators.

4) 60 Hertz is an agent that brings together diverse stakeholders to deliver a holistic solution that solves the varied barriers, which no single market player can address on their own. 

Our Team: The 60Hertz staff includes a marine diesel engineer, two Alaska Native shareholders, a veteran with deep roots in rural Alaska; multiple team members have devoted their careers to renewable energy. 60Hertz also has more than a decade of experience developing mobile software applications for 1MM+ farmers in the developing world. We also have expertise with bringing companies to the point of acquision and sale.  

Approach: 60Hertz’s approach to business development leans on a currency of trust-building, relationships, kinship and geography. More than a sales technique, 60Hertz will be known for its authentic curiosity to understand native communities’ needs and desires for their energy supply.

story:
About Mama Bamboo:

We are not your average ‘nappy brand.’ For a start, we make our products with sustainable bamboo and over 80% biobased materials. We use compostable packaging and carbon offset through bamboo afforestation programmes. We are passionate about offering parents a greener and healthier choice for their babies. 

In addition we are committed to changing the way all absorbent hygiene materials are managed in the UK and campaign tirelessly for DEFRA to impose stricter controls to encourage the use of industrial composting and recycling across the nation. We run the #thenappyrevolution campaign. Our aim is to raise all councils recycling targets to 70% by 2025 and impose penalties on any absorbent hygiene waste from entering UK landfills. 

Did you know over 8 million plastic nappies will go into UK landfills today. Since nappy manufacture began over 150 BILLION nappies have been thrown into landfill in the UK! 

Our founders feel that they have a responsibility as two working mums to educate and support parents who want to live more sustainably but whom do not want to compromise on quality and performance. 

Why join us?

We’ve started this funding scheme to bring together those people who want to help us spread the word of sustainable nappy changing and promote the benefits of switching.

We are looking for £300,000 to invest in:-

- product development (we are testing more sustainable materials for the small non biobased elements of our products in order to create a 100% zero plastic nappy)

- running the #thenappyrevolution campaign - we need funding to continue campaigning for nationwide change. We are committed to raising the recycling targets for councils to include 100% of all absorbent hygiene waste by 2025. 

If you have a question about our funding program then we would love to hear from you! Send your question or comment to admin@mamabamboo.com and a member of our team will be in touch.

And please do share the good news - tell everyone you know that there is a high performing, convenient, green alternative to wrapping babies in single use plastic. And do join our campaign #the nappyrevolution 

 

More about Us: 

We live and breathe our company philosophy:

The Mama Bamboo Balance: Best for Baby. Best for Mama. Best for Mama Earth. 

Best for Baby

Our nappies are designed to offer babies the softest, most comfortable fit available. Babies will spend 24 hours a day wearing nappies for 2 years; that's over 17,000 hours! 

By using bamboo and biobased materials our nappies are breathable, temperature regulating and naturally antibacterial. All of which has been proven to reduce nappy rash. 

We have won the Mother & Baby 2020 Gold award for "Best Performance Nappy Range", beating Pampers Pure, Pampers Baby Dry and Pampers Premium, alongside several supermarket brands, based on comfort, fit and absorbency. 

Best for Mama

Our nappies are highly absorbent and our 3D form fitting prevents leaks. Unlike some eco-brands we have included elasticated legs and back panels, and moisture indicator strips on all sizes. All of which means you can sleep easy, knowing your baby is comfortable and dry. 

Best for Mama Earth

  1. Products:

We are conscious of our environmental footprint throughout our manufacturing and supply chain, and are the only nappy brand to openly declare carbon offsetting through a bamboo afforestation programme. 

We use sustainable materials in our products and packaging. Bamboo is known as the only crop on earth which can keep up with human demand without the use of fertilisers, pesticides or false irrigation. All our bamboo is harvested in accordance with FSC guidelines and carries the FSC certified mark. 

We are registered with the Vegan Society and we do NOT test on animals.

We have won the Made for Mums Gold award and Lux Life Parent and Baby Award for "Best Eco-Baby Product" for 2019. 

   2. Recycling

We are committed to changing the way all absorbent hygiene materials are managed in the UK

Both plastic and natural fibre nappies currently make up approximately 10% of black bin waste destined for landfill. Diverting this to compost or recycling would drastically reduce landfill waste. 

Councils in Wales have diverted 20 million nappies from landfill this year (2019) through the implementation of nappy recycling services.  

Why? Because Wales has a 70% target for recycling set by DEFRA and carrying fines and penalties for missed quotas. 

England, Scotland and Northern Ireland have much lower targets....maximum of 50%. 

Many councils point to their long running Real Nappy schemes as their answer to nappy waste. But the penetration of cloth nappies remains fairly static at c7% and shows limited sign of growing further. Therefore tackling the 93% market share of disposable nappies is critical. 

We believe that without stricter controls councils will continue to send waste that can be recycled to landfill because it is cheaper.  We must pressurise DEFRA to impose 70% recycling targets on all councils and encourage them to invest in viable industrial composting and recycling technologies.

These technologies have been proven by the likes of NappiCycle and are readily available but they require government and councils to support them. And we need you to support us in campaigning for this change. Please sign up at #thenappyrevolution and chip in to help make a difference.

story:
RFuel is a renewable energy mixed with fossil fuel that is cheap to produce, stronger than conventional fuel, and can be used in any engine.

 

Where do you want to be in 5 years?

 

RFuel is positioned to be at the top of the $310 billion/yr energy efficiency market.

 

Why did you choose this idea? Why do you care?

 

We chose this idea because it makes sense to use existing infrastructure to reduce both consumer costs and emissions.

 

Why is this a good idea, right now? What changed in the world? Why wasn't this done a few years ago?

 

Enhancing the efficiency of fossil fuels has always been a good idea but with peak oil already crossed and the impending energy crisis the timing is perfect.  This wasn't done a few years ago because the process had not yet been fully developed or conceived.

 

How far along are you? What's your biggest obstacle?

 

We have the formula and technology ready.  We need to get equipment to start large scale production.

 

 

Who competes with you? What do you understand that they don't?

Companies like Tesla indirectly competes against us.  They take the approach of replacing all existing infrastructure.  We see areas of opportunity by quickly reducing costs and emissions to existing infrastructure.

 

How will you make money?

 

RFuel offers its technology through three (4) business models:

1.Guaranteed Savings Model – RFuel installs and maintains hardware under a long term (Typically 3 years minimum) toll agreement.

2.Licensing Model – RFuel licenses to clients for an agreed upon cost and sells the additive for a set cost per gallon, plus a royalty fee on fuel processed.

3.Profit Sharing Model – RFuel enters into profit sharing model whereby RFuel Build Own Operate and Maintain (BOOM) under a long-term agreement.

4.Retail using existing infrastructure to sell to the public.

 

What are the biggest risks? If you fail, what would be the reason? What has to go right for you to succeed?

For RFuel to succeed we need to prove economy to scale, pass third party testing and get any approvals needed for sale.
