Effective, targetted use of nutrients and feeds
Easy to harvest -using the 'cut and come again' technique herbs keep on delivering!
Less mess than soil -a lot less, no more blackened fingernails!
PowerPots measure a neat 14cm  (/5.5") cubed and holds around 1.5 Litres (/2.5 Pints) of nutrient solution when full (a simple mix of tap water and liquid plant feed). This size hydroponic system is roughly equivalent to a plant pot ten times as big filled with soil, it's a modern day grow bag in a tiny pot that can sit on your windowsill and produce masses of produce and we are including 2 seed trays that will give you 12-18 months of growing your own delicious, tasty herbs and other plants in it."I've been trialling an early prototype PowerPot for about 12 months now to grow  my first ever plants: chillies and the results are amazing. I've had to cut the thing back several times as it was just getting too big and have had several bumper crops already with a third on the way. I've used them in my cooking and they taste great!" -ShaunW.(model shown is an early pre-FaceRing type with test multi-seed tray) ____________________________________________________________ Key PowerPot Features  Key Feature Details:
Strong 4mm thick acrylic case manufactured by an aquarium producer.
Long life whisper quiet brushless motor. Note: Air pump motors used in some 'bubble' systems tend to be brushed variety which have a much shorter lifespan.
An inbuilt multi-colour LED light allows the PowerPot to become a bit of a chameleon and blend in with its environment, or simply change the colour to suite your mood, roots also look great when highlighted and water flow can be mesmerising to watch. 
Customisable ‘Facerings’* in a choice of colours -good looks as standard.
Safety feature: low voltage powered ("USB"=5v) -we took a decision early on to keep dangerous mains voltages as far away from a watery product as possible…
Safety feature -work in progress: Magnetic coupler for USB power cable. No fear of pulling the unit off your windowsill as the magnetic power coupler will simply pop-off if the cable is tugged accidentally.
 *The PowerPot design has interchangeable snap-on coloured "Facerings" that allows you to customise the look and feel of your pot even when the internal light is off, these attach to the round crystal clear viewport that lets you view your roots:  We are going to be making the 3D printer .stl files for all the parts available so you will be able to print your own and have some 'specials' available like this Halloween Facering with more to come...;  
A PowerPot FAQ is available here: https://www.facebook.com/hydroplanter/posts/162...

Why the PowerPot?  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-63xKNnW0A

 Note: Due to its small size it is not suitable to use as an aquarium/aquaponic setup, although we have some small aquatic snails in an experimental unit that seem quite happy...  Some more ideas of how you could customise your growing experience with our free downloads;Level indicator: Add-on side panels: ____________________________________________________________ Prototypes and Design EvolutionThe design has come quite a way since the earliest concept sketch which only included a simple slit to indicate water level. There was no inbuilt lighting at this stage but early on we took the decision to make the unit USB powered; We bought a vacuum forming machine to experiment on the critical seed tray design in 2015. A big "breakthrough" was the purchase of a 3D printer in 2016 which turbo-charged the iterative design/development process by allowing us to print our own product parts and also 3D molds for the vacuum former. Our 3D printed parts include the pump/filter unit, feet, spout and currently the Facerings (we will move to injection moulding for this part for added quality and speed of delivery.)We will be providing these 3D printer component files if you want spares or design your own. We have made a pumpkin-face design for Halloween! (See photo section.)3D printed / manufactured parts, we have our own production line going now;  Click on the PowerPot image below to take a closer look in 3D:  VictoryGrow 'baselined' the PowerPot design in 2017 and expanded our relationship with key partners to bring this design to market, here is the very first Production Line run of seed trays:   We are now ready to share this idea with The World! Watch "The Drawn World": an animated video of one of the earlier prototype units in action: https://www.facebook.com/hydroplanter/videos/83... ____________________________________________________________ Perks

EarlyBird: big discount, June delivery, 12-18 months growing with two seed trays

PowerPotx1: discount, 12-18 months growing with two seed tray

PowerPotx2: two discounted units, 4 trays, twice the yield, twice the looks!
+there is also a "thanks for helping" hi-res picture file download for Donations which will also be included in all physical perks, a unique stunning piece of artwork by Tokyo-based designer Amershin Reinhart. The hi-res version is 20Mb and shows a robot tending their PowerPot in a futuristic urban landscape; What comes in the box? -Included as standard in all shipped units you get:

PowerPot base unit {acrylic case, pump, filter unit, LED, remote}

Two 'drop-in' seed trays {multi-plant, single-plant} = 12-18 months growing

Interchangeable Facering
Power supply: USB charger with correct mains pins for your country
2m/6ft USB power cable*
PH test strips
Cleaning kit
Instructions

3D printer design file access for all parts / upgrades / specials.

"UberJuice" liquid plant food sample, herb seeds**
*EarlyBird units will ship early with a USB to micro-USB connector**VictoryGrow may have to exclude these items from delivery to certain countries due to import/export  restrictions on this type of item. ____________________________________________________________ Meet The Team:  
Nick and Basil: VictoryGrow Founder and lover of fresh Basil on my pizzas... Finding solutions to problems is my middle name, with a BSc in IT and over 20 years experience helping to take over the World with mobile technologies it's time to focus on growing real living stuff with bling using the minimum of fuss, space and mess. This Campaign gets the ball rolling on the new unique PowerPot. Please come along on this journey and let's make a great solution together! 
Sami the Plant Doctor: With a 'PhD in Plants' Sami is well placed to act as Scientific Adviser and helps to keep me designing in the right direction also coming up with some great ideas along the way. "Lollipop seedsticks" -you need a big brain to come up with something like that! 
Mr. "DoItAll" aka Shaun: With an inherent capacity to get stuff organised and done beyond that of mere mortals Shaun is looking after the overall plan and its execution. He has an Electronics Degree, MA and even a keen stone sculptor and lover of concrete in his spare time as well as always having three phones on hand! 
Anne: the long suffering partner and star of the promotional video (check out those nails!) Anne has 'put up' with my increasingly serious hobby over the years and now helps with Finance and Marketing parts. As well as having a Maths Degree from Oxford she is a pivot-table wizard when required and has recently discovered that growing plants in soil gets her lovely fingernails messed up which she hates. PowerPots will solve that problem hands down...! -Together we are "The Four Amigos" !  
The Impact
It's time for change, ultimately we would like the PowerPot to be just the start of a home growing revolution getting us back to an appreciation of what exactly goes into the food we eat. Tasty home cooked meals full of goodness and nutrition from freshly cut herbs, chillies and tomatoes is a small step down that road...
VictoryGrow is committed to providing unique, sustainable and chic home growing solutions. Our motto is 'growing by design' and our products will always be designed to be the most chic, most energy, water and nutrient efficient way to grow stuff available.
 


 
Risks & Challenges
We have spent a lot of time over the last year ensuring a viable product offering, lowering manufacturing risks by designing and sampling smaller quantities of units and recently trial shipping by sea (testing import logistics) with our new global transport partner Shippo. 
In 2017 we grew relationships with the various logistics and manufacturing parties both here in the UK and overseas to bring this idea from concept/prototype to market. At each step we have overcome the obstacles but there are still a few key things on our To-do list:


Product Compliance: as of 05/05/2018 we have achieved European CE product compliance.

Product Retail Packaging and Final Fulfilment: We have a sourced a packaging company that is 'on standby' to provide these services. The retail packaging is shaping up and we think you will like our design idea!

Production Capacity will need to be scaled if we get a large IndieGoGo response; we plan to make an initial order for 1000 units and have a phased delivery of Perks/assembled units starting within weeks of receiving the first shipment into the UK. Additional future-delivery dated Perks may be made available. All Perks will be delivered strictly on a first-order first delivered basis.

 Use of FundsWe are  looking for an initial funding target of $19,500. The sum sought is relatively low so the chances of it being met are high in order to get this product out to as many people as possible and build a community of PowerPot users. When the funding goal is met all Perk-derived funding will go into the 1000 unit-order pot, VictoryGrow will make up any shortfall guaranteeing your Perk.  TimelineAt this point we expect EarlyBird/Early Delivery units to commence delivery mid-June 2018 with the main bulk of remaining deliveries arriving in UK for final assembly before being dispatched to you from August onwards. Shipping by sea to UK of a bulk order is a good way to keep overall prices down and we have already a done a trial of this earlier this year. Stretch GoalsAdditional items will be made available when we hit the following funding goals:
$25,000+: Upgrade August-delivery PowerPot Perks to Mag Connect for free.
$50,000+: We will include an extra FaceRing in each Perk.
$100,000+: We will start development of the "WinterLite GrowLED" and include a 50% discount in each Perk, should then be ready for Winter 2018/19.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Every little helps and even though you may not want to own a PowerPot we appreciate any support you can give us and have come up with a special Foundation Help Perk that gets you an electronic copy of a unique piece of artwork by Tokyo-based designer Amershin Reinhart.
Please also follow us on Facebook and Instagram:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hydroplanter/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/victorygrowuk/

Website: http://www.victorygrowuk.com/


 
____________________________________________________________
 
Frequently Asked Questions (/FAQ)
Please have a read of our Facebook FAQ where many questions about the product are already answered, we will continue to keep this up-to-date as new questions arise so if you don't see an answer here please get in touch and "Follow-Us", thanks;
 
FAQ click here:   https://www.facebook.com/hydroplanter/posts/162... 
 
IndieGoGo specific questions
Can I get multiple perks?Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.
Can I change my perk?Unfortunately, not during the campaign. But before we send you your gear, we'll send you an email with a link to a system that will help you manage your perk, input your shipping information, and purchase add-ons if you choose.
When you ship, will you please declare a lesser value on the customs form?No.
What's the warranty?We intend to supply PowerPots with a 1 year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.
I've changed my mind. Can I get a refund?Once the Campaign target has been met, Indiegogo's policy is No Refunds. Unfortunately, there's nothing we can do about this. When your contribution is deposited into our account, it comes from Indiegogo, not from you. So if we were to refund your contribution, it wouldn't make it back to you. Please see Indiegogo's rules here.
How much is packing and shipping?There is a standard flat fee for packing rolled up into the prices below and the shipping charge really depends on where you live. We will ship final assembled Product from our logistics warehouse in England via UK or International Standard Service rates with Royal Mail, total prices are as follows;

United Kingdom : $9
European Union : $16 (This includes all the usual plus Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russia, Switzerland, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Ukraine, Vatican City State)

Rest Of World : $22 (Inc. North and South America, Africa, Australia, New Zealand, Middle East, Far East and South Asia.​


 
____________________________________________________________
 
Press Kit
Press Release, Contacts and Gallery/Hi-Res print image files can be found here:
http://www.victorygrowuk.com/contact-and-presskit
 

 

Join us now on Facebook -let's grow the future together!
https://www.facebook.com/hydroplanter/

story:
H20 and GO- A Solar Powered, Portable, Running Water Source

Join this amazing initiative and take part in something bigger than yourself. We can turn dirty, unsanitary, disease-filled water into 99.9% pure clean drinking water. We can filter it into our mobile tank, easily move it anywhere, and with H2O and Go's fitted attachments, users can fill water bottles, wash hands, take a shower, or even water gardens.

The onboard battery which supplies power to the pump is recharged by a built-in solar panel using renewable energy, making it ideal for remote locations. No electricity is required to pump water from H2O and Go making it the only complete water filtering and delivery system of its kind. The large pneumatic tires make it easy to pull by hand or with an ATV over any terrain or debris. The light filtering, opaque, 25-gallon tank enables safe storage of standing water. We've even added charging ports for emergency charging of devices. The engineering is done, the patent is filed, and our first, crude prototype has been working for the last 4 years. We need your help to add the features that will help us save lives!

The affordable base unit is perfect for anywhere that tap water is available and can be used. It is ideal for watering plants, gardens, and vegetation, car dealerships/car washing, outdoor furniture/accessory cleaning, camping, hunting, fishing, sports teams, and venues.

The available attachments, perfect for anywhere that electricity and clean water are NOT available, are:

  1.  Water Filter-to filter dirty, creek, pond, or flood waters into pure clean drinking water.                                      
  2. Water Fountain/Bottle Filler-to enable drinking clean water where access to electricity or drinkable, clean water is not available.                                                                                                                                  

  3. Sink Attachment-for hands, dishes, and utensil washing.                                                                                                

  4. Shower Attachment- to enable personal hygiene and showering in any remote area where water and electricity are not available.                                                                                                                                       

  5. Sudsing Wand-for cleaning cars, outdoor furniture, and accessories in any location where water and/or electricity are not readily available.      

                          

  6. Charging ports-for emergency charging of devices, to enable communication, when electricity is not available.                                                                 

                                                  

Our Team

Our team came together because of a shared goal and a shared dedication to turn that goal into a reality. I'm an electrician by trade and my wife is a teaching assistant. We've been board members, business owners, and landlords. Our team is made up of mostly college and graduate students; our children and past employees who all share a social conscience and the brightest minds. We’ve committed everything we have to this campaign - time, resources, and above all, ceaseless passion.

I made the first prototype myself, with a few purchased items and scraps from the garage. It served it's purpose (and still does) and made watering the plants at our business quicker, easier, and more efficient. When the idea came to me, that if I could deliver running water on my 5 acres, then I could deliver it to areas that have no access to running water or areas struck by natural disaster. My wife and I hired an engineering firm to basically take the ideas from my brain and design H2O and Go. They did an amazing job and now that our patent is filed, we're ready to water the world!

                                   

What We Need!

We Need You and We Need Your Help!

In order to reach our goal, which will fund the features necessary to bring our prototype to the next level, we need to raise $33,000.00. The engineer who designed the H2O and Go is waiting in the wings for the okay from us to start production!

In addition to knowing what a difference you are making and that you are helping to potentially save lives, we've come up with perks to thank you for your help and support.

Knowing that you've helped to water the world may be rewarding enough for you, but to thank you for your help and support we have H20 and Go stickers, wristbands, water bottles, and T-shirts, so you can proudly display your involvement in our worthy cause. 

Nothing Will Stop Us!

Our passion, dedication, and devotion to providing access to clean water won't stop if we don't reach our goal.  We will continue our fundraising efforts until we can deliver H2O and Go and water the world! If we exceed our goal, we can begin manufacturing even sooner and start watering the world!

The Impact

You can make a difference! By joining our campaign, you can help us bring our product anywhere, to anyone who needs access to clean water. The implications are huge! You can help stop the spread of disease and help save lives! Your contribution will help make our dream a reality and help countless people.

                                                     

 

Our Master Plan and Commitment

Our goal is to be able to donate H2O and Go to disaster relief efforts and communities in need of clean water. Our master plan is to sell H2O and Go to individuals, business, municipalities, sports teams, and venues so we can afford to meet our goal.  Our commitment and long-term goal is to have H2O and Go available worldwide to provide clean water, improve hygiene, and stop the spread of disease.

Ways To Help

If you aren't able to contribute to our campaign, but believe in H2O and Go and want to help us water the world, then help us spread the word!  With one click, you can share our campaign using Indiegogo's sharing tools. Thank you for your support! Together we can water the world!

story:
Many low cost 3D printers on the market make big promises, but failed to deliver the high-quality printings. That is why we created the Dazz 3D LCD 3D printer, a professional grade printer with 2K LCD panel & dual-liner slides which enable more detailed, dimensionally accurate and structurally robust models, yet is affordable to everyone.

We created Dazz 3D with consumers in mind; it includes special features such as an air-purification system, automatic resin refill, deluxe 7'' Touchscreen control, and wireless connection that make 3D printing easier and healthier!

Dazz 3D is equipped with a 2K HD LCD screen coupled with a Purple 405nm LED lamp to project slices of a 3D model onto the floor of resin container. This method allows Dazz 3D to make more detailed, dimensionally accurate and structurally robust models. 

 

  • 10μm Z & 47μm XY resolution

The Layer resolution capability is up to 25 microns, XY Resolution is 47μm,  and Z resolution is 10μm.  

 

  • Fast printer speed

High precision, yet not comprising on printing speed. The light rate 3.8 times faster than normal light-cured resin 3D printer. The printing speed is up to 36mm/hr.

 

  • Dual Z-Axis Slides

The unique dual-liner slides are designed to eliminate wobbling, and create highly precise 3D models with an ultra-smooth surface. 

 

  • Safe Printing

The Air-purification system includes a low-speed fan and an activated carbon filter to remove ultra-fine particles and unpleasant fumes for a healthier printing environment.   

 

  • Auto Resin System

You simply need to put 1 bottle of resin upside down into Dazz 3D and that’s all! The resin refills automatically as needed when printing large models. 

 

  • Intuitive Control

With the deluxe 7'' touchscreen monitor on the body, users change print settings & track printing status anytime with just a simple touch control.  

 

  •  Auto Resin Wiper

The pro version includes an effective resin wiper to remove particulates and improve print consistency and quality by mixing the solid powder evenly when ceramic resin, powder, or other creative materials are added. While, when printing with Dazz 3D resins, there is no need to open the auto resin wiper due to the extension of printing time and quality it may caused. 

 

Getting started with Dazz 3D is super easy. It supports WiFi, cable, or USB driver connection. We offer free slicer software downloading on our website. Simple import the printing files and connected to Dazz 3D, you are all set.

 

Efficient Tank Cleansing 

There are two buckles at both sides, and you simply open the buckles and take the tank out  for cleansing and saving the remaining resin! For tank cleansing, 75% alcohol is preferred! 

 

Dazz 3D VS. Others

 

Affordable Resins

Dazz 3D LCD printer comes with high quality liquid resins that are very affordable. We created 6 types of high-precision resins for Dazz 3D users, with prices starting from from $19 for per 500g. 

 

  •  Dazz 3D-LC09 | Unbeatable Price：Create models with outstanding performance and excellent details without sacrificing the strength.   

 

  •  Dazz 3D-W1 | Nasty Free：Save the cost for alcohol purchasing, and get rid of nasty feelings since it is water cleanable and safer for kids to use.  

 

  •  Dazz 3D-F20 | 3D Sculpting:  Prints smoothly and precisely,  best for use in portrait and prototype applications.

 

  •  Dazz 3D-WG5 | Rigid: Features high resistance to deformation, high rigidity and polished finish. Performs well in printing prototypes, portraits, and dentistry models.

 

  •  Dazz 3D-HT3 | High Temperatrue: Withstands heat deflection temperature (HDT) of 180 °C and is widely used in hot and cold molding for environmental testing, production processes and dental practices.

 

  •  Dazz 3D-EC08 | Jewelry Design:  Known as castable wax resin, this resin offers smooth stereolithography surfaces and is recommended to use in jewelry making for custom try-ons and direct investment.

 

 

Dazz 3D also supports the 3rd party resins.

 

 Development In Progress 

We're an experienced team specialized in the 3D printing business for over 6 years. We have been focused on developing & manufacturing high-end professional 3D printers. 

 

 

 

Dazz 3D on Exhibition

We are keen to show our products and communicate with our customers worldwide.

  Auto Resin WiperThe pro version includes an effective resin wiper to remove particulates and improve print consistency and quality by mixing the solid powder evenly when ceramic resin, powder, or other creative materials are added. While, when printing with Dazz 3D resins, there is no need to open the auto resin wiper due to the extension of printing time and quality it may caused.  Auto Resin Wiper
 
 Getting started with Dazz 3D is super easy. It supports WiFi, cable, or USB driver connection. We offer free slicer software downloading on our website. Simple import the printing files and connected to Dazz 3D, you are all set. Easy to Use
 Efficient Tank Cleansing There are two buckles at both sides, and you simply open the buckles and take the tank out  for cleansing and saving the remaining resin! For tank cleansing, 75% alcohol is preferred!  Efficient Tank Cleansing
 Dazz 3D VS. Others Comparison Chart
 Affordable ResinsDazz 3D LCD printer comes with high quality liquid resins that are very affordable. We created 6 types of high-precision resins for Dazz 3D users, with prices starting from from $19 for per 500g.  6 Types of Resins
  Dazz 3D-LC09 | Unbeatable Price：Create models with outstanding performance and excellent details without sacrificing the strength.    Dazz 3D - LC09 | Standard | Green
  Dazz 3D-W1 | Nasty Free：Save the cost for alcohol purchasing, and get rid of nasty feelings since it is water cleanable and safer for kids to use.   Dazz 3D-W1 | Water Cleanable | Transparent Yellow
  Dazz 3D-F20 | 3D Sculpting:  Prints smoothly and precisely,  best for use in portrait and prototype applications. Dazz 3D-F20 | Smoothness | Khaki
  Dazz 3D-WG5 | Rigid: Features high resistance to deformation, high rigidity and polished finish. Performs well in printing prototypes, portraits, and dentistry models. Dazz 3D-WG5 | Rigid | Gray
  Dazz 3D-HT3 | High Temperatrue: Withstands heat deflection temperature (HDT) of 180 °C and is widely used in hot and cold molding for environmental testing, production processes and dental practices. Dazz 3D-HT3 | High Temp | Saffron Yellow
  Dazz 3D-EC08 | Jewelry Design:  Known as castable wax resin, this resin offers smooth stereolithography surfaces and is recommended to use in jewelry making for custom try-ons and direct investment. Dazz 3D-EC08 | Castable•HighWax | Dark Green Dazz 3D also supports the 3rd party resins.  
  
 
 
  
 
  
 
 
  Development In Progress  

 
 We're an experienced team specialized in the 3D printing business for over 6 years. We have been focused on developing & manufacturing high-end professional 3D printers.    Dazz 3D on ExhibitionWe are keen to show our products and communicate with our customers worldwide.

story:
Creating Real Change

Now more than ever we are seeing the results of the food we put in our bodies. It seems preventable disease is more prevalent today than ever. Yet food can be found on every street corner. What gives? This food we have access to and can afford is killing us. The real food (that we need) is too expensive for average folks to afford, so we end up paying for it in the long run. We're tired of it!!

  • My name is Travis Flatt and I am the founder of Upward Harvest. With just over 20 years of experience, my agricultural background didn't begin until the age of 14. I didn't grow up on a farm nor was I raised in blue jeans and boots, but I have always enjoyed hard work and innovation. Being raised in a low income home, innovation for us was a part of every day life.  If we couldn't afford it, we did our best to create our own. And living without on many occasions, I fully understand how a shortage of healthy food options has become too common in our society.  
  • Our goal in this campaign is to scale our patented growing technologies into an impactful urban farming concept that can be replicated across communities all over the world. We believe healthy, affordable food can change lives. In order to feed people no one else is feeding, we have to grow in ways no one else is growing.
  • Your contribution will multiply the impact we are already making here in central Oklahoma. With your help we can begin to create partnerships with other entrepreneurs to launch urban farms in your very own community.

What We Need and What You Get

  • Our goal is to raise $250,000. With this money we will increase our chicken flock from 700 to 2000. Our hens will also be moved out onto pasture land where they will enjoy a more natural growing environment with the benefit of accessing fresh pasture every day of their lives. In addition to scaling our egg business, we will also be refining our patented growing structures and tray technologies to account for large scale production and rapid deployment of our urban farming concept. A successful campaign will fund labor, materials, and research and development for the next year as we continue to achieve boundaries others have said "are simply not reachable". 
  • We are really just looking for a lot of small donations, but if you are determined to contribute on a larger scale, that's awesome too! Here are a few (small) Perks for those who'd like to make a bigger impact: Stickers, Hats, T-Shirts, and other cool things to help spread the word about our mission and your contribution. 
  • So what happens if we don't reach our goal? Well, the same thing that happens if we do reach our goal. That's right. We're gonna keep working with everything we have to bring healthy food to you! It will just help a whole heck-of-a-lot if you guys jump on board with us! 

Our Impact

  • We are on the leading edge of agricultural innovation - growing food like no one else while using less of everything else. In addition to using far less natural resources, we are providing the healthiest and freshest possible goods at an affordable cost without the things contributing to the decline in health of our society (chemicals, pesticides, additives, preservatives).
  • To this point, we are feeding only a small percentage of the population of central Oklahoma. Our regular customers swear by the quality and taste of our goods, and with your help, we can begin to scale our production in order to reach more and more families, not only close to our home, but one day close to yours as well!

Risks and Challenges 

  • This is the section where they want us to talk about the risks of this endeavor. While no one is fully immune from the effect of natural disasters, we chose a great place to start. In Oklahoma, we regularly face extreme heat, blistering cold, ice and snow storms, tornados, droughts, large hail, flooding and even earthquakes, but none of those has stopped us yet. Facing the challenges of our state's climate has prepared us to grow almost anywhere.
  • Besides the above, we also face real pressure from big agribusiness and by extension, the legislation they influence in order to dictate and preserve the methods agriculture has operated under for the last 70 plus years. Ten huge companies control the majority of how our food is produced globally - that's a challenge, but it also highlights the need for change.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • In today's world, a share on social media can be just as impactful as a dollar donated. We all know how things can grow exponentially due to the power of sharing online. 
  • While a monetary contribution would help us reach our goals, we would absolutely love a share on your social media platform of choice. Please share this with everyone you know who is concerned about how our food is grown. Then ask them to share too! We need your help to change how the world grows, purchases, and consumes food.

story:
Do you know that gold coins and jewellery have mark-ups from 20-100% and sometimes, its not even solid gold?

It's a no-brainer that gold is one of the most versatile and sought after materials on the planet. Throughout history, societies have been fascinated with its magical properties, and today when it comes to wealth preservation, it still remains the “go-to” resource.

Today you can buy refined .999 Gold and invest in our environment at the same time!

Spot of Gold is made from pure recovered gold and its value changes just like the market prices.  We have not spent heavily on making these golden discs so its value remains true to the actual price of gold. A timeless and long term investment, a Spot of Gold can be stashed, worn or sold easily to any buyer for its pure 24 karat gold value should you need the cash.

Did you know that most electronic scrap contains some amount of Gold?

Gold is one of the best conductors of electricity and because it is the most malleable metal, it can be made into micro-thin coatings and is highly resistant to tarnish. These characteristics made it highly suitable for connectors, circuit boards, and components like pins found in computers, phones, and other electronic gadgets. In fact, 40% of all new gold production is used for electronics applications. That is $485 Million per year!

Paradoxically, discarded electronics are driving the fastest growing problem in landfills. Who could imagine? Only 20% of the e-waste generated worldwide is being properly recycled. We are throwing the precious metals used to create phones and computers into the garbage. In the very real sense we are throwing gold away.

We found the Sweet Spot - Get Bullion for Boards

At the end of 2018, we began collecting, separating and processing circuit boards and other e-waste for refining. Our mission is to keep phones, computers and other electronic devices out of our landfills. To be more environmentally friendly, we recycle these items called eWaste, to recover gold and other precious metals. We created the 'Spot of Gold' or 'SPOG' as an alternate form of payment for those that want to help us dig in further.

 

WHAT IS A “SPOT OF GOLD” ?

 

A 'Spot of Gold' (SPOG), delivered in a standardized fractional gold portion, weighs one-tenth of an ounce. It is beautifully rendered by the award-winning jewellery designer, Justin Bortz of Midnight Swan Designs. 'Spogs' are real gold formed into small affordable discs. These golden discs are crafted from eco-gold that have been safely recovered from the refining of eWaste. If you’re looking for ways to diversify your investment portfolio, our 'Spot of Gold' is a surefire way of doing just that; and your purchase helps us buy more eWaste.

The Spot of Gold is also a good alternative for those looking to collect pure gold in a smaller affordable way.  We drilled a small hole so you can wear your asset and keep it close at hand.

 

OUR NEEDS

As with all new ideas, we’ve come to realize how big and terrific of an idea this really is and we’ve concluded that we’ll need your support to move this to a nationwide initiative:

  • We need funds to pay the landfill owners and get the eWaste back to our warehouse
  • Help us with shipping costs from all states, near and far, from small collectors
  • Source more equipment for testing and assessing gold content
  • We will hire more people to inspect and sort the eWaste into 3 refining categories: plated (pins), plastic (boards/fingers) and ceramic (CPU chips)
  • Buy a mold for mass production of the Spot of Gold and we can make them by hand too
  • Printing a certificate acknowledging a purchase and in which Series of production
  • Each series will consist of 1500 SPOGs starting with our Series A and B
  • As a Series sells out then we are happy to add the next Series

 

Having done our homework well and thoroughly eliminating all the non-essentials we’ve come to the conclusion that the sum of $25,000 (that's a 150 SPOGs) will be needed to lift this idea to the next stage. So, we’re offering you the opportunity to join and rock the boat with us as together we make this a reality.  We think you should be rewarded for your contributions and offer you Gold for garbage!

 

THE IMPACT

Average home in 2015, in America generated 262.4 million tons of waste, which is about 4.5% increase from 2010 and a whopping 60% from 1985. That amounts to at least five (5) pounds per person a day! This, of course, isn’t without a cost. As a matter of fact, the cost is twofold: Environmental and Financial.

Tackling the environmental effects first, consider landfills are the third-largest source of methane emissions in the country; when organic waste sits in a landfill, it decomposes and emits methane. Granted, burning plastic may create some energy, but it also produces carbon emissions. What is more, studies have found that incineration facilities release those harmful chemicals in plastics, such as mercury and lead, into the air.

Alternately, it’s becoming expensive to ship waste hundreds of miles to landfills. Some dumps are even raising costs to deal with all this extra waste; according to one estimate, along the West Coast, landfill fees increased by $8 a ton from 2017 to 2018. Buying a ‘Spot of Gold’ helps us clean up a small part of our planet and the landfills continually.

Economically speaking, gold is a limited resource and recovering precious metal from phones is far more efficient and profitable than mining it. Safe refining processes can recover between .6 and 1.8 grams of pure gold from just ten pounds of smart phones.

We are all concerned and want to help our environment reach a better state. To this end, once again we’re letting you know it is difficult to do it all alone, so we ask you to kindly support us and help make this project a reality.

And as a reward for your kind support, we’ve carefully designed a few perk levels and some appreciation rewards to show our gratitude. Please choose any one, as you can make your pledge to help others with shipping costs or support the production of your very own 'Spog'. You can personalize your Spot of Gold and wear it on a chain to help further our cause.

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

We will happily accept contributions that will be directed to helping our Scrapping Warriors by helping pay their shipping costs for loads of eWaste under 150lbs.  It's the smaller loads that are at the most risk of being tossed because it's hard to justify the shipping costs for some items.

Sometimes, some things are beyond our control. Don’t worry we understand. So if money is totally out of the picture, no worries as you can still pledge your support and be part of our community by:

  • Giving us constructive suggestions
  • Sharing this on your social media page (awareness of our project is as important as every penny spent)
  • Referring like-minded people to this campaign page for their consideration
  • Letting us know where eWaste might be hiding

 

You can virtually visit our warehouse with this link https://aurextrading.com/gallery.html -  we have far more pictures than we could post here on Indiegogo's platform.

We’re more than confident that with your help, we’re going to make this project an ongoing reality and it will see the shiny light of the day.  Thank you for your time.

 

PLEASE DON’T FORGET TO SHARE OUR LINK.

https://igg.me/at/spot-of-gold

story:
Seawater Solutions

 

We are a team from the University of Strathclyde, in Scotland, who have developed a number of ways to grow salt-tolerant crops (such as salicornia and aster) on degraded coastal land for food and bio-energy production. We are a diverse group of researchers form all corners of the world, who have personally seen the destructive impacts of soil degradation that has taken away the livelihood of farmers around the world. 

It is our goal to provide farmers around the world with a tool to combat climate change factors and be able to continue using their land productively. Fortunately, using saltwater and salt-tolerant plants for agriculture also has the effect of rehabilitating degraded land, with the possibility of bringing degraded lands back to life. It is our mission to slow the dangerous rate with which deserts are spreading across vulnerable regions. 

With this campaign, we hope to develop another pilot trial, this time in Sri Lanka, where hundreds of thousands of hectares of arable land have been reduced to nothing because of rising sea-levels and the lasting impacts of the destructive tsunami which affected many countries in South Asia. There, we will work with local farmers to teach them about the possibility of using seawater to grow valuable crops on their land, and to guide them step-by-step to get their new products to market. Every hectare cultivated means farmers back to work, and the protection of valuable top-soils which would be lost to erosion. 

The funding will go directly towards further research into region-specific salt-tolerant crops, and towards our South Asian projects where we will provide farmers with seeds for their farms. Our team has spent the last 14 months developing pilot projects in Scotland, and has engaged in important research into the potential of seawater farming. We are confidently pursuing these technologies and agricultural practices which we know will have the greatest impact for the most affected regions of the world.

story:
Summary

We've always kept an eye toward changing things and making them better. Not being able to fit so many differently-sized dishes into a standard dishwasher rack, and having to wash many of them by hand (hence significantly increasing water wastage), has made us understand that a better solution was required.

How significant could it be to our environment?

By using the FlexRak, an average family washing large dishes like salad and soup bowls or large serving bowls 3 times a week could conserve about 50 gallons per week by using the FlexRak. This is a saving of about 2,500 gallons per year!

Now thing about how much water would be conserved if 10,000 households use the FlexRak!

Let's start with 900 FlexRaks and continue from there.

We've already put our money where our mouths are - We have gone ahead with production and the FlexRak is in stock.

We are currently approaching multiples municipalities and not-for-profit water conservation organizations to gain their endorsement and support.

If you're not in a position to purchase the FlexRak then please use Indiegogo share tools and spread the word to as many people as you can.

story:
For my new friends

I, along with my wife Laura Rawluk, have lived and worked in the Wolseley riding since 2003. I run a small business specializing in renovating older homes, including making them more energy efficient.

My extensive volunteer experience of 25 years includes forest conservation, marine wildlife protection and working to end the use of pesticides and other toxins.

I’m proud to say that I had a role in the successful effort to end logging in Manitoba’s Provincial Parks. This grassroots effort, which took twenty years to achieve, resulted in a parks logging ban in 2009.

In 1993, along with a thousand other activists, I stood up for the ancient rainforests of Clayoquot Sound, British Columbia. This successful civil disobedience campaign was the largest of its kind in Canadian history.

And I have volunteered years of my time on the ships of the Sea Shepherd Conservation Society, a conservation group dedicated to protecting marine wildlife. I sailed on a total of eight campaigns over 17 years including the successful campaign to stop illegal whaling in the waters around Antarctica. Recently, I have signed on as Vice President of Sea Shepherd Canada.

I am now excited to be working on the campaign to represent the people of Wolseley under the banner of the Green Party of Manitoba.

___________________

The 2016 Manitoba Election

The April 19th, 2016, provincial election is incredibly important. Whether it's building a stronger green economy, addressing poverty through tax reform, improving public transportation, adding more affordable housing, or sustaining our environment, the Green Party of Manitoba has a positive vision for the future of our province.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to build our party infrastructure, build our organization, and share our positive message with the people of Manitoba.

Your money will  help us build a strong 2016 Wolseley Campaign, giving us the ability to reach all the voters in our riding.

The Impact

Your contribution will make a huge difference:

The main parties want you to sit on the sidelines so they can carry on with the old politics. But together, we can provide a true alternative that represents the real priorities of Manitobans. Together we can elect the first Green representative to the Manitoba Legislature.

___________________

Election Law Compliance

All online contributors must confirm that the following statements are true and accurate.

My normal place of residence is in the Province of Manitoba.

I am at least 18 years of age.

I am making this contribution on my own personal credit card and not with a corporate or business credit card or a credit card issued to anyone else.

I am making this contribution (and paying this credit charge) with my own personal funds, and I am not using funds provided by any another person or from any corporation, labour union or national bank to make this contribution.

Contributions to the Green Party of Manitoba are subject to the prohibitions and limitations of the Manitoba Elections Act. That law prohibits contributions from minors, corporations, labour unions and foreign nationals who are not admitted for permanent residence. Contributors must be resident in the Province of Manitoba. The total of all contributions in any one calendar year may not exceed $3,000 per person.

All contributions must be made from personal funds and may not be reimbursed by any other person. Contributions are tax deductible for Manitoba income tax purposes.

new friends
I, along with my wife Laura Rawluk, have lived and
worked in the Wolseley riding since 2003. I run a small business specializing
in renovating older homes, including making them more energy efficient.
My extensive volunteer experience of 25 years includes forest
conservation, marine wildlife protection and working to end the use of
pesticides and other toxins.
I’m proud to say that I had a role in the successful effort to end
logging in Manitoba’s Provincial Parks. This grassroots effort, which took
twenty years to achieve, resulted in a parks logging ban in 2009.
In 1993, along with a thousand other activists, I stood up for the
ancient rainforests of Clayoquot Sound, British Columbia. This successful civil
disobedience campaign was the largest of its kind in Canadian history.
And I have volunteered years of my time on the ships of the Sea
Shepherd Conservation Society, a conservation group dedicated to
protecting marine wildlife. I sailed on a total of eight campaigns over 17
years including the successful campaign to stop illegal whaling in the waters
around Antarctica. Recently, I have signed on as Vice President of Sea

Carol Calvert:  Our Original 1 minute 'Thriving Life Tools' Call to Action:
Here's Carol Calvert, creator of the Living Wellology and some tips for you :

Organic and Tech Savvy:

 
What's it that you want to achieve in life for you, your family, even your pets?
 
One lifestyle setting, A Lifestyle of LOVE!
#LampwithSoul #FeartoLove #Manymoreorganics #HappyLamp #FuturisticArcturianTechnology #HomeOfficeSpa #IntegrativeorHolistic

#HolisticVibeAdvocateWorkswithYou LifeVibesYourWay #YOUCHOOSE

#AsSeenonNBC #11Attributes #Futuristic

#AreYouReady ?  It's a lifestyle vibe choosing life!

 "A lifestyle lamp for home or office I envisioned being created  with futuristic applications that are safe, natural, easy to use and sure to create harmony, love, a balanced lifestyle."  Carol Calvert, creator, explains. "Manufacturing and I begin our design with a raw, untreated maple wood six inch circular drum for stability, beauty and balance.  By creating the Living Wellology without finishes to the wood, we leave it open to breathe what is has to come forth from within.  The raw, maple drum base and the six inch crystal circular top are both engraved with the sacred geometry, the flower of life, known for it's physics connection of all of creation with the golden mean formula (from a sea shell, plant kingdom, human and animal body parts design, we see the workings of the flower of life.) "

 "Next, we engineered the Living Wellology to house simply two operating controls beyond the on/off switch.  One for a light color choice for your lamp; the other for a lifestyle setting choice."  RS LED Light choices (tv controls or that of a stoplight)  include red, green, blue and full spectrum white (called in the LED Blub industry as Daylight, or all the colors of the sun at 12pm).  It is long established in science that light affects us positively as living beings, be it human, animal or plant.  Lifestyle Choices are derived from how we interact with everything we come in contact in life with from food, water, what we ingest, smell, hear, touch, who we choose to spend time with, work with, workout with, vacation and study with.  This list goes on in a global society, from how we travel: be it in our cars, by train, by air, internet, cell phone, and many other mobile applications.  We are energy and light beings interacting with energy and light, or lack of and our experiences attest to what we are feeling and being.  Even in ancient times, it was established that frequency impacts our lives in a good, bad or in between way. 

So, what if you could choose a lifestyle frequency setting for what environment you want to create:  One = Energy and Performance, Two=Stress Reduction and Calm/Meditation, Three = Antiaging and TimeLess Beauty, Four = Nutriments"?

Full Spectrum White Light Research:  Eradicates Surface of Fruits & Veggies

Activate Your Water Before Drinking!  Just set your water bottle next to The Living Wellology and choose the vibes setting:

http://www.livingwellologylamp.com/11-Futuristic-Attributes.php

 

http://www.wcnc.com/video/news/health/experts-s...    

Transcribed Video:
Thank you, Savannah Levins, NBC Charlotte for featuring Carol Lovell Calvert and our Living Wellology Lifestyle Lamp in the December 21 newscast. Woohoo! The #Little #Lamp of #Life #Hacks
 

HEALTH  

Experts say the 'winter blues' are real. But you can treat it for just a few bucks

Thursday was more than just the literal darkest day of the year. It was the winter solstice, which is known to trigger seasonal depression in millions of Americans.

Author: Savannah Levins

Published: 9:49 PM EST December 21, 2017

Updated: 11:20 PM EST December 21, 2017

CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- Thursday was the darkest day of the year both literally and, for many, mentally.

It was the 2017 winter solstice, which is known to trigger or worsen seasonal depression in millions of Americans.

“People experience a sense of sadness that's overwhelming,” one doctor explained. “It's not just, 'I wish the winter would go away I can't wait for spring,' sometimes it's so impactful that people can't get out of bed.”

“It could lead to suicidal thoughts during these kinds of episodes which is why you do not want to ignore this type of depression.”

It's called seasonal affective disorder, or SAD, a type of depression that usually comes on during the winter and vanishes by spring.

You might know it as the "winter blues." Experts say it has to do with the reduction of sunlight.

Now, medical research suggests tricking our bodies could be the solution.

“A lot of people don't even know that they can make changes in the way they feel with light," said Carol Calvert, a light therapy expert based in Charlotte.

“You want to be in light more than not," she said.

You can buy light therapy lamps online, Calvert even invented her own. The idea is that the bulbs make your body think you're standing out in the sunshine.

And you don't need to drop a fortune. You can pick up the so-called "daylight" bulbs for a few dollars.

“Big box stores will not tell you that this is a wellness bulb but it is,” Calvert said. “This bulb will change the way you feel about life, period.”

She suggests installing daylight bulbs around your house and making it a point to go outside.

“Everyone, get out and spend time in the sun,” she said.

To learn more about seasonal affective disorder, including symptoms, click here.

Copyright 2017 WCNC

story:
We've created a flat-packed solution.

Each ecokit home is build out of modular, flat-packed engineered construction system made from thermal insulated panels (and no polystyrene, XPS or EPS).

It's made from healthy, non-toxic, low environmental impact materials to create an off-grid home (*optional) made from a combination of digitally manufactured and off-the-shelf components.

Prefabricating many of the building components and creating an easy to assemble kit not only reduces waste but also maximizes the quality of construction.

An ecokit home can be built by two people over a few weeks with on-line technical support and minimal tools, making incredible savings on labour. But if you don't feel like tackling it yourself, any skilled builder can do it for you.

We're reinventing the word 'luxury.'

It used to mean extravagance, opulence and excess. Our new definition is living life on your own terms, without a huge mortgage hanging over your head or pressure to stay in a job that you hate.

Finally a comfortable home.

An airtight building envelope − coupled with an innovative wall system − have resulted in optimum thermal efficiency to ensure you’re cosy in winter and cool in summer. The roof system utilises the revolutionary Tractile tiles, the world’s first integrated solar roof generating both electricity and hot water from a single unit. Each home is finished off with a covered spacious deck to enjoy the outdoors all year round.

Breathe in. Enjoy the fresh air.

Living environment should be a healthy environment. We have chosen the materials and finishes and designed the heating and ventilation systems to promote healthy living.

We’ve done extensive research to avoid using substances that can off-gas into the living spaces and chosen finishes and treatments that are either low or no VOC’s (Volatile Organic Compounds). We have made sure as many materials and finishes are natural.

A home that grows with you.

As our lifestyle changes, so should our home. Ecokit home can be easily extended by adding extra modules to accommodate all your needs. And you don’t need an enormous mortgage to get started.

Here's where we are: 

We've been working for the last 3 years to get us to where we are today. We designed the house, developed a new construction system, partly completed our architectural and construction drawings, made the best deals with material suppliers and have a client backing the project and investing into the prototype house.

We are now in the middle of a big capital raise push. Don't forget, we're doing this from the ground up and we aren't underwritten by anyone but our friends, family and YOU. Once we finish raising money, we'll start the construction and flip the switch on manufacturing of the kit. 

We are ready to build the first ecokit home. We have tested the modules, assembled them and took them apart... 

We have a client with available land in beautiful Snowy Mountains, supporting us and our project and ready to invest to build the prototype house.

We have volunteers who put their hand up for the construction.

We have sponsors who donated their awesome products to showcase ecokit in its completeness.

So how do you fit in? 

Are you dreaming about building your own ecokit home? Well now is your chance! Our kits are only months away from reaching you, but we can't get there without your help. In order to build and fit-out the prototype you all can rent out and experience first hand, we need your contribution to help us reach our goal of $65,000.

This money will help us pay for the remainder of our construction documentation & detailed assembly manual, as well as video production of the construction. It will be also used for certification of compliance with BCA, so we can release the kit on the market as soon as possible.

Will my investment really make a difference?

Your impact is larger than words. You will help create the moments that empower people. And for this project specifically, you will have the chance to be part of creating a next generation type of home. We aren’t funded by any of the big construction dinosaurs; we aren’t funded by one single family; we are funded by YOU, our supporters.

What else can I do to help?

Thought you'd never ask! Please share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and e-mail using the Indiegogo tools at the top right of this page. The more we can spread the word about this opportunity, the sooner can ecokit be on the market. 

This first ecokit home (or two rather!) will host you (our product tester backers) and our ambassadors. We will hold regular open days to show the house to potential buyers and it will be also available to book for a short stay for those wanting to experience the life in ecokit home.

Now it's time to jump on board and donate to help us reach our goal!

We know that when good people come together for the right reasons, there is no limit to what can be achieved!

Early sponsors.

Ecokit homes is delighted to announce our early Sponsors and wish to thank them for their support and generosity!

The perks.

We realize this is not a traditional campaign, as we simply can't give a house to everyone who backs us but what we are looking for is people who can see the vision. This campaign is a call for support of a new idea. It's primarily a call for fellow dreamers, innovators and revolutionaries to join us and help redefine what home really means. 

The manufacturing of ecokit will be limited for the first few months and because we have a lot of interest and had to create a waiting list already, we are offering 10 kits* for a pre-order. Those can be delivered anytime during 2018 and the fee guarantees you the kit and $2000 off the purchase price.

*Those kits start at $99,900 for the ground floor studio unit with basic selections and will be customized for every customer. All additional cost for upgrades will be added to the base fee.

We have also prepared a pet range of ecokits - we have a small and medium dog house and a cat mansion, too! Those kits are flat packed, DIY, minimalist style pet homes that will suit any interior. They come in natural & black foil ply.

The Workshops.

Want to co-innovate a trailblazing affordable housing model?

For a $500 (or $1000 for construction industry professional) donation you can join our exclusive workshop during the construction of the prototype where we will collaborate on improving the construction and brainstorming the easiest & safest way of assembly, as well as collectively building the first ecokit home!

story:
Our Quest To Quench The World

We are fyrfly. An engineering team competing in the Water Abundance XPRIZE Competition powered by Tata Group and Australian Aid. Revolutionizing access to fresh water by creating a device that extracts a minimum of 2,000 liters of water per day from the atmosphere using 100% renewable energy, at a cost of no more than 2 cents per liter.

71% of the world is covered in water but more than 780 million people are still facing water scarcity. Excessive consumption, pollution, and access are the main contributors. The responsibility of water is critical now than ever before. By 2025, up to 1.8 billion people could be living in areas of absolute water scarcity [http://www.unwater.org/water-facts/scarcity/].  

 

Solution

There exists over 3 quadrillion gallons of water in the atmosphere as vapor [https://water.xprize.org/]. That is enough to meet the demands of everyone on this planet for a year. The challenge is to take the vapor and condense it into a liquid without consuming too much energy or producing greenhouse gases. There are many atmospheric water generating systems available today, however, their designs are too expensive, too inefficient, or invasive by its means of generating water.

Our solution is intended primarily to generate clean drinking water for underserved countries. We also envision AquaHub working to restore deforested parts of the world, serve as an alternate source to offset water consumption, feed crops for local farmers, and those affected by natural disasters. Because our design was built for these purposes, it will re-ignite the race for clean water.

Our Technology

 

ZJ and I decided that before we began campaigning, we had to prove our water collection theories. Our solution illustrated above are the main components. We have an undisclosed 'method' up our sleeve that we'd like to share personally with our supporters, who will also receive real-time updates of our manufacturing progress and status of our submission.

 

Where Your Funds Go

 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest risk is meeting the competition deadline. A $5,000 goal in 20 days is intimidating, but we stay on Hawaiian time. We need to purchase all components and have them shipped to Hawaii before the window to manufacture our first round model. Simulations begin on January 10 and end on January 18, 2018, via video proof submission.

 

Other Ways You Can Help Quench The World

If you would like to help but can't donate, please share the news of this atmospheric aqua renaissance. It is one of the Millenium Development Goals initiated by the United Nations. XPRIZE has taken their own initiative by generating the international competition. 98 teams registered for the same purpose, all thanks to incentives by sponsors of the non-profit organization. The Water Abundance XPRIZE powered by Tata Group and Australian Aid is a $1.75 million competition aimed to solve water scarcity. More on the organization and competition can be found here. Sponsor information can be found here.

ENABLINGTHEFUTURE.org

We have teamed up with enablingthefuture.org to donate 3D printed prosthetic kits for their upcoming underserved school program. Our 'Lend a Hand' tiers have the humbling opportunity to support two causes in one perk. A link to see how the 3D printing volunteer network changes the world can be found here.

About The Team

Zijun Lin

I am a passionate engineer and have been since I was a child. I am originally from a farming town in China and emigrated to Hawaii when I was eight years old. From my experience of farming, I have learned that water is the most important resource we have on this planet. I feel this problem isn't taken seriously enough. If water is gone, civilization will go too. Without water, we can’t keep our homes, wonʻt be able to grow food, or use daily. It's alarming to see, coming from a farming background, that our rivers and lakes have been destroyed from man-made pollutants to the point where the water can no longer sustain life. I'd like to fix that.

David Brennan

Water has been apart of my life- our lives, since the beginning of humanity. When I was asked to join the team, I couldn’t say no. An opportunity to give back to the world that has given everything to me is something I’ve always wanted to do. This project is a little piece of that motivation. My parents always told me that I could be anything if I worked hard enough. The carelessness of water contamination, high-demand of aquifers and climate change have detrimental effects. As an engineer, I aim to save the world by any means. I’ve worked night in and day out to fulfill my pursuit of reciprocation.

Kāne’ohe of O’ahu island has been my home since I was born. I hold a high regard for water as it is vital to sustain any form of life. Not only to drink but to keep us cool at the beach. Not only to shower but to recharge aquifers. The importance of understanding the impact water has on oneʻs life is to understand how scarce it will be once demand is greater than supply.
story_txt: Our Quest To Quench The WorldWe are fyrfly. An engineering team competing in the Water Abundance XPRIZE Competition powered by Tata Group and Australian Aid. Revolutionizing access to fresh water by creating a device that extracts a minimum of 2,000 liters of water per day from the atmosphere using 100% renewable energy, at a cost of no more than 2 cents per liter.71% of the world is covered in water but more than 780 million people are still facing water scarcity. Excessive consumption, pollution, and access are the main contributors. The responsibility of water is critical now than ever before. By 2025, up to 1.8 billion people could be living in areas of absolute water scarcity [http://www.unwater.org/water-facts/scarcity/].   SolutionThere exists over 3 quadrillion gallons of water in the atmosphere as vapor [https://water.xprize.org/]. That is enough to meet the demands of everyone on this planet for a year. The challenge is to take the vapor and condense it into a liquid without consuming too much energy or producing greenhouse gases. There are many atmospheric water generating systems available today, however, their designs are too expensive, too inefficient, or invasive by its means of generating water.Our solution is intended primarily to generate clean drinking water for underserved countries. We also envision AquaHub working to restore deforested parts of the world, serve as an alternate source to offset water consumption, feed crops for local farmers, and those affected by natural disasters. Because our design was built for these purposes, it will re-ignite the race for clean water.Our Technology ZJ and I decided that before we began campaigning, we had to prove our water collection theories. Our solution illustrated above are the main components. We have an undisclosed 'method' up our sleeve that we'd like to share personally with our supporters, who will also receive real-time updates of our manufacturing progress and status of our submission. Where Your Funds Go Risks & ChallengesOur biggest risk is meeting the competition deadline. A $5,000 goal in 20 days is intimidating, but we stay on Hawaiian time. We need to purchase all components and have them shipped to Hawaii before the window to manufacture our first round model. Simulations begin on January 10 and end on January 18, 2018, via video proof submission. Other Ways You Can Help Quench The WorldIf you would like to help but can't donate, please share the news of this atmospheric aqua renaissance. It is one of the Millenium Development Goals initiated by the United Nations. XPRIZE has taken their own initiative by generating the international competition. 98 teams registered for the same purpose, all thanks to incentives by sponsors of the non-profit organization. story:
Check out our newest perk - your own mini solar generator/charger for $55 AUD (around $40 USD) with free postage to the US, Canada and Australia!

 

Summary

We are a group of passionate entrepreneurs located in Brisbane, Australia who believe in reducing CO2 emissions through providing renewable energy to the world. 

We are determined to construct a fully portable generator using 100% renewable energy that produces power equal to, or in excess of, a 34kw standard diesel generator. 

There is a huge and unaddressed global demand for portable generators. Almost all sizeable energy generators that can be transported by road or rail (e.g. for concerts and festivals, rural and remote communities, developing communities, caravan parks, outdoor markets and following natural disasters) are diesel or petrol-based, with ongoing costs for fuel. They also produce significant amounts of pollution. 

We wanted to produce a renewable alternative that creates the same amount of electricity with supply available at any time, day or night.

Frankly, anyone can transport solar PV panels to a location and capture electricity. The challenge is to convert and store it effectively, particularly if you plan to move the unit to a range of different locations and have it work with minimal customisation. This requires sophisticated hardware and software that can respond to a wide range of conditions, as well as high-quality batteries and PV panels. 

We think we have the solution. 

In early 2018 a proof-of-concept design was tested in the EU demonstrating it was possible to generate comparable power as a diesel generator.

High quality photovoltaic panels, a high-capacity battery, tailored hardware to tackle conversion and storage and carefully written software to ensure an efficient and consistent flow of electricity was used.

Importantly, this system will fit into a weatherproof container that can be transported on standard-gauge road and rail.

It will also be:

  • Portable - installed almost anywhere there is sunlight in 90 minutes
  • 100% renewable - using high-quality German solar cells and batteries
  • Continuous - 24 hour power via a battery and software
  • Powerful - the unit will be able to power up to 10 standard US houses simultaneously for up to 15 years
  • Cost-effective - cost of power is expected to be cheaper than a diesel generator over the life of the unit (at least 15 years), and the break-even cost with a diesel generator, including fuel, is 3.5 years. 

Our product will address a clear gap in the global renewable energy market through the provision of portable solar production and storage.

It will help remote and vulnerable communities around the world and will help save the planet. 

What We Need & What You Will Get

In early 2018, a unit was successfully tested in the EU demonstrating proof of concept. We need your support to get things moving and achieve the following:

  • Assembly of software and  hardware into a portable container; 
  • Testing, conversion and certification in key markets (beginning with Australia and following with New Zealand, the US, the Pacific Islands, the Philippines and Indonesia, where demand is significant and sunshine is abundant); 
  • Marketing and promotional material to make people aware of the product

We estimate the assembly, testing, shipping of EU parts, conversion and certification will take around 9 months. 

Because the first unit will be converted to Australian standards, this will ensure high safety standards and rigorous compliance that will apply to most other markets. Once this has begun, we will expand to other markets, with an emphasis on developing economies who can benefit the most from our unit (the FAQ provides more information). 

You will also get some fantastic perks - some of the best in crowdfunding - from donating as little as $10 AUD.

Your Impact

Our vision is to be a provider of portable, renewable energy solutions globally. 

We are absolutely committed to halting global warming through the reduction of CO2 emissions and believe this will be the key challenge for humanity in this century. 

We also believe that by providing portable power anywhere in the world, the worlds poorest communities will be able to access power without having to purchase increasingly expensive fossil fuels.

Once the unit is purchased and provided (e.g. for a remote village) there are virtually no additional costs, as the fuel source (the sun) is free. 

This provides an amazing opportunity to combat global warming and global poverty at the same time. 

Put simply, we aim to make energy green, accessible and affordable. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, we understand. But please help us to get the word out through posting this to Facebook, Twitter and other social media platforms, so we can roll out these generators to vulnerable communities around the world and combat global warming at the same time. 

Remember: very small actions can have tremendous benefits. So please go ahead and share this campaign!

Want to know more about us?

Solar Republik is a company owned by three passionate individuals dedicated to reducing CO2 emissions and tackling global poverty.

Our Bios are below:

  • Mr Scott D Taylor is the founding Partner of Taylor David Lawyers.
  • Scott has advised on some of Australia’s most complex and high-profile reconstruction and insolvency matters. He is also an accomplished author of the Australian chapter of the annual International Insolvency Review and is a regular speaker and presenter at various forums around the world.
  • Scott is also a board member of the Children’s Hospital Foundation Queensland and sits on the London-based expert review panel for the Insolvency Law Reviews.
  • Mr Marcin Lerner completed his Bachelor of Commerce and Masters in Banking and Finance at Griffith University, Brisbane. He then went on to work for British Airways in London before holding multiple senior management roles over the last 12 years in the industrial manufacturing sector in Europe.
  • Marcin's experience is Financial, Commercial & Technical. He is also fluent in English, German and Polish. 
  • Dr Clinton de Bruyn MAICD has held a number of senior management roles in government agencies.
  • He obtained his PhD from Griffith University in Brisbane, Australia and is also a member of the Australian Institute of Company Directors, having recently completed the prestigious AICD Company Director’s Course.

We believe we have the legal, accounting and business experience to develop this important product and export portable, renewable energy to the most vulnerable communities globally.  

We are very grateful for your support.  Remember: every little bit makes a big difference!

He obtained his PhD from Griffith University in Brisbane, Australia and is also a member of the Australian Institute of Company Directors, having recently completed the prestigious AICD Company Director’s Course.

story:
About

The creation of something special... That is what this is. We are working hard to create a prototype and eventually produce at large scale a filter that attaches to the exhaust of vehicles. As of now, we only have CAD renderings, and are playing with different designs. For us to be as successful as possible, we need funding to help cover our expenses for consults, modeling, and production of the working prototypes. Now, as for what this product is meant to do! The world we live in today is in many places full of heavy traffic, with a whole slew of cars, trucks, motorbikes, and more out on the streets. To cut down on pollution, we have catalytic converters that help to turn all of the harmful byproduct and fumes from an engine into less dangerous chemicals. The problem is, we are still polluting at an alarming rate. Sure we can't yet completely stop pollution on these combustion engines using gasoline and diesel, BUT we can help a little more. This product uses the power of activated carbon to absorb some of those dangerous byproducts not caught by the catalytic converter, as well as the byproducts of the catalytic converter itself such as carbon dioxide and nitrous oxide. Say you are an eco friendly person, you can put one of these bad boys on, and help the world out an extra little bit. Now some people may say one person can't change the world, which is why we are trying to bring this to a large scale. All of us who care enough to take that little extra step to help out can come together and bring down pollution from vehicles substantially overall. Cities can implement these filters onto non-electric city buses, we can use them on heavy machinery, semi-trucks, and oh so much more. Or, in another manner, say your car no longer meets emission standards. Just grab one of these filters, pop it on your exhaust, and boom! You are good to go. We are meticulously working to come up with a good solution, and design the best product possible. This means taking into consideration the hot temperatures of exhaust, heat expansion, heat resistant material, and much more. But to get to that big, large scale wonder, we need to start small. Teamwork makes the dream work, and with your help, we can all be a part of the bigger picture. Want to see what we have so far? Take a look at these CAD renderings of what we have going on. Our goal is to create a physical prototype, and that is what we are going to do!

 

Risks & Challenges

As mentioned in our story, we are well aware of some challenges, and as with any startup and prototyping there are risks. We are very hard at work to plan out and overcome these challenges. The biggest challenges include airflow, exhaust temperatures, and efficiency in general. After brainstorming, we were able to devise ways to help overcome these challenges. For airflow, we have created a special inner design, allowing airflow while still holding up to efficiency and containing enough activated carbon. To overcome temperatures, we plan to cast/print our design out of metal, to deal with the temperatures of nature and the exhaust itself. Taking into account thermal expansion, we have created a design that attaches onto the exhaust in a manner that actually allows the inner cylinder to expand and retract based on temperature. Risks include not having enough funding, and having to revise the original schematics. Other risks may include run of the mill things that come with the nature of start ups. Our end of the road may come, and the prototype may not work, and we could lose all of our work. If there isn't enough traction in the target market, we may not be able to continue. We will do all we can to prevent this and make our idea successful, but just remember, teamwork makes the dream work!
