story:
What you see before you is an affordable green building material that is truly groundbreaking in its durability, ease of installation, its versatility of application, and amazing construction properties. BrocKrete is a new, patented product that has many applications from commercial to residential, and while it may look familiar, it’s like nothing you’ve seen before.

Our company offers an innovative new product called BrocKrete. This is a “Green”, energy efficient, low-cost, lightweight, extremely strong, construction alternative made primarily from recycled materials. It has the appearance of concrete yet has many many more applications. It can be molded and poured into blocks, panels, bricks, archways, floors, walls, ceilings and even roofing. It is wind, earthquake, fire, tornado, and impact resistant. Professional testing has been done with more testing to be completed at Texas Tech University and other reputable laboratories as needed.  BrocKrete is currently being produced in small batches on site.  This is why we need your help to take BrocKrete into the next level of production.

 

Who We Are

We are a small group of entrepreneurs who came together to bring this amazing invention to the world.   We have each been successful in our own endeavors and have now joined forces to revolutionize the construction industry by perfecting, producing and distributing BrocKrete.

Robert "Bob" Brock, the inventor of BrocKrete, is responsible for all research and development of existing and future products.  Bob has over 50 years of business experience as concessioner of golf courses in the Washington DC area.   He also holds three additional patents related to environmental concerns.

Sir M. Kenneth Scarborough is our Sales and Marketing expert.  With over 50 years of business experience to include owning and operating a nationwide commercial real estate firm, President of Commercial Brokerage Division of Major Commercial Real Estate Brokerage Firm., Honorary Trade Counsel to Shijiazhuang City, Hebei Province, People's Republic of China

Christopher Scarborough, the Chief Operations Officer, has worked in a fast-paced, customer service oriented profession for over 23 years.  He has co-owned and managed a successful commercial construction company for 16 of those years.   He has earned the respect of his colleagues and clients through his hard work, dedication, and commitment to honest business practices.  

Valerie Black, the Chief Executive Officer, has worked as both a Partner and President of two Commercial Real Estate Firms over a span of 20 years. She brings successful experience in providing fiscal, strategic and operational leadership in uniquely challenging situations. She is innovative, creative and quite possibly the most persistent person we've ever known.

It is critical that we raise enough money to build the first BrocKrete home.  Once complete we will hold a press conference & have the experts at Texas Tech come out with their mobile air cannon to demonstrate the effectiveness of BrocKrete at stopping impacts from EF5 Tornado winds. We believe this press coverage will attract investors to fund our production plant.  Currently, we are funding the development of BrocKrete with our own money.  It has been an expensive venture up to this point with all the testing required.  We're passionate about BrocKrete because it can help to save our environment and in the process, save lives. Any additional monies raised will go toward building our production plant, including machinery, tools, and staff to run it.

In Return for making a donation early on, we are offering a variety of super cool perks as our way of saying thanks! We have Thank You Emails and Updates, Mugs, T-Shirts, and Big Discounts on future BrocKrete purchases.

If for some reason our funding doesn't make the goal, we will secure an outside loan to fund the remaining balance to construct our first BrocKrete home and or manufacturing facility. 

Why Brockrete

BrocKrete has many amazing abilities and attributes. Here is a list of some of the amazing benefits with more testing being done on an ongoing basis to increase the number of attributes.

Green Product

Our affordable green building material, Brockrete, is a revolutionary new product perfectly suited for residential or commercial applications. At Brockrete, not only do we utilize recycled materials in the product, but we even focus on recycling the water used in the production of this patented material.

 

Tornado and Impact Resistant

Yes, BrocKrete is officially rated to withstand impacts from an F5 tornado. We passed Tornado Impact Testing at the Texas Tech Wind Institute on September 18th, 2015. This was our second round of testing done by the awesome professionals at the Texas Tech Wind Institute. Tornado Shelters/Safe Rooms are coming in the near future.

 

BrocKrete is also Earthquake and Wind Resistant. Official Testing results verified by Hands Engineering Firm in Santa Fe, NM

Financial Savings

This product comes in under budget with at least a 25-30% savings over traditional sticks and bricks construction. Because of BrocKrete’s insulating efficiency, it also saves dramatically on heating and cooling costs over traditional construction methods.

Durability

BrocKrete is extremely durable, strong and long-lasting. We have panels over 15 years old and expect it to last much longer than traditionally built homes.

On Going Testing

Ongoing testing to determine other BrocKrete benefits will be done at our comprehensive research and development facility in beautiful Taos, New Mexico. Professional testing is being done on an ongoing basis to certify our in house testing results.

Challenges and Risks

We know there will challenges and risks along the way.  Getting up to speed quickly will be of paramount importance.  We expect challenges with production going from small batches to full-scale commercial production.  We are working through scenarios on an ongoing basis to minimize the impact of these issues.  We believe most of it can be handled through careful and thoughtful planning. 

Currently, we are able to produce in small batches only and will fill larger orders as production capabilities ramp up, this may mean a delay in filling larger orders until we complete our manufacturing facility.

Other Ways to help

For all of you who want to help, but may not be able to contribute financially, you can still help us get BrocKrete out to the world.  Our success is your success.  Please share our video on your Facebook, LinkedIn, email or other online communities.  We need your help in spreading the word about our revolutionary breakthrough construction product.

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to let all your friends know and get the message out.  Together we can make a difference in the environment and help make buildings safer.

Who We Are
We are a small group of entrepreneurs who came together to bring this amazing invention to the world.   We have each been successful in our own endeavors and have now joined forces to revolutionize the construction industry by perfecting, producing and distributing BrocKrete.
Robert "Bob" Brock, the inventor of BrocKrete, is responsible for all research and development of existing and future products.  Bob has over 50 years of business experience as concessioner of golf courses in the Washington DC area.   He also holds three additional patents related to environmental concerns.
Sir M. Kenneth Scarborough is our Sales and Marketing expert.  With over 50 years of business experience to include owning and operating a nationwide commercial real estate firm, President of Commercial Brokerage Division of Major Commercial Real Estate Brokerage Firm., Honorary Trade Counsel to Shijiazhuang City, Hebei Province, People's Republic of China
Christopher Scarborough, the Chief Operations Officer, has worked in a fast-paced, customer service oriented profession for over 23 years.  He has co-owned and managed a successful commercial construction company for 16 of those years.   He has earned the respect of his colleagues and clients through his hard work, dedication, and commitment to honest business practices.  
Valerie Black, the Chief Executive Officer, has worked as both a Partner and President of two Commercial Real Estate Firms over a span of 20 years. She brings successful experience in providing fiscal, strategic and operational leadership in uniquely challenging situations. She is innovative, creative and quite possibly the most persistent person we've ever known.

It is critical that we raise enough money to build the first BrocKrete home.  Once complete we will hold a press conference & have the experts at Texas Tech come out with their mobile air cannon to demonstrate the effectiveness of BrocKrete at stopping impacts from EF5 Tornado winds. We believe this press coverage will attract investors to fund our production plant.  Currently, we are funding the development of BrocKrete with our own money.  It has been an expensive venture up to this point with all the testing required.  We're passionate about BrocKrete because it can help to save our environment and in the process, save lives. Any additional monies raised will go toward building our production plant, including machinery, tools, and staff to run it.
In Return for making a donation early on, we are offering a variety of super cool perks as our way of saying thanks! We have Thank You Emails and Updates, Mugs, T-Shirts, and Big Discounts on future BrocKrete purchases.
If for some reason our funding doesn't make the goal, we will secure an outside loan to fund the remaining balance to construct our first BrocKrete home and or manufacturing facility. 

Why Brockrete
BrocKrete has many amazing abilities and attributes. Here is a list of some of the amazing benefits with more testing being done on an ongoing basis to increase the number of attributes.
Green Product
Our affordable green building material, Brockrete, is a revolutionary new product perfectly suited for residential or commercial applications. At Brockrete, not only do we utilize recycled materials in the product, but we even focus on recycling the water used in the production of this patented material.
 
Tornado and Impact Resistant
Yes, BrocKrete is officially rated to withstand impacts from an F5 tornado. We passed Tornado Impact Testing at the Texas Tech Wind Institute on September 18th, 2015. This was our second round of testing done by the awesome professionals at the Texas Tech Wind Institute. Tornado Shelters/Safe Rooms are coming in the near future.



 

BrocKrete is also Earthquake and Wind Resistant. Official Testing results verified by Hands Engineering Firm in Santa Fe, NM
Financial Savings
This product comes in under budget with at least a 25-30% savings over traditional sticks and bricks construction. Because of BrocKrete’s insulating efficiency, it also saves dramatically on heating and cooling costs over traditional construction methods.
Durability
BrocKrete is extremely durable, strong and long-lasting. We have panels over 15 years old and expect it to last much longer than traditionally built homes.
On Going Testing
Ongoing testing to determine other BrocKrete benefits will be done at our comprehensive research and development facility in beautiful Taos, New Mexico. Professional testing is being done on an ongoing basis to certify our in house testing results.

Challenges and Risks
We know there will challenges and risks along the way.  Getting up to speed quickly will be of paramount importance.  We expect challenges with production going from small batches to full-scale commercial production.  We are working through scenarios on an ongoing basis to minimize the impact of these issues.  We believe most of it can be handled through careful and thoughtful planning. 
Currently, we are able to produce in small batches only and will fill larger orders as production capabilities ramp up, this may mean a delay in filling larger orders until we complete our manufacturing facility.

Other Ways to help
For all of you who want to help, but may not be able to contribute financially, you can still help us get BrocKrete out to the world.  Our success is your success.  Please share our video on your Facebook, LinkedIn, email or other online communities.  We need your help in spreading the word about our revolutionary breakthrough construction product.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools to let all your friends know and get the message out.  Together we can make a difference in the environment and help make buildings safer.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I am Manuel Lonfat, an atmospheric physicist, environmentalist and avid ultra cyclist. I founded Quambio a year ago with the vision to help reduce CO2 emissions through individual actions.

Every second, a car emits enough CO2 to fill a cube with 8cm sides, just enough to fit in one hand. Each journey in a car generates hundreds such cubes. In fact, every 100km a car emits as much CO2 as an adult tree is capable of removing from the atmosphere annually.

The best way to reduce CO2 is to not emit it. 

Our mission is to promote the reduction of personal emissions by encouraging people to use soft mobility for everyday activities, such as commuting to work, grocery shopping or children's activities.

We have created a mobile App to track reductions related to soft mobility and to reward people for not emitting CO2, with a system of challenges and incentives .

Our partners, such as insurers and companies with sustainable products, offer discounts in exchange for the reductions. For an insurer, fewer kilometers driven means less risk and more active people are healthier people.

 

What We Need

We seek to raise 25'000CHF to bring our mobile App to market. We have a working prototype, which is capable of recording trips and converting the information into an CO2 impact.

The App is not yet very pretty though. We will spend the money we raise on funding professional development of our user interface and to make your experience in the platform as cool as possible.

If we achieve partial funding, we will put all of it towards the goal of bringing the App to market. This may result in narrowing down somewhat the number of features we can deliver at first however. 

Check our prototype in this video...

 

What You Get

We will be giving you early access to the App and to new initiatives and offers from our partners (retailers and making of sustainable goods and services).

Additionally:

  • We will give you 1 Quambio cube for each Swiss franc contributed above 10 CHF
  • If you contribute 25 CHF or above, we'll give you 2 Quambio cubes for each CHF
  • If you contribute 100 CHF or more, we'll raise that number to 3 cubes for each Swiss franc
  • Above 500 CHF, we will match each Swiss franc contributed with 4 cubes and at 1000 CHF, you'll get 5 cubes for each CHF contributed!

In the App, one Quambio cube is earned every about 10km covered using soft mobility. Cubes will be redeemable for rebates on partners' products and services. 

But there is more:

  • Manuel will ride his bicycle to anyone who contributes 500 Swiss franc or more, as long as it is within 250km of his home in Neuchâtel (250km is half way to Paris!)
  • At 1000 CHF, Manuel will not only travel to you but also discuss climate issues in the context of your area or your business.

 

The Impact

Each of us contribute several tons of emissions through the way we get to work, to grocery or football practices and games. In fact, about half of the emission under our control comes from our mobility choices.

Our combined effort can ensure than 1000s of tons of CO2 never make it into the atmosphere. And there is no better way to avoid increasing atmospheric CO2 than to not put it there in the first place.

It is difficult though to get motivated to change behavior and to be consistent about it. The platform we are developing helps in providing rewards in exchange for actions. As we focus on sustainable partners to swap those rewards, we also promote a greener economy and a greener environment. Help us make this vision a reality!

 

Risks & Challenges

As we work on technology applications, timelines do represent a risk. We have assembled a fantastic development team, which positions us really well to have our first App publicly available by the end of January. However, we will not comprise on quality, ease of use and user experience, even if it means we need to use an extra month to two to get there.

 

Our Sustainability Model

Being sustainable is really important to us and starts with our tech. A non intrusive App is key to us because there is no point reducing personal emissions if it results in a lot of new tech emissions.

We pay attention to how servers are powered, what kind of data we need to store, and how frequently we need to email our community, for example. The emission cost of our operations will be monitored as we go live and we will place focus on reducing this cost. We will publish our emission assessments.

Besides our focus on sustainable tech described above, we are engaging with like-minded partners only, focusing on sustainable products. One of our goals is to present reward options in the App that are local. Redeem your actions where you live when possible, and support your local economy.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you feel you cannot contribute, please consider spreading the word using the Indiegogo share tools or via your favorite social media platforms!

We are also always looking for people to test our App and give us feedback. Please email us at manuel@quambio.com if you want to learn more.

Looking forward to have you join us on this journey to make our environment better for our society and for future ones!

 

Find us on Social Media!

You can find us on LinkedIn, Facebook, Strava  and Twitter! Here are the links to Quambio and Manuel social media pages:

Quambio website: http://www.quambio.ch/

On LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/quambio/

                           https://www.linkedin.com/in/manuellonfat/

On Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/quambio

                          https://www.facebook.com/mlonfat

On Twitter: @quambio_climate

story:
Solar will have: Global Impact in the years ahead...

Solar power is now the most cost effective way to generate electricity.  Today, solar energy provides five-tenths of 1 percent of the total energy consumed in the United States.  In ten years, that number should be ninety percent.  Clean, quiet, unlimited supply of energy from the sun.  Buy the system and it produces free energy for decades.  So let's get started with an emergency power system today.

Help us by supporting this crowdfunding campaign to give everyone emergency power when "The Grid" goes down due to natural disasters like: hurricanes, tornadoes, earthquakes, floods, fires and high winds.  Sometimes it goes down for many other reasons.  Solar flares or military EMP can take The Grid down - be prepared.

We really felt for the victims of last year's natural disasters.  Hurricanes: Harvey, Irma and Maria.

Even people with solar panels on their roofs were without power.  Grid-Tie solar power systems are controlled remotely by the Grid Operators.  They shut down customers with solar panels.  Check the "fine print" of your contract.

Never be without electricity again...

The Emergency Solar Power Briefcase is designed to supply power twenty four hours per day, seven days a week.   During the day, the advanced solar cells product more than one kilowatt of power per day during full sun conditions.   Completely quiet, not even a fan to make noise.  In cases of emergency, you don't want to let the bad guys know you have power.

The powerful Lithium Ion batteries continue to supply power even after the sun goes down.  You can power an electric blanket for example.  One electric blanket we tested consumes 40 watts per hour.  This means our 1KW (One KiloWatt) system could power an electric blanket twenty hours a day and the batteries would be totally charged in full sun the next day.  Typically, you would use the electric blanket while you sleep or maybe seven hours in a twenty four hour period.

Only our 1KW (Kilo-Watt) system can power a 600 or 700 watt microwave oven.  The peak current required is approximately 60 amps at 12 volts (720 watts).  The 1KW system can provide 12 volts at 80 amps, continuously.   Typically,  cook or heat up food in about 3 minutes with a microwave.  This is only 35 watt hours of power.  The solar panels produce 100 watts per hours.  Thus, it only takes 20 minutes to replace this power in the batteries by the solar panels.

We tested the Cooluli (Mini Fridge Electric Cooler and Warmer (10L/15L).  This unit call keep your food or beverages cold.  It also doubles as a heater for a tent or car, for example.  The manufacturer claims, if the unit is unplugged, it can keep cold for one to two hours.  

The unit consumes 50 watts per hour when plugged in.  The manufacturer claims it can keep things cool for one to two hours when not plugged in.  Under full sun conditions, the 1KW Emergency Power Briefcase can power this mini-frig for more than 20 hours continuously per day.  During the summer with long summer days, the briefcase can power this mini-frig 24 hours per day.

Technology

The solar cells are the latest highest efficiency back contact solar cells available.  They produce more power than standard silicon cells  plus the cells are extremely rugged.  These cells are 24 percent efficient.  We developed a proprietary encapsulation method to encase the rugged cells to protect them.  Only Solar Power Corp. systems utilizes this technology. 

Our solar panels are just one eight of an inch thick.   Our 120 watt folding panels are rated at 120 watts peak power in optimal conditions.  You get more power per square inch from our solar panels than most panels.  We tested our encapsulated panels for performance.  Under over-cast weather conditions, these amazing panels produce 50 percent of their rated power.  With full sun angles of 45 degrees, they generate about 60 percent of their rated power.  Truly amazing performance for solar panels.

The proprietary computer controller was developed over the last two years by our founder and president Don Golding.  The intelligent controller monitors all aspects of the system optimizing the solar panel, the battery charging plus the load all at the same time.  During the day, the solar panels are generating more that 100 watts per hour nominally (120 watts peak power rating).  The system will power a load during the day plus charge the batteries: all at the same time.  Solar charge controllers with this capability typically cost more than five hundred dollars by themselves.

The powerful lithium battery packs are custom manufactured to our specifications.  These 12 volt 250 watt (20AH) battery packs can supply 20 amps, continuously, 40 amps peak.  The 500 watt (40AH) Solar Power Briefcase has two battery packs supplying 40 amps of continuous power.  The 1KW (80AH) includes four battery packs providing a whopping 80 amps of continuous power.  Use the 1KW system if you want to power a microwave oven.

Emergency Solar Power Briefcases can be connected in parallel for any amount of portable power you need.

The system has an 80 amp auxiliary rated plugs for cascading or for use with very high power loads.

Typical uses:

When camping or at the beach, keep your food cold using a min-fridge - forget the cumbersome ice chest.  Charge two phones directly.  Using an external inverter: charge your power tool batteries, run your laptop or tablet.  You can power any device designed to plug into the car's cigarette lighter.  Heated blankets, coolers, high power spotlights.  A blender and portable cooker are also available.

Take it on the beach with you.

 

Help us build a new company to promote Solar Energy

Solar Power Corp. was founded to design and build innovative new solar products for the masses.  All of our products will include the intelligent controller of my design plus integrated batteries for truly 24/7/365 power.  Manufactured right hear in the USA!

Typical Users:

  1. Homeowners
  2. Preppers
  3. Survivalist
  4. Maritime/Boat Owners
  5. Military
  6. Law Enforcement
  7. EMS
  8. Community Emergency Response Teams (CERT)  
  9. Recreational Vehicle Owners
  10. Off-The-Grid

Risks & Challenges

We don't see any technical challenges with these products since I already developed and tested my technology over the last two years.  I have a great deal of experience in starting high tech companies from scratch.  I have spent the last two years completing the research and development of the technology - most importantly the intelligent controller. 

We have an operating facility for research and development including a complete manufacturing facility to ship many hundreds of products per month.  We are ready for production orders.  I expect to start shipping the first units in September or sooner.

We are using the most advanced solar cells, if disruption in supply occurs in the future this may push back the estimated shipping date.  today they are readily available.  All of the other materials and services are readily available as well. 

Background

My name is Don Golding...

I have started many high tech companies in my career with over 25 years experience as a an entrepreneur/inventor/engineer.  I am tenacious: I love to tackle great challenges.  The bigger the challenge the better.  Currently, designing embedded computer systems including writing the the software for them.  Technical Skills: Electrical Engineering, Programming plus Mechanical Engineering.  We have a research and development area in our building.  I dream up new products, design the electronics, design the physical form factor, then, write the code to make it all work.  My team builds the prototypes and then we test/refine the products.  We have over 3,000 square feet in the same building for manufacturing finished products by the hundreds.

We have five more new and exciting products for the crowdfunding community: I will bring them to you over the next two years all using the sun as their primary power source.  This is why I founded: Solar Power Corp.

A little history

Space-Tek, Inc. (1979-1984) - Developed the first of its kind computer (CAS-1000)  for real-time ultrasound scanners for use with obstetrical exams.   I also developed a real-time scan converter using state-of-the-art components.

Angelus Research Corp. (1990-2002) - I have a passion to build intelligent machines - try to build in intelligence into all products I developed.  I developed a revolutionary new three level Robot OS called: "The Triune OS."  The first product was named "Whiskers" in 1991.   We sold over 2,000 Whiskers intelligent robots mostly in technology education courses across the US and Canada.  Articles:Lights Out Factories, Intelligent motion controller mimics brain's structure

In 1996, I was contracted by Col. John Blitch of US Special Forces to develop a new intelligent man-packable mobile robot to demonstrate small robot capabilities for the US military. 

Solar Power Corp. (2017-current)

I founded this company in order to bring innovative solar power products to the masses.  Working on the core technology needed for new 24/7 sun powered products over the past two years.  We are ready to go into production with our first product:the Emergency Solar Power Briefcase.  I have five more product ideas on the drawing board - stay tuned!

        Other Ways You Can Help

        We came up with a cool T-Shirt to promote solar power.  Consider buying a shirt to promote solar power.  Please tell friends, co-workers and family about this important new product.  It may very well save one of your loved-one's lives, someday.

Angelus Research Corp. (1990-2002) - I have a passion to build intelligent machines - try to build in intelligence into all products I developed.  I developed a revolutionary new three level Robot OS called: "The Triune OS."  The first product was named "Whiskers" in 1991.   We sold over 2,000 Whiskers intelligent robots mostly in technology education courses across the US and Canada.  Articles:Lights Out Factories, Intelligent motion controller mimics brain's structure
In 1996, I was contracted by Col. John Blitch of US Special Forces to develop a new intelligent man-packable mobile robot to demonstrate small robot capabilities for the US military. 
Solar Power Corp. (2017-current)
I founded this company in order to bring innovative solar power products to the masses.  Working on the core technology needed for new 24/7 sun powered products over the past two years.  We are ready to go into production with our first product:the Emergency Solar Power Briefcase.  I have five more product ideas on the drawing board - stay tuned!

Other Ways You Can Help
We came up with a cool T-Shirt to promote solar power.  Consider buying a shirt to promote solar power.  Please tell friends, co-workers and family about this important new product.  It may very well save one of your loved-one's lives, someday.

story:
Short Summary

Back in 1980, I saw a Faraday disk homopolar generator that Bruce DePalma built in California  and then came back all excited to SUNY at Buffalo where I was a grad student. My thesis advisor, Professor Jonathan Reichert accepted my proposal to build one and test it for "back torque" to fulfill the requirements for a Master's Degree in physics, as long as an electrical engineering professor was also on my thesis committee. Ever since then, magnetism has been a real passion of mine in the search for free energy. Spinning electrons (which by the way, never slow down) cause permanent magnetism, so in a real sense, the quantum vacuum's angular momentum (from zero point energy) is giving us a gift which we humans should use, even as Nikola Tesla said (my subsequent book, The Homopolar Handbook, has Tesla's article on the homopolar generator). With the present Spiral Magnetic Motor (SMM) Project, our all-volunteer staffed, 501(c)3 nonprofit research institute is excited to apply a simple energy harvesting, low level flexible solar to power piezo actuators for the stator's magnetic "switcher" or "alternator". Then, as my published journal paper explains, use zero power magnetostrictive-piezoelectric (MS-PZT) actuators with Wiegand wire bundles, and Prof. Laithwaite's "favorable hysteresis" metal plate, or even Polymagnets to further solve the mag-switch commutation issue. For the first time in history, a self-sustaining permanent magnet motor will at least be triggered by energy harvesting with low risk, high payback and off-the-shelf parts, to charge electric vehicles even while they travel. Textbooks prove that societies fail if more concentrated energy is not available as they grow in population. With the latest Nature and MIT journals predicting +5C by 2100 and 50% more people worldwide by 2050, we all need this magnetic energy revolution as soon as possible. I also have learned that years ago, Bulgarian mystic Baba Vanga predicted that in 2018 a "new form of energy" will be discovered, which is probably the use of the magnetic gradient in our SMM. Check out my journal paper and conference slideshow for scientific details on how this clean energy generator can be engineered this year at https://tinyurl.com/SpiralMagMotor and why it is so necessary to accelerate its development and commercial production. I thought that simply publishing all of the secrets to make such a self-powered motor would be enough to bring it to market but it is now apparent that this fundraiser is necessary for our research institute to do the work ourselves. Your help in any way will be deeply appreciated, not only by us but by the countless millions who will be freed from the utility infrastructures that third world countries have trouble building and maintaining. Need we mention that today, 50% of Puerto Rican residents (1.5 million) still have no electricity 100 days after Hurricane Maria? Distributed power is our future, our right, our privilege, our destiny.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need a minimum of $25,000 to rent a separate office that just became available last month in the Sunnyside Building here in Beltsville MD where the IRI office and lab are located to set up parallel test stations for every viable model, use available data acquisition for optimizing the various mag-switching protocols, build larger prototypes as the one-year time frame permits, and assign a volunteer technician to assist with the assembly and testing.
  • Our unique perks are various levels of membership in IRI besides unique product offerings. We always provide gift books, CDs, DVDs, and quarterly newsletters on the best, cutting edge, emerging energy, propulsion, and bioenergetics to our members!
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will still go ahead with the one-year project with any amount of funds raised over $5,000 (one-year's rent) to bring about one or more working permanent Spiral Magnet Motors as possible.

The Impact

The difference that your contribution will make:

  • Our project is extremely valuable to every contributor and to the world because the only way humans will quickly drop fossil fuel CO2 producers is to be offered a superior product at a lower cost that does not pollute AND also produces better performance than the previous product. Billionaire entrepreneur Vinod Kholsa taught us this principle when I attended an invitation-only event in Texas years ago, sponsored by would-you-believe Shell Oil Company.
  • I have directed more than one research facility in the past. I also have a successful track record with recent projects like this and my inventions are online at www.BioenergyDevice.org and www.OsteoPad.org besides the ones from my former company that have already been sold such as an entire electronic test instrumentation line to a former chief engineer of mine who formed his own company which still exists to this day: www.IntegrityDesign.com .
  • Rather than working on more marketable products for health, as mentioned above, I am convinced of the urgency and long-felt need for a clean, self-sustaining energy source and my capability of leading such an endeavor. Many sci-fi movies and science books have shown the extreme value for such a "disruptive" breakthrough and even one calls it a "wild card." 

Risks & Challenges

I'm happy to provide insight into the risks and obstacles we may face on the way to achieving our goal. This is really a low risk and high payback project. The only obstacle is actually the primary goal of avoiding ALL external energy input to overcome the magnetic switching. Our plan for solving these challenges is to start with a proof-of-principle small low light flexible solar panel to power the piezo actuator, both of which we have on the shelf. The plan is then to proceed with confidence in testing the various alternatives for magnetic switching to achieve the same or better performance as in the first model. I used to be a Director of R & D at Scott Aviation years ago and worked most of twenty years at the USPTO in the Test and Measurement, Instrumentation (Class 324) area, so I have seen, researched, and evaluated a lot of technologies with an engineering perspective.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, you folks can still help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Our government is choosing not to develop clean energy, even with dire climate changes happening around us, so private industry, individual states, nonprofit research institutes, and ambitious, courageous people have to take the ball and run with it to the finish line. Use the Indiegogo share tools to help us meet our goal!

story:
When it comes to indoor farming, space is sacred.

Space for plants to grow, space between your plants and the grow lights, space to move around. Unfortunately, the need to condense space has put a damper on what products you can offer. Want to grow tall plants like hops, tomatoes, taller strains of cannabis? Sure, you could spend your free time painstakingly training the plant by hand, but who's got the time?

That's why we created the world's first automatic plant trainer. Trella's device gently trains the plant to grow horizontally while keeping it healthy and free of human contaminants. Plants trained with our device on average grow faster and produce higher yields than plants that have undergone manual training.

The best part? Our device is designed to work with existing setups, whether you're a commercial grower or a craft cultivator. Finally, an automated plant trainer designed to be used on the floor or in-racks, with any grow light or grow media. You control the environment, our device will control the plant.

Now, we're prepared to show our device to the world and bring together a community that's as dedicated to indoor farming as we are.

See It in Action! 

 

What Trella Stands For

No matter who you are or where you come from, you need plants. Every day we use plants for food, scientific use, or healing and medical use. Yet we look around and see a changing world. Arable farmland and outdoor spaces are shrinking every day. 

Indoor farming is the future. But as far as it’s come, it’s still prohibitive for many. It’s expensive, limited by space, and an energy hog to boot. We created Trella Technologies in November 2016 to do our part for the future of farming. We’re not farmers, but a pair of mechanical engineers with a conscience. 

Our mission: make indoor farming accessible, sustainable, and market-friendly through tech-driven solutions.

Meet the Team

Our first mission was inspired by CEO Aja Atwood's troubles with growing tall plants in her own basement. Instead of busting a hole in her ceiling or moving her plants, she researched plant training in-depth. As a mechanical engineer, she was shocked to find that her only option to get those plants in line was to train them manually. In a world with self-driving cars, why can't we have a self-training plant? So, together with co-founder Andres "Dre" Chamorro, they got to work on a prototype.

Aja N. Atwood, CEO

Aja is an entrepreneur, team-leader, and cannabis advocate with over 15 years of experience in the engineering industry. She is a mechanical engineer by education and graduated cum laude from Northeastern University. She cut her teeth professionally as an engineering consultant and specialist, working in natural catastrophe risk engineering, and by 2011 started her first entrepreneurial businesses. Through these experiences, Aja honed her technical skills, fostered the engineering talent of her team, and learned valuable lessons along the way. Aja’s business ethos is rooted in the belief that success comes from creating innovative technologies that can be shared with communities that need them the most.

Andres "Dre" Chamorro III, VP of Engineering

Andres “Dre” Chamorro has over 15 years of experience in engineering a variety of devices all the way from product design to market. He currently holds more than 20 patents, with another 38 pending. Dre is an experienced manager as well and has led teams of engineers and designers through every step of product development. He was a co-founder of Cambridge Endoscopic Devices, Inc. where he developed 29 products for the medical industry.

Where We Are and Where We're Going

We've spent the last two years designing and testing our device, and gathering input from local growers. Now, we’re ready to make our working prototype fully indoor-farm ready. But to do that, we need financial fuel and the help of industrial designers, software engineers to develop our user-interface app, and others to get us to the next level.

This campaign is just the first step. With your help, we'll make a batch of test units for beta testing by growers throughout the community. Then, with their input and guidance, we'll fine-tune our device, and prepare further opportunities for community engagement, and investment.

Creating a Trella Community

This campaign's goal goes far beyond product development and prototypes. We're using this opportunity to open our doors and create a community of growers, techies, and horticulture enthusiasts to join us as we design more innovative projects in the future.

As the Trella community grows, we'll move on to new designs, new products, and address other challenges facing the indoor farming world. Community is key, and a company is nothing if it doesn't give back. This core belief was the seed for the "SXG1" initiative. Through SXG1, we’ll make sure that small community growers aren't out of the technological loop by donating units in proportion to sales.

These donated units will go to qualified growers like state-registered medicinal cannabis caregivers and non-profit urban farmers serving "food deserts".

The Trella Design Team

As a result of this campaign, we’ll be creating the Trella Design Team. Design Team membership takes you to the front lines of our design process and will include backers, techies, members of the vertical farming community, and beta testers. Members get to vote on important issues (including our product's name and branding!),  join exclusive calls with the Trella team, and provide feedback as our products are developed. Join the design process and help our products get better.

The Process So Far

The idea for our plant training device started as a personal project. That was before realizing how much it could help the indoor farming community as a whole. Through building our first two prototypes, we confirmed that automation reduced growth times and increased yield. We've continued making improvements and your contributions will help us make our fifth prototype.

Fundraising Goal

We’re a small (and smart) company and we're using crowdfunding as a way to raise the money we need to share our design for more feedback. We want to ensure that our design meets the needs of our end users, so we decided to spend more time and effort on our Beta testing phase. After successful Beta V1 testing, our device will be production ready. The money you contribute will help us with the following:

  • Cost of goods, materials, and labor for Beta V1 test units.
  • Software development for our user-interface application.
  • Lab equipment for further in-house testing.
  • Social media and marketing efforts to engage with our future users.

The more we raise the more we can accomplish! Check out our Stretch Goal game plan below.

 

Our Perks

FAQs

Q:  What kind of lights does it work with?
A:  All common types such including High-Pressure Sodium (HPS), Ceramic Metal Halide (CMH), and Light Emitting Diode (LED). Our AutoSync LED ™ feature works best with LED lighting.

Q:  Can this work for short plants too?
A:  Yes, our "Small" sized unit is designed for shorter plants and smaller grow tents with a horizontal dimension of 4 ft. in length.

Q:  What kind of grow media does it work with?
A:  All types! You control the environment, and let Trella control the plant. The Trella unit can be used with soil, hydroponic or aeroponic systems.

Q:  Where can I see the device in action?
A:  Watch our time-lapse video to see Trella’s automated plant training technology in action!

Q:  Can I become a beta tester?
A:  Yes! But that depends on the success of this campaign. If we exceed our goal we'll be able to create additional Beta V1 units for further testing and feedback. We're looking for growers of all types (residential, craft, and large commercial) in the US Northeast to assist with our beta testing program.  Interested in beta testing? Be sure to sign up for our mailing list!

Q:  Do I have to prune or trim, etc.?
A:  Pruning and trimming are not required, but we understand every grower has their preference. We suggest starting your first grow without pruning or trimming to learn more about your plant's yield capacity. Regular and typical plant maintenance is suggested. This includes the typical removal of any dead foliage at least weekly to improve ventilation within the plant canopy.

Q:  How many plants can I fit in one device?
A:  One. Our device is designed to make the most out of one plant. This helps to reduce operating costs and materials such as additional soil, nutrients, feeding stations, mother plants, etc.

Q:  When will you be production ready?
A:  With a successful crowdfunding campaign and Beta V1 test round, we'll be ready to provide production units by the third quarter of 2019.

Q:  Can you provide custom sized units?
A:  It's possible! If you're interested in a custom sized unit, please contribute to join the Trella Design Team. We'd like to know your growing requirements to determine a trend. And who knows, we may be able to offer a new sized model based on your design input!

Q:  What are people saying?
A:

story:
In today's gadget-filled world, we all have the constant need to run or charge our electronics. If you spend time outdoors, you already know how frustrating it can be to charge or operate your equipment with lead-acid batteries or cheaply made batteries that are not water or even weatherproof. Until now!

After spending more than 5 years building batteries for our scuba diving and kayak kits, we knew we have the perfect platform to create the ultimate outdoor power bank and thus the creation of the Bixpy PP-166.

Combining long-lasting lithium iron phosphate (LiFepO4) cells encased in a rugged and beautiful housing, intuitive electronic interface, and plenty of connectors to power all your personal electronics, this mighty power pack will power your most intense outdoor activities.

 

 

Packed with features to make sure you have power for all your devices, yet intuitive and simple to use, the Bixpy PP-166 has been designed to provide you with hours of charging or running time no matter where your adventures take you. 

 

We think it's wrong for your battery to look like it came from under the hood of a car.  So we spent just as much time on the outside as we did on the inside. The PP-166 is thoughtfully designed to fit into all those tight and tiny spaces like your kayak hatch, yet so beautifully designed, you'll be proud to have it sitting on your office desk. 

 

​

 

Our lives are now run by personal devices that need charging all of the time. Below is just a simple list of some of the items you can charge using your PP-166 to give you a better idea of what you can expect from this mighty power bank. 

 

Not all devices come with a battery inside. If you spend any time outdoors, you know how frustrating it can be trying to find power for your devices. Now you can stop trying to triage your devices based on which one you think you may need the most. With 166Wh of capacity, you'll be able to run and/or charge multiple devices at the same time for the entire duration of your trip. 

 

The Bixpy SUN45 Solar Panel is the perfect companion to your Bixpy PP-166.  With 45 watts of output from monocrystalline cells, the panel will charge your PP-166 in about 6 to 8 hours.  

This increases the battery's useability infinitely, allowing you to truly go off-grid and have reliable, waterproof, weatherproof, long-lasting power no matter where you are and how long you're out for!


 

The Bixpy PP-166 is covered for defects, failures, and workmanship for 2 years after your purchase. No other battery will give you that peace of mind.  In fact, most lead-acid batteries are guaranteed not to work after two years!

 

We delivered on our first campaign with great success and we'll do it again. Your IndieGoGo contribution with us is a  guaranteed purchase. Our tooling has already been made and the bill of material has been sourced and our first production completed with product ready to ship! If we don't deliver on our promise, we will refund your money, no questions asked.

 

We put the new PP-166 into the hands of some hard-core outdoors folks and asked them for feedback and video testimonials.  We were thrilled by the positive feedback and the awesome testimonials. 

 

 

With 5 years of experience water sealing our SCUBA and kayak batteries, we have given the PP-166 an outer shell that will withstand anything you can throw at it. The PP-166 is waterproof to 100 feet below water - RUNNING!

Dirt, dust, sand, mud, or whatever else you can throw at it, will wash off with a garden hose.  So now, you can spend more time worrying about your equipment and less time worrying about your battery. 

 

To make the outer shell, we have sourced an especially formulated polycarbonate/ABS plastic, infused with UV protective chemicals to make sure your battery is well protected regardless of where your adventures take you. 

 

The PP-166 will run 16 LED lights on your kayak, while running your fish finder, charging your phone AND keeping your fish alive in your bait tank for more than 8 hours. But more importantly, it will not lose power with age, as lead-acid batteries do.  You'll be able to run all of your equipment for years to come. 

 

 

We have a number of perks for early adopters and large orders alike. Our FEEDBACK BACKERS not only get the best deal in town, but they also get to have their input come to life. We will ship the first 65 batteries immediately after we meet our IndieGoGo goal. All we ask in return is that you use your new battery and give us your feedback within 30 days.  We will do everything within our power to implement reasonable and useful suggestions into final production.  For your commitment, you will also receive a $150 gift card to spend at www.bixpy.com*.  And, of course, even the first batch is covered by our 2-year warranty!
 


With experience delivering thousands of Bixpy products, we're ready and have a great handle on our timelines. Our manufacturing partner is ready and has all the tools and parts and components ready to start mass production. We're confident we will deliver on time, if not earlier than indicated. 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Unlike most crowdfunding campaigns, the PP-166 campaign actually has a working, mass production-ready product, boxed and ready to ship. The only thing we're missing is the actual mas numbers.  To be sure the product is ready, we produced 100 units all the way including boxing and packaging.  Out of those units, about 30 have been shipped to some heavy users to verify everything we claim and get some feedback.  The rest will be shipped to our first FeedBack backers immediately after the campaign meets its goal.  Based on immediate feedback from those users, we may make some small changes to the final production, but we're confident the product as is, is an excellent and durable product. Those early adopters will also receive a $150 gift certificate* to shop on our website. 

In addition to our readiness for the PP-166, Bixpy is now a 5-year-old company with a proven track record of delivering complex products to thousands of our users and we have the financing necessary and the resources needed to make sure this project not only succeeds but changes the way the industry looks at making power banks. 

Given the above, we feel the risk of us not being able to deliver is negligible and we're confident we will not only deliver on time but perhaps even early. 

Of course, having said all of this, risks and challenges are part and parcel of any business and certainty in the introduction of a new product. As the recent events with the COVID-19 pandemic have shown, nothing can be taken for granted. However, we know we have the team to navigate very rough waters and deliver an excellent product in a timely manner.  So the risk to our backers is virtually non-existent. 

 

* $150 gift certificate on purchases over $500.00 or toward the purchase of another PP-166 at full retail price once released on our website in October of 2020.

story:
Monster X is a game-changer in the world of generators! Its powerful battery can provide 2,000W of power output, just like a standard wall socket!  And it packs a massive 1,700Wh capacity, which means all your devices will stay powered for hours and hours, so you’ll never be stranded without power. No matter when a blackout happens or when you need to fuel your adventure. Feature 4x fast-charging USB ports, 2x 60W PD USB-C ports plus 4x wall outlets (US or Intl).  Lifetime battery warranty (IGG exclusive)!

The battery of the MONSTER X is extremely dependable. Monster X is equipped with 3C high-rate lithium-ion batteries, which provides higher capacity at the same size.

In the meanwhile, we adopted Tesla's large-rate discharge lithium battery, which can meet the discharge of 3,000 cycles. What's more, a lifetime battery warranty is offered only for you guys on Indiegogo.

 

Don’t be fooled by its size either. This generator is a monster and it definitely has the ‘X’ factor!  The 1700 watt battery is housed in a tough aluminum alloy casing, perfect for all conditions. It has four regular USB ports, two USB-C ports and four wall outlets on both the international and American models. It can power or charge as many as 11 devices simultaneously which can be easily controlled remotely using the Monster X app. 

MONSTER X does the work while you just do your thing. It is able to power anything you could imagine. Laptop, electric saw, Refrigerator, or even a Tesla, just plug in whatever you need to power. Charge or power up to 11 devices at once.

 

You can even use it as an emergency backup for powering your electric vehicles up to 7.5 extra miles on a single charge.  

 

We designed Monster X with convenience in mind. It is both compact and light weight, so you can take it with you no matter where you go. So if you need to take it out into the woods to power your electric saw, you can.

Most of the good electric saws have between a 10-15 amp motor. Running on 110 volts that is between 1,100-1,650 watts of juice without load on it. That's to say,  you can use the electric saw for an hour outside with MONSTER X. 

 

For families who rely on medical devices such like a CPAP machine or a medical fridge, a power outage could be a disaster. But with MONSTER X, you’re always well prepared for the unexpected.

 

MONSTER X is equipped with UPS. An uninterruptible power supply (UPS), offers guaranteed power protection for connected electronics. When power is interrupted, or fluctuates outside safe levels, a UPS will instantly provide clean battery backup power and surge protection for plugged-in, sensitive equipment.

The electronic devices you rely on every day for communication, security and entertainment are at risk for damage and failure due to unexpected blackouts, voltage fluctuations or other power disruptions. A UPS provides battery backup power and protection for electronic devices, including: Computers, Televisions, Security systems Gaming consoles, Mobile devices.

Besides, Independent charging and discharging circuit modules allow MONSTER X charge and recharge simultaneously.

 

You are always well prepared for any power outages with MONSTER X. This is the best backup source for a power outage. It is quiet in operation and maintenance-free. Finally it can give you enough power to run your essential home appliances. Such as refrigerator, coffee maker, electric grill, electric saw or even a Tesla.

 

 

MONSTER X can be recharged through 3 approaches: 200W DC, 400W AC, 200W solar input. Through the three input ways at the same time, it can be loaded to 80% in around 1.5 hours, and to 100% in roughly 2 hours.

A major advantage of alternating current is that its voltage can be modified relatively easily using a transformer, which allows power to be transmitted at very high voltages before being taken down to safer voltages for commercial and residential use. Btw, no adapter is needed as well.

The biggest advantage of DC electricity is that it is easier to store, especially on a small scale. Storing electricity when it is made, for use later when it is needed.

 

Solar power is pollution free and causes no greenhouse gases to be emitted after installation. Reduced dependence on foreign oil and fossil fuels. Renewable clean power that is available every day of the year, even cloudy days produce some power.

 

 

MONSTER X has two universal solar inputs which can meet the general standard of all solar installations in the market. Through solar recharging, MONSTER X can be fully charged within 6 hours, while staying green, healthy and productive.

Powered by the force of Nature, MONSTER X is compatible with any solar panels or installations in the market. Under perfect sunlight and 200W solar input, it can be fully recharged in about 6 hours.

With MONSTER X, you can power everything you need in daily life and work in case of a blackout, or you can go off the grid. Back up your home with a portable solar panel, or directly hook it up with solar installations on the rooftop. MONSTER X can be the reliable generator in an emergency, or the qualified assistant to help you fulfill a green and healthy life.

 

Maximum power point tracking (MPPT) is a tracking technology in electronic form. It uses algorithms and controls circuits to search for the maximum power point, so that the converter circuit can obtain the maximum power from the cell module.

 

Both MONSTER X's battery and structure are very powerful. The 1700Wh battery pack is reinforced by aluminum alloy structure, and protected by ABS+PC shed. You will never need to be concerned when you move it or carry it around.

 

The battery of MONSTER X is reliable and endurable. You could always rely on it. Over a dozen international certificates and safety features ensure the reliability and endurance, such as: Short-Circuit Protection, Battery Overcharge Protection, Output Overcharge Protection, Harsh Temperature Protection and so on.

An intelligent BMS protects your MONSTER X from power surges and overheating, monitoring and alerting you of any sharp changes in temperature.

MONSTER X owns lithium-ion batteries (6 in series), and its state-of-the-art BMS can take full advantage of all series. It can protect any single series from taking too much or too little, so as to maximize the batteries' lifetime and performance.

 

The smart power management system and its sidekick App, through bluetooth, allows you to monitor the Monster X battery whenever. and wherever. You can also turn the outputs on or off as needed.

 

 

 

Our solar panel is made of waterproof oxford cloth and is able to be folded into a smaller size, which makes it more durable, more portable and even lighter. To reach a higher Solar Energy Conversion Rate (22%-25%, much higher than the average rate of 15%), we selected a premium-grade panel and the finest cloth.

 

 

​

 

 

ALLPOWERS was founded in 2008. We are a team composed of experienced designers and engineers with a mission to bring the best power products to everyone. In the past 10 years, we've devoted ourselves to R&D of power products. Based on our professional engineering experts and reliable supply, we are able to create and produce best-in-class products that everyone can enjoy.

ALLPOWERS in CES 2020

MONSTER X is the second campaign we've launched on IGG. We've been rolling out best-selling electronic products for years, like the latest IGG campaign of “Monster: Smartest, Fastest Portable Power Station” which was well delivered thanks to our backers’ support and trust. At the same time, we’ve also helped other brands to design and manufacture.

Our First Campaign on Indiegogo

To maintain the best safety and reliability of our products, ALLPOWERS has passed dozens of international certificates and approvals including CNAS, TUV, FCC, CE, ROSH, SGS, ErP, PSE and UL.

ALLPOWERS in CES 2020

We have spent months developing, testing, prototyping, and even completing the molding before the campaign started. We sincerely invite you to back us to start mass production. For early backers who support us on IGG, you will receive our earnest gratitude and thoughtful post-sales service.

 

The Team has shipped Monster X out to all over the world since October 2020 gradually, here are some pictures of the package and loading. Shipping status will be updated continuously with more and more Monster X shipped out, we appreciate all Backers’ love and support of Monster X! Please stay tuned!

story:
Available in shop.acasis.com

Introducing ACASIS, a Super Fast External M.2 SSD fit for Multiple SSD interfaces and sizes. No matter how many kinds of SSD you have, ACASIS is compatible with them all. Just a normal SSD? ACASIS is also a 10-in-1 Multifunctional Hub to transfer data among all your devices and expand what you want. No more limited device storage and sluggish data transfer. One is All!

 

* Farewell to messy desktop connections; you only need one ACASIS.

 

* To reach maximum read and write speeds of nearly 1,000 MB/s, you need to use M.2 NVMe SSD and transfer through USB 3.1 interface. Performance may vary depending on your device configuration. Test system configuration: inch MacBook Pro, SMI 2263 256G M.2 SSD.

With Up to 1,000MB/s read and write speed, ACASIS performs perfectly and gets 10GB files transferred in only 10 seconds which is 15X faster than your traditional HDD.

Uniquely designed for all kinds of Solid State Drive, ACASIS allows you to change a new SSD card when the old one is full. The installation is Super Easy & Quick—less than one minute—thanks to the Tool-Free Design. The aluminum cover can be easily slid in/out in one smooth motion, and the SSD can be simply inserted without a screw.

ACASIS works with SSD cards of capacity up to 8TB, big enough to store thousands of 1GB files. Compared to other SSD with fixed or much smaller storage capacity, ACASIS enables you to store unlimited data without additional applications or privacy-unfriendly clouds.

The HDMI 4K@60Hz of ACASIS can be used to expand extra displays, perfect for programmers, designers, and videographers to greatly improve working efficiency.

ACASIS’s SD/TF slots allow reading files in two different memory cards at the same time, saving up your time and bringing more convenience.

The USB-C PD port on ACASIS delivers a Max 100 Watts power to your Macbook or other USB-C devices. It means that ACASIS can fast charge your devices while using all the other ports.

 

ACASIS’s 3.1 Gen2 interface and M.2 NVMe/ NGFF technology significantly advance its transfer speed and compatibility. ACASIS is compatible with Mac, Windows and Linux PCs. It also works with Android smartphones and tablets that support Type-C OTG.

ACASIS is absolutely the Smallest and Mightiest SSD Hub for you to carry around as it fits in the palm of your hand and stores tons of data. It is also a perfect everyday carry item being only 5.1oz in weight.

Aluminum Alloy case gives ACASIS a sense of technology and better thermolysis, which ensures a low operating temperature of below 147℉(64℃) even when transferring large amounts of data. Moreover, the corrugated design of SSD cover increases heat dissipation and firm grip. ACASIS is committed to protecting your files and hands.

Superior to traditional HDDs, ACASIS is built to withstand fierce shocks and vibrations. It can survive drops from as high as 10ft. So don’t worry, ACASIS is your best option when it comes to data storage!

ACASIS team will ship every ACASIS hub with Free Silicone Protective Cover for our Indiegogo backers.

 

Packaging 

About US

Founded in 2010, Acasis is devoted to providing users with better technology products and a better experience in the use of digital products. Acasis provides consumers with peripheral products such as computers, smartphones and mobile storage. Acasis produces mobile hard disks, USB HUBs, USB peripheral products and video capture cards. Acasis provides products and services for home users, individual users, digital photography industry, enterprise data management, television advertising production companies, etc. Products of Acasis have passed rigorous quality testing and won several Honorary test certificates such as CCC, CE, FCC, EK, ROHS, PSE, SG, CB and CAS.

 * Farewell to messy desktop connections; you only need one ACASIS. * To reach maximum read and write speeds of nearly 1,000 MB/s, you need to use M.2 NVMe SSD and transfer through USB 3.1 interface. Performance may vary depending on your device configuration. Test system configuration: inch MacBook Pro, SMI 2263 256G M.2 SSD.With Up to 1,000MB/s read and write speed, ACASIS performs perfectly and gets 10GB files transferred in only 10 seconds which is 15X faster than your traditional HDD.Uniquely designed for all kinds of Solid State Drive, ACASIS allows you to change a new SSD card when the old one is full. The installation is Super Easy & Quick—less than one minute—thanks to the Tool-Free Design. The aluminum cover can be easily slid in/out in one smooth motion, and the SSD can be simply inserted without a screw.ACASIS works with SSD cards of capacity up to 8TB, big enough to store thousands of 1GB files. Compared to other SSD with fixed or much smaller storage capacity, ACASIS enables you to store unlimited data without additional applications or privacy-unfriendly clouds.The HDMI 4K@60Hz of ACASIS can be used to expand extra displays, perfect for programmers, designers, and videographers to greatly improve working efficiency.ACASIS’s SD/TF slots allow reading files in two different memory cards at the same time, saving up your time and bringing more convenience.The USB-C PD port on ACASIS delivers a Max 100 Watts power to your Macbook or other USB-C devices. It means that ACASIS can fast charge your devices while using all the other ports. ACASIS’s 3.1 Gen2 interface and M.2 NVMe/ NGFF technology significantly advance its transfer speed and compatibility. ACASIS is compatible with Mac, Windows and Linux PCs. It also works with Android smartphones and tablets that support Type-C OTG.ACASIS is absolutely the Smallest and Mightiest SSD Hub for you to carry around as it fits in the palm of your hand and stores tons of data. It is also a perfect everyday carry item being only 5.1oz in weight.Aluminum Alloy case gives ACASIS a sense of technology and better thermolysis, which ensures a low operating temperature of below 147℉(64℃) even when transferring large amounts of data. Moreover, the corrugated design of SSD cover increases heat dissipation and firm grip. ACASIS is committed to protecting your files and hands.Superior to traditional HDDs, ACASIS is built to withstand fierce shocks and vibrations. It can survive drops from as high as 10ft. So don’t worry, ACASIS is your best option when it comes to data storage!ACASIS team will ship every ACASIS hub with Free Silicone Protective Cover for our Indiegogo backers. Packaging About USFounded in 2010, Acasis is devoted to providing users with better technology products and a better experience in the use of digital products. Acasis provides consumers with peripheral products such as computers, smartphones and mobile storage. Acasis produces mobile hard disks, USB HUBs, USB peripheral products and video capture cards. Acasis provides products and services for home users, individual users, digital photography industry, enterprise data management, television advertising production companies, etc. Products of Acasis have passed rigorous quality testing and won several Honorary test certificates such as CCC, CE, FCC, EK, ROHS, PSE, SG, CB and CAS.

story:
Short Summary

We’re a bunch of New York energy geeks committed to changing the way you shop for energy. We all have energy bills. For most people, it’s our biggest subscription expense—and almost all of us are overpaying. We do have options, like lower price fixed-rate plans. Or planet-saving green energy. But most of us don’t know it, and the big energy companies win out. 

Our website, www.Ratecompare.it is an energy price comparison website which makes it simple to compare energy suppliers and switch to the best plan. We show you the available rates for electricity or natural gas. You pick. We switch you to a better supplier. 5 minutes, and you’ve clawed back value from your local utility monopoly. Or signed up for green energy. And the supplier pays us a commission.
 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $60,000 which will be used to fine tune the rate comparison website and kick-off our initial marketing campaign. Our contributors will be joining a movement of  homeowners empowered to claw back value from their local utility monopoly.  Our perks for contributions include personalized animated and video e-thank you cards, social media shout-outs and Amazon gift cards.

The Impact

Our objective is to educate homeowners about energy choice and motivate them to search for a better energy rate (or for green energy).  RateCompareIt will empower homeowners to save money on their utility bills and help them conserve our planet's precious resources.

Risks & Challenges

A few websites of this type already exist, but their scale remains small. None have achieved a recognizable brand on a national level. So there remains a vast untapped market of people who have no idea that energy choice even exists. We will create awareness and demand by flooding our target market of homeowners with digital messaging in the form of social media content, streaming ads and digital media. We will be the only energy rate comparison site in the market executing such a dynamic marketing strategy and that will be our advantage.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute at this time, you can still help us in our mission to make sure no one overpays for energy again.  Please share our campaign with friends on social media, which can easily be done with the Indiegogo share tools.  Together we can improve the way in which people buy their energy!
