story:
中文   Español    日本語          

Introduction

We've read about it in the papers, we have seen it on T.V., or on Youtube and we may even have heard friends talking about it personally. Some of us may even have used it. 3D printing is an amazing technology for taking your ideas and imagination to real world objects.

Even though some of the media hype has now died off, 3D printing is here to stay and is silently revolutionizing the way we manufacture and consume goods. Now engineers and scientists are trying to figure out how to apply 3D printing to exciting new applications.

We are an international group of engineers and scientists from a variety of backgrounds. Our hope is to take the green revolution to the next step by giving you the power to 3D print your own motors and generators. But that is just the tip of the iceberg. Imagine being able to print using conductive, magnetic and insulating high temperature materials - this could include glass, ceramics and even novel materials such as nano-materials and superconductors. To do this we are developing a new kind of 3D printing process involving electromagnetic sintering.

 

Who Are We?

We have started a project called Sinterbot. Sinterbot was born in Edinburgh, Scotland, where we found some fascinating results during our PhDs that could revolutionize the 3D printing industry. A potentially disruptive idea! An international team of scientists was forged, bringing not only a portfolio of successfully developed projects but also a broad set of engineering, management, commercial and soft skills required to successfully take this idea to reality!

We also started discussing this fascinating idea with multiple UK and international universities, finding synergies and exploring ways to collaborate, and we strengthened ties with key industry partners to better understand their needs and requirements.

 

Goal 1: Printing High Temperature Materials

Currently plastics remain the most common material used with 3D printers. For a price, it’s also possible to print certain kinds of metal parts, but these metal prints are expensive. Moreover, understanding how the 3D printing process may change their properties still remains a significant challenge!

Plus, most finished products require a combination of materials such as ceramics, glass and more. Such materials are still challenging to print. What if you could print these high temperature materials? How would it change the world? What would you do with such a technique?

Our project will try to develop a kind of general purpose 3D printing technology based on electromagnetic sintering.  We want to refine a technique that can be used to print high temperature materials such as glass, ceramics and even other novel materials such as superconductors.  

 

Goal 2: Electrical Machines, Generators & Motors

We are passionate about renewable power generation. Especially now with the high risk of climate change at our doorstep, we need solutions that can reduce our carbon footprint and we need to build infrastructure that can help us achieve a low carbon future.

Therefore, as our primary application, our project wants to answer the following questions: Can electrical machines such as motors and generators be 3D printed using our process? And, if so, how good are these printed machines and materials for real world applications? In a few words... We want to produce a 3D printing process and related materials to produce electrical machines! Machines like the one you see below.

The production of these machines is challenging. Not least because such motors and generators are composed of conductive, magnetic and insulating materials that require specific control of their structural properties to be efficient. We need your help to understand whether our approach can achieve this result.

The risk is high, but the payoffs are big. We might have the possibility of printing out not only generators and motors but more basic components from inductors to transformers as well.

 

Goal 3: Video Production

This project firmly lies in the realm of research. But we don’t want you to go empty handed. We have decided to dedicate a portion of our time to documenting our research and showing you the exciting world of research and a chance to discover the good and the challenges of how scientific research unfolds.

We want to be complete transparent, however. Video production requires a huge amount of time and commitment on its own. None of us are professional video producers. And we want to focus as much effort and expertise on the engineering and science. We will try our best to show you real research in action though!

 

Technology Impact

If you are technically minded, you are probably wondering how being able to print motors and generators can help with sustainable development and climate action. And further, you might be wondering what advantage there is to having a 3D printing process for electrical machines?

The current approach to manufacturing electrical machines is long and complicated. It requires extensive logistics support and multiple levels of industry. None of this is particularly environmentally friendly nor is it particular efficient when trying to produce small quantities of unique machines for unique applications. Just look at the complexity of the current manufacturing chain in the diagram above. We propose to simplify this chain as shown below.

 

There are advantages to our approach

  • Our 3D printing process could not only change how the supply chain works now for companies, but also at the global scale! Imagine if final products were manufactured locally. It could hugely decrease the carbon emissions associated with long-distance shipping!
  • Do you want more? Imagine how fast new technologies can progress from research to commercialization if we can easily 3D print prototypes! Right now just producing a single small prototype machine can cost up to a thousand pounds.
  • And ... our process is only powered by electricity, so that means no fossil fuels are needed to manufacture electrical machines... This means that we could be powered by carbon free electricity generated from renewable sources!

 

Our Technical Approach

Now looking further at the technical aspects of what our project involves. We have a very ambitious route ahead of us that involves work on soft matter research, fused deposition modelling and extrusion research, powdered and clay metallurgy, electromagnetic physics and CNC data processing and slicing related computation. Wherever possible we will use open source tools and will make our own work available open source. Our goal is to make this approach available to you, the public, as soon as possible.  

Below is a block diagram of roughly the range of research that has to take place. Your contributions will get us part of the way, but not all the way to the end result.

 

How Will Your Money Be Used?

We want to be completely honest here... We would be lying if we tell you that at the end of this project we will have a 3D printer capable of manufacturing generators for wind turbines or motors for electric vehicles ... But, we are confident that we can make huge steps towards this aim and if we manage to raise 80,000 GBP, we think that we could develop the following innovations (apologies if this sounds too geeky :) ):

  • Formulate a range of FDM printable magnetic, conductive, insulating and susceptor materials and characterize their electromagnetic properties. These materials would form the basis to be able to print electrical wiring and produce electrical insulation (e.g. glass). Plus, we could make a case for further research and commercial funding using the data we collect. Not only this, but artists and engineers alike would potentially be able to use these base materials using modified commercial 3D printers with clay extrusion capabilities.
  • Use a electromagnetic furnaces to sinter multiple materials and analyse their electromagnetic and structural properties. This process would give you the chance to discover how to use our materials at home to produce unique artistic works. But more, this would allow us to demonstrate that our technique has serious possibilities for the sustainable future of the world.
  • Develop a fused deposition modelling (FDM) methodology based on CAD models to print and sinter multiple materials in a single manufacturing process. FDM is the basis of the plastic 3D printers that are available right now in the commercial market.

In the unfortunate case that we do not reach our funding goals, what then? We will make the best use of the resources to develop some of the innovations listed above!  

Note that some small percentage of the earnings from this campaign will go towards providing our videographer with an honorarium for his pro-bono professional effort for producing the video for this campaign.

 

Are There Any Challenges?

Of course, we know this is not an easy job... The main challenge that we face is that we're bringing together work in different scientific fields such as electromagnetics materials, extrusion techniques, electromagnetic sintering and electrical machines.

How are we tackling this? Well, we can separate the different activities in the process from each other, that is, if a novel technique does not give us a useable output, we substitute it with a more established technique!

We haven't forgotten health & safety related challenges... But these will be mitigated by following procedures for risk assessment and safety training!

And perhaps the most important... We keep in mind the commercial challenges involved with innovative projects, but we've already started searching and approaching clients and investors, and we will produce more video media to continue spreading the word!

 

Perks: What Do You Get For Your Investment?

So, it is a nice feeling to know that your money will help developing something that is going to lead towards a more sustainable future, isn't it? But, if that might not be enough, we have designed a number of perks that will ensure that you get a good value to your investment.

  • Join our Sinterbot Community to ensure that you are up to date with the progress of our project while learning fascinating things about 3D printing. Not to mention that we will acknowledge your support at our community page and future video work we do!
  • Get a Sinterbot Keychain and hold proudly a symbol of your support to this amazing new scientific endeavour!
  • With the Sinterbot limited edition T-Shirt, you will be able to show off you support for science!
  • The Microwave Experimenter Book will show what crazy, weird and wonderful things you could do with a microwave at home!
  • Get an Online 3D Printing Lesson, and let our expert show you for 2 hours the magics of 3D printing and go through all the steps to 3D print a desktop object!
  • With the perk Professional Video Request, you will sponsor a video that will cover the 3D printing topic you have been aching to find out about for ages!

The last two perks require significant time and resources, and although we would like to deliver them asap, it is physically impossible! We will agree with the supporter a suitable delivery date, but our idea is to deliver them all before the estimated delivery date!

 

Before you go...

We want to thank you for having reached this point and we hope that you find our project as interesting as we do!

We really encourage you to support us on this great adventure towards the development of a new 3D printing process! However, we understand that sometimes it might not be possible to fund us, and that is okay! We would be very grateful if you could share this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools with anyone that you think would be interested in what we're doing!

story:
Features Of The Wallet

  • Genuine high quality leather
  • 3000mAh fast charging, slim Lithium Polymer power bank
  • Supports both Lightning (iPhone) and microUSB (most Android and other devices)
  • Can be charged by both Lightning and microUSB
  • Special pocket suitable for use as a phone cover. Can comfortably fit 5.5" cellphones
  • Special internal pocket for TF/SD and SIM cards
  • Credit card pockets with RFID protection
  • Two cash pockets
  • Charge your phone while it's inside the special phone pocket

Our History and the Brief

  • We are a group of engineers with loads of experience in many different industries, including Electronics, Logistics and Technical Sales. We decided to develop a stylish, functional wallet for the discerning business person.
  • We always felt ourselves getting nervous as our phone battery ticked below 30% at around 5pm, and knowing it would never last the rest of the day. Switching on power saving modes and restricting the use of many features to try to eek out the last bit of battery time when charging just isn't possible. The only option till now has been a bulky power bank and unwieldy cable. Not any longer!
  • The main purpose of this campaign is to launch our own business, starting small and scaling up, but always maintaining the highest quality and best design.
  • We have went through multiple prototypes to arrive at our final design, and the prototypes are fully functional, ready to advance to larger production.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • All funds will be used for office rent, for creators and project managers, for visiting factories, evaluating suppliers, and for product testing.
  • We have spent considerable money to produce 4 different samples, finally choosing this one as it meets the design brief the best.
  • If we manage to hit our target we will continue to develop this and further models, including USB Type-C and wireless charging options.
  • This wallet you can use as standard wallet and/or smartphone cover. It also has enough space inside to hold an additional slim power bank should you be like us and forget to charge the power bank!
  • If we don't reach the target we will refund the entire amount to you, so you can rest easy about your potential investment.

The Impact

If you support us in this campaign it will help us in the following ways:

  • we produce a market ready, luxurious, stylish accessory for the discerning customer (you)
  • we continue to develop stylish and useful designs in the future
  • we will research new useful technologies such as GPS tracking and wireless charging
  • it will allow us to develop new and existing supplier relationships, ensuring good supply chain management
  • it will help us to develop customer relationships and trust as well as brand awareness

Risks & Challenges

The risks we have identified are quite limited, and are as follows:

  • Supply chain issues causing delays. These can be minimised or avoided by close, careful supplier relationships, and having backup options in the event of problems occuring
  • Marketing strategy. The biggest problem in this area is selecting the best route to market, but we will be diligent in our market research before committing to a particular route.
  • There is absolutely no risk to you. If we don't make the target we don't produce the items and you get a full refund. If we get the target you will get your awesome, stylish, useful wallet and power bank. It's a win-win!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, but want to help you can do so in the following ways:

  • Share our campaign. The more people who see it the more people who could possibly contribute
  • Look out for our social media posts
  • Support our brand if/when we launch to the retail market
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools

Weights and Dimensions

Power Bank. Weight - 85g. Dimensions - L137xW67xH5.6mm

Brown Wallet. Weight - 105g. Dimensions - L190xW100xH20mm

Black Wallet. Weight - 120g. Dimensions - L190xW100xH20mm

 

FAQ

  • Can I order more than one wallet? Yes. There is a twin pack available, or make your own bundle with the individual options.
  • How many cards can fit in the wallet? There are 6 separate card pockets in the wallet.
  • Is there a coin pouch? There is no specific pouch for coins, but you can store whatever you like in the zipped pocket.
  • How long does it take to charge the powerbank? In our experience it can take around 2-3 hours depending on the charger. 
  • Can I remove the powerbank? Yes, the powerbank is removable. It simply slips in and out of the dedicated powerbank pocket.
  • How will I know if the powerbank needs charged? The inbuilt indicator on the powerbank will alert you if it is low on charge.
  • Which kind of usb cable I need to charge Powerbank? Powerbank can be charged with both lightning or micro-USB cable.
  • How durable is the wallet? It is made from genuine luxury leather, so with the correct care it is expected to last a lifetime.
  • Is the powerbank susceptible to overheating? This powerbank and wallet were designed to work very well with each other. The powerbank itself is from a very reputable manufacturer with all the required safety and standards certificates, and complies with IATA regulations for taking batteries/powerbanks on planes.
story_txt:
Features Of The Wallet
Genuine high quality leather
3000mAh fast charging, slim Lithium Polymer power bank

Supports both Lightning (iPhone) and microUSB (most Android and other devices)
Can be charged by both Lightning and microUSB

Special pocket suitable for use as a phone cover. Can comfortably fit 5.5" cellphones

Special internal pocket for TF/SD and SIM cards

Credit card pockets with RFID protection

Two cash pockets
Charge your phone while it's inside the special phone pocket
Our History and the Brief
We are a group of engineers with loads of experience in many different industries, including Electronics, Logistics and Technical Sales. We decided to develop a stylish, functional wallet for the discerning business person.
We always felt ourselves getting nervous as our phone battery ticked below 30% at around 5pm, and knowing it would never last the rest of the day. Switching on power saving modes and restricting the use of many features to try to eek out the last bit of battery time when charging just isn't possible. The only option till now has been a bulky power bank and unwieldy cable. Not any longer!
The main purpose of this campaign is to launch our own business, starting small and scaling up, but always maintaining the highest quality and best design.
We have went through multiple prototypes to arrive at our final design, and the prototypes are fully functional, ready to advance to larger production.
 What We Need & What You Get 
All funds will be used for office rent, for creators and project managers, for visiting factories, evaluating suppliers, and for product testing.
We have spent considerable money to produce 4 different samples, finally choosing this one as it meets the design brief the best.
If we manage to hit our target we will continue to develop this and further models, including USB Type-C and wireless charging options.
This wallet you can use as standard wallet and/or smartphone cover. It also has enough space inside to hold an additional slim power bank should you be like us and forget to charge the power bank!
If we don't reach the target we will refund the entire amount to you, so you can rest easy about your potential investment.
The ImpactIf you support us in this campaign it will help us in the following ways:
we produce a market ready, luxurious, stylish accessory for the discerning customer (you)
we continue to develop stylish and useful designs in the future
we will research new useful technologies such as GPS tracking and wireless charging
it will allow us to develop new and existing supplier relationships, ensuring good supply chain management
it will help us to develop customer relationships and trust as well as brand awareness
Risks & ChallengesThe risks we have identified are quite limited, and are as follows:
Supply chain issues causing delays. These can be minimised or avoided by close, careful supplier relationships, and having backup options in the event of problems occuring
Marketing strategy. The biggest problem in this area is selecting the best route to market, but we will be diligent in our market research before committing to a particular route.
There is absolutely no risk to you. If we don't make the target we don't produce the items and you get a full refund. If we get the target you will get your awesome, stylish, useful wallet and power bank. It's a win-win!
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute, but want to help you can do so in the following ways:
Share our campaign. The more people who see it the more people who could possibly contribute
Look out for our social media posts
Support our brand if/when we launch to the retail market
Use the Indiegogo share tools
Weights and DimensionsPower Bank. Weight - 85g. Dimensions - L137xW67xH5.6mmBrown Wallet. Weight - 105g. Dimensions - L190xW100xH20mmBlack Wallet. Weight - 120g. Dimensions - L190xW100xH20mm FAQ
Can I order more than one wallet? Yes. There is a twin pack available, or make your own bundle with the individual options.

How many cards can fit in the wallet? There are 6 separate card pockets in the wallet.

Is there a coin pouch? There is no specific pouch for coins, but you can store whatever you like in the zipped pocket.

How long does it take to charge the powerbank? In our experience it can take around 2-3 hours depending on the charger. 
Can I remove the powerbank? Yes, the powerbank is removable. It simply slips in and out of the dedicated powerbank pocket.

How will I know if the powerbank needs charged? The inbuilt indicator on the powerbank will alert you if it is low on charge.

Which kind of usb cable I need to charge Powerbank? Powerbank can be charged with both lightning or micro-USB cable.

How durable is the wallet? It is made from genuine luxury leather, so with the correct care it is expected to last a lifetime.

Is the powerbank susceptible to overheating? This powerbank and wallet were designed to work very well with each other. The powerbank itself is from a very reputable manufacturer with all the required safety and standards certificates, and complies with IATA regulations for taking batteries/powerbanks on planes.

story:
I am an avid gardener and a disciple of wilderness.

I have traveled far and wide in search of my piece of mind. After realizing I could only find this within my self and the environment which I create, I returned to my home. In Bulgaria I steadily started growing trees for wildlife refuge and food while forming a network of a like minded collective. We participated in several courses and have been issued certificates for Permaculture Design and Teachers certificates for Permaculture. These certificates are really meaningless unless we dive into the world of nature and understand what it is all about: the symbiosis, the movement of nutrients, water, resources, complex and efficient functionality of the ecosystems, the importance of each species in every system, including us, the people. We humbly believe that forests do not need us to thrive, but we certainly need them. Yet, as part of the ecosystem we can be very useful for all their components: enrichment, diversify, care, cultivate and much more. Meanwhile, forests play a different role in our systems:

 Importance of living trees and forests in our environment
    A. Regulates temperatures
        1. Humidity levels
        2. Annual Rain Fall
        3. Seasons
    B. Oxygen production
    C. Absorb carbon dioxide. 
    D. Supports other forms of life
        1. Providing shelter
        2.  Food (leaves, fruits, nuts)
    E. Soil fertilizing
        1. Symbiosis with fungi and bacteria
        2. Drop tons of biomass annually to create new topsoil

This campaign means so much to us because every year billions of tons of forests are cut down for consumables like toilet paper, newspapers, fiber, building materials, mulch, and probably the worst of all: burning wood for heat. It's really a shame to cut down such slow growth so fast.

With your help, we will have the means to plant the listed below proposed species, which are renewable perennial crops. They are planted once and regrow after harvests, have high biomass production, and low nutrient content and high cellulose values (optimal for fuel). We will cultivate these species for an alternative source of cellulose and biomass for everyday consumables.


A. Paulownia Shan-Tong
        1. Fast growing tree
            a. Grows 3 meters per year
            b. No need to replant
            c. Regrows fast after harvest 
      2. Timber is light(low transport costs)
      3. Suitable for combustion
      4. Low nutrient and sap content
      5. Cons 
           a. Fragile when young, winds can break trees from base first years

(Our own Paulownia trees already growing tall)

  B. Mischantus giganteus
        1. Fast growing grass
            a. Grows 3 to 6 meters
            b. Regrows annually after harvest
            c. High biomass profile (20-26000 kg per hectare)
            d. Low nutrient content
        2. Fiber
            a. Bio-construction
            b. Textiles
            c. Bio Bricks,
            d. Insulation
       3. Carbon Sequestration 
            a. Captures and stores atmospheric carbon dioxide long term 
        4. Cons
            a. Full maturity and optimal biomass production starting at 3 years of age
            b. High mortality rate at 1st year due to frost

C. Helianthius tuberosus (Sunchoke, Jerusalem artichoke)
        1. Perennial vegetable tuber
        2. Vigorous growth up to 3 meters 
            a. High biomass profile (16-20,000 kg. of tubers/hectare;18-28,000 kg of foliage/hectare)
        3. Fiber
            a. Bio-construction
            b. Textiles
            c. Bio-Bricks,
            d. Insulation
        4. High sugar content
            a. Ethanol production
            b. Fodder
        5. Cons
            a. Invasive

(View of sunroot (Jerusalem Artichoke) flower-heads, framed against sky. Photographed by Paul Fenwick, 19th March 2005.)


    D. Pennisetum purpureum (Napier Grass, Uganda Grass, Elephant grass)
        1. Perennial grass with many applications
            a. High biomass profile (20-26000 kg per hectare)
            b. Quality fodder for bovine animals and other herbivores
            c. Push Pull Pest management strategy
            d. Shoots and young leaves fit for human consumption
        2. Fiber
            a. Bio-construction        
            b. Textiles
            c. Bio-bricks
            d. Insulation
        3. Carbon sequestration
            a. Captures and stores atmospheric carbon dioxide long-term
        4. Cons
            a. Full maturity and optimum biomass production starting at 3 years of age
            b. High mortality at 1st year due to frost

What we need:

7200 Euros for initial 3 hectares (including one-time investment for technology and genetic material)

Technology:

Shredder: 1500 Euros

Press: 1000 Euros

Genetic material: (roots, cuttings, seeds, tubers)

Miscanthus and Napier Grass rhizomes: 5000 Euros

Paulownia Shan-Tong: 500 Euros

Helianthus tuberosus roots: 200 Euros

There is immediate and direct impact on why this project should be realized. Although some of the cultures will have to grow for several years, a lot can be done during this time:

       Opportunities for cultural development:
Beautifully designed, a labyrinth will be created within the planted lands to provide an alternative source for recreation and education. In the labyrinth there will be a simple café, an educational center and a playground for children and families.  There the whole family can relax, grow and be inspired by ecological design and principles.

      Reforest the Earth initiative:
We're going to dedicate a piece of land for a wildlife sanctuary. For every cubic meter of produced biomass, we will plant a tree or shrub in this space and promote wildlife diversity. We will seek support from citizens and local government to replant forests and create more protected areas while providing environmental energy solutions.

 

We ask you to support our project. Spread the word, volunteer, donate. We know that everything is possible and we plan to prove it.
Once we start planting in the spring of 2019 we will need helping hands to plant all our grasses, tubers and new trees. Thriving with ecological solutions will guide us to a cleaner life together.

Of course, if you can't physically be there to help us you can always donate and support us. 
For every donation of 10 Euros we will plant a tree in our wildlife sanctuary with your name.
For every donation of 50 Euros we will plant a square meter of perennial flowers and shrubs with your name. 
For every donation of 100 Euros will donate a cubic meter of ecological burning of briquettes to a local family in need.


If we don't get the funding we need, we will persist. The first investment will be to plant perennial grasses, and then the trees. The shredder and press will also be important once the crops have grown.

We care of our future, and we are tired of talking about it. It's easy to point fingers at things that are wrong, but it's another game, all together, to start formulating decisions and realizing them. Our decision is at the core, it deals with the foundations of our existence. Truly sustainable energy, enriching the environment and promoting cleaner air. We can co-exist with the giant forests by protecting them and promoting more diversity by growing energy crops that provide many uses and regrow each year after harvests.

Some risks that may hinder us, but will not stop our progress, is to not get the funding we need. In this case, We would self-propagate all of the genetic material through rhizomes and stem cuttings. It takes a lot of time, especially for the 10,000 plants per hectare. Regardless, I have experience and have been successful in clowning my own Paulownia plantation. Of the 50 roots I originally bought, I have multiplied the energy forest of more than 200 trees in 4 years. 

Share our dream of  growing new old-growth forests and minimizing deforestation through Ecological Energy Solutions.

story:
We are living in time of the global climate change which can cause extreme and devastating weather conditions (extreme cold, wet or hot weather) causing droughts and floods and enormous damage to the local community, economy, agriculture and infrastructure. Agriculture or food production is specially sensitive to these weather extremes as months of care, hard work and investment can be annihilated over night.

Our team developed AquaSol device that can regulate local micro-climate conditions using proven basic principles of the physics. AquaSol is basically self regulating device which is activated when temperature and air is getting too cold or too hot protecting large agriculture areas from damage caused by weather extremes.

 

 

Basic operating principles

 

When air is too cold and dry AquaSol device performs air ionization which dilutes cold air causing temperature and moisture of the air in surroundings to raise.

When air is too hot and wet AquaSol device performs water and air dissociation which lowers moisture from air and lowers temperature of air producing colder climate.

AquaSol is essentially big outdoor AC (air conditioner unit) which can protect large surrounding area from weather extremes keeping temperature, moisture and air quality in optimal range. 

This process is achieved using electrostatic geomagnetic phenomena by producing electrostatic voltage of few thousands Volts and basics principles of air/fluid flow physics based on the Bernoulli's principle and Venturi effect. With this clever design AquaSol device consumes only 550W of electrical power using one small water pump and fan.

To achieve all these design goals (large working capacity, large area coverage and small power consumption) AquaSol device is designed as large tower with small cascades/holes on tower body with total dimension: 2m diameter and 6m height.

One AquaSol tower can protect around 10 Ha of the land.

 

Other benefits

 

AquaSol is using negative ionization of the air which removes harmful static electricity. Harmful static electricity is product of the electromagnetic radiation of the cell towers, power lines, and other electric devices and infrastructure. This kind of pollution is growing each day in our modern technology oriented society.

AquaSol is using convection type of air flow and negative ionization which actually refreshes and purifies air from smell, impurities, bacteria and viruses better then any other air purifier on the market.

Producing large amount of negatively ionized air AquaSol is filling surrounding ground with negative – dynamic electricity (the eﬀect of the constant spring) causing food crops to be more fruitful.

 

Working prototype

 

After years of experimenting we developed small scale prototype of AquaSol tower device. This prototype is currently being tested in our workshop/laboratory and it proves to achieve all of our goals. Prototype AquaSol tower dimensions are:  0.3m diameter and 1m height. Prototype successfully managed to clean and refresh air in our workshop which is regularly contaminated with impurities and smell as byproduct of our working process (producing rubber & steel products). Prototype managed to successfully clean about 800 cubic meter of air per hour proving its large potential.

This also proves that smaller version of the AquaSol tower device can be used indoor to regulate and purify air in large industrial halls, airports and other places with high ceiling which is requirement for AquaSol device to function properly.

 

Why we need funding?

 

Prototype unit that we have built is currently to small to be tested outdoor on the field. We are starting this campaign to be able to manufacture and deploy first full scale outdoor AquaSol tower device.

Prototype proved to be meet all of our design goals so we do not expect any problems as functionality of this device is largely dependent on the dimensions (height) of the tower.

Funds will be used to make all necessary  preparations for serial production of AquaSol tower devices. This includes production of special molds for making AquaSol towers.

 

Our dream, our mission, our goal

 

We are group of inventors and engineers from Zagreb, Croatia. We are interested in developing and practical use of green technology systems which promotes health, ecology and support sustainable economy reducing negative impact of human civilization and technology on our planet Earth.

We feel that AquaSol tower can have large beneficial influence on the human society by protecting agriculture areas, food production, local community and infrastructure. This device is quick solution that can help us overcome at least some of the negative effects of overwhelming pollution that we are currently producing. We hope that consciousnesses of the mankind will rise and that technology progress will not be based on the pollution rather on the care for the environment and for any living being. AquaSol tower is just small step toward that vision of the future world in which we want to live

story:
We have come together to launch the Unearth Biochar environmental operation in WA and hope to see our state become the national industry leader for the worldwide biochar movement.

We want to start up the nation’s first carbon sequestration ‘farm’ using the most sustainable machinery on the world market to convert organic matter into biochar.

Our plan is to sequester carbon into the earth on our property in Gingin, Western Australia, using on-farm biomass.

We want to be carbon-negative, in order to contribute to the reduction of the 16.3 metric tonnes that Australia emits per capita each year (2015 figure).

Research shows that for every one kilo of biochar made, about 50 per cent of that represents carbon that is no longer going into the atmosphere.

That’s half a kilo that is now useful carbon, going into the ground and fertilising the soil, and not being used to make carbon dioxide.

That’s a lot kilos of Carbon, essentially being taken out of the air, and going back into the ground where it can be beneficial to the health of the soil. 

This is where you - the environmentally-conscious and carbon emission-aware members of the community come into the picture! 

Your donation will contribute towards carbon sequestration in the soil; the restoration of the degraded river system; and the removal of non-indigenous plant species and woody weeds.

We've been trying with our own resources for many years, but we are now at the stage where we want to invite the wider environmental community to help us.

Please tell your friends, family and all you know about our cause and ask them to take part - because no matter where you are in the world, we all need to work towards reducing our Carbon footprint.

For more information about the wonders of biochar, visit our Unearth Biochar facebook page.

What We Need & What You Get

We have access to 150 acres of riverland which is degraded. It is infested with woody weeds and the river system is choked by pines, preventing the endemic trees and vegetation from growing.  We want to restore the river area back to its original state. All this material can be processed into biochar and energy. 

We don't wish to clear and burn this off, causing carbon emissions. Rather, we want to sequester the carbon in the best possible way, returning it to the earth where it belongs.

So, the world was searched for the best technology that fitted our criteria of:

  • safety and ease of operation 
  • output and carbon capture
  • it must have no emissions and capture all products it produces (we have decided, but cannot for commercial and IP reasons reveal the name of our choice)
  • We also require some heavy plant/equipment i.e excavator to carry out minor land works;
  • A shed
  • Aquaculture pond liners/irrigation
  • Consumables

The biochar will be sequestered on our property and used to enhance our soils, or given to organic farmers and and producers who wish to use it on their properties instead of chemical fertilisers. 

In future, we plan to provide an opportunity for study groups, research and educational institutions to study environmental outcomes. 

If we don't succeed in reaching our entire goal this time around, this will not be seen as a failure.

We will still see this as a step forward from which to launch the next stage of our campaign to develop a viable environmental project. We can still take a great step forward to reach the next level in our goal. 

We invite anyone who believes in our cause to join us. We acknowledge not everyone owns land, a farm or garden, but now there is an opportunity to be part of the 'carbon for the planet' movement and be a party to the amazing story of biochar and the benefits it can bring. 

You can help us to achieve our goals and be on board with your beliefs anytime you want to - the subscription never ends on carbon sequestration! 

Together, we can start reversing some of the climate change damage that has been done to our world.

The Impact

We have 150 acres of riverland in Gingin, Western Australia which has various soil types, native trees; and a fully-matured decommissioned pine plantation. The property has excellent growing potential, and empty ponds which can later be used for aquaculture.

We want to develop biochar for the soil; aquaculture for fish/crustacea and nutrients production; and agriculture - combining all these resources to create a natural synergy between land use and activity.

Risks & Challenges

We have been toiling to 10 years, using our own resources to clean up a degraded and damaged farming property and producing our own biochar. This is not a commercial venture, it has been an environmental venture. It was always about restoring the land to its best condition.  We want to create a synergy between the various activities that can be done there - aquaculture, organic farming and horticulture. 

We have come a long way. But now we want to step up and finish the task. It has always come down to a lack of available capital to achieve the desired outcome. This is why we now what to invite people who care about carbon emissions, soil health, food security and sharing ideas on sustainability to participate, and you don't have to be a land-owner or end user to be involved.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. We would love you to spread the word about our campaign, by using our Indiegogo share tools.

  • Also, please 'like' our Unearth Biochar page on facebook - the more people in the world who get on board, the better!

Thanks a lot :)
story_txt:
We have come together to launch the Unearth Biochar environmental operation in WA and hope to see our state become the national industry leader for the worldwide biochar movement.
We want to start up the nation’s first carbon sequestration ‘farm’ using the most sustainable machinery on the world market to convert organic matter into biochar.
Our plan is to sequester carbon into the earth on our property in Gingin, Western Australia, using on-farm biomass.
We want to be carbon-negative, in order to contribute to the reduction of the 16.3 metric tonnes that Australia emits per capita each year (2015 figure).
Research shows that for every one kilo of biochar made, about 50 per cent of that represents carbon that is no longer going into the atmosphere.
That’s half a kilo that is now useful carbon, going into the ground and fertilising the soil, and not being used to make carbon dioxide.
That’s a lot kilos of Carbon, essentially being taken out of the air, and going back into the ground where it can be beneficial to the health of the soil. 
This is where you - the environmentally-conscious and carbon emission-aware members of the community come into the picture! 
Your donation will contribute towards carbon sequestration in the soil; the restoration of the degraded river system; and the removal of non-indigenous plant species and woody weeds.
We've been trying with our own resources for many years, but we are now at the stage where we want to invite the wider environmental community to help us.
Please tell your friends, family and all you know about our cause and ask them to take part - because no matter where you are in the world, we all need to work towards reducing our Carbon footprint.
For more information about the wonders of biochar, visit our Unearth Biochar facebook page.

What We Need & What You Get

You can help us to achieve our goals and be on board with your beliefs anytime you want to - the subscription never ends on carbon sequestration! 
Together, we can start reversing some of the climate change damage that has been done to our world.

This is not a commercial venture, it has been an environmental venture. It was always about restoring the land to its best condition.  We want to create a synergy between the various activities that can be done there - aquaculture, organic farming and horticulture. 
We have come a long way. But now we want to step up and finish the task. It has always come down to a lack of available capital to achieve the desired outcome. Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. We would love you to spread the word about our campaign, by using our Indiegogo share tools.
Also, please 'like' our Unearth Biochar page on facebook - the more people in the world who get on board, the better!
Thanks a lot :)

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Damien, and I've been a beekeeper for ten years. As a professional beekeeper, I work closely with bees and I care about the preservation of biodiversity.

In my daily work, I give companies the opportunity to host hives on their sites and I teach young people in order to raise their awareness and convey my passion for bees to them. The greatest problem I encounter in my work is the limitations imposed by the use of the smoker and the harmful effects it has on bees and on the environment.

That is why I am seeking to develop my beekeeping practices.

After many years of research and teamwork I can now present you with an alternative solution to this essential tool: the Apisolis vaporizer.

 

Beekeepers (amateurs and professionals) are often faced with the need to use a smoker.

The use of the smoker is an ancestral practice based on the slow combustion of many fuels which triggers a conditioned reaction in the bees.This practice is somewhat inconsiderate and stressful for the bees. In addition, smoke residues from the wide variety of fuels are harmful to the beekeeper's health (respiratory tract) and are likely to be found in the hive's products.

 

The answer to these limitations was to create the Apisolis vaporizer: a more convenient, safer tool which is better for bees, for the environment and for people.

Apisolis emits only a simple, natural vapour at a temperature of less than 35°, which is respectful to the bees. There are no PAH or fine particle emissions.

 

Comparison chart

Several scientific studies (1) have concluded that the burning of wood and plants can release toxic substances into the environment: particulate matter (PM), polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) and volatile organic compounds (VOCs).

Although smoking is a traditional practice, in the light of current knowledge it seems wise to be more concerned about the state of the environment and to be aware that these various toxic substances present the environment can then be found in products from hives.

The "NATIVE" formula by Apisolis consists of a base which permits steam to be generated. This base is derived from the processing of organically farmed corn syrup and is polypropylene glycol free. The rest of the formula consists only of essential oils from organically farmed plants. All the components are organically sourced and designed to respect the environment and the health of beekeepers, of which I am one.

 

 

The vaporizer means beekeepers can look after their hives with peace of mind, whilst respecting the bees.

Respect for bees

Bees have developed in synergy with plants over millions of years. It seems wise to use this remarkable partnership to improve the relationship between beekeepers and bees.

The principle is simple: Apisolis emits a sweet, natural vapour around the bees. This vapour is generated using the "NATIVE" Apisolis formula.

In order to respect the bees to the greatest possible extent, it consists only of natural, bio-sourced components. The compounds are ECOCERT and FDA certified and are 100% natural and sustainable. The "NATIVE" formula is the result of several years of research based on scientific protocols. The patent for the formula has been filed.

 

Respect for beekeepers and the environment

Apisolis works simply by pressing a button at the beekeeper’s demand, and so greatly reduces the risk of inhalation.

What is more, the vaporizer means you can avoid burns or even starting fires.

 

The Apisolis vaporizer is very easy to use, self-contained, very convenient and safe.


1. EASY TO USE:

To use Apisolis, simply press the power button.
You can also adjust the amount of vapour by squeezing the bellows.

2. SAFE:

The vaporizer's temperature is regulated automatically and a gentle, even vapour is produced. The vapour is only produced on demand. It is turned off very easily by pressing the power button a couple of times, which means the risk of fires while carrying is avoided.

3. SELF-CONTAINED:

Thanks to Apisolis you can visit to up to 100 hives with the contents of one tank. To recharge Apisolis, simply plug it into a USB port (the cigarette lighter of your car,for example).

 

4. VERY CONVENIENT:

You can carry Apisolis hanging from your waist.

 

Weight with bellows: 750 gr (1,653 lb)
Size with bellows: Width 13cm (5,12inch) - Length 10cm (3,94inch) - Height 20cm (7,87inch)


These are the components of the Apisolis vaporizer:


Power button and rapid recharging using a USB port.


Rechargeable and removable cartridge which can hold up to 16 ml.
Resistance requires changing every 500 hives, on average.


Bellows enabling adjustment of air pressure. 

The "NATIVE" Apisolis formula for the rechargeable cartridge.
The patent for the formula has been filed.

*Colors and shapes presented can be modified during production

In order for my project to be successful, I really need your contributions.
They will be used to finance the mass production of Apisolis to respond to your needs.

If you are a nature lover and would like to support this project, please click on the "Support this Project" button at the top of the page.

If my project exceeds the initial target, I will be able to develop new formulas based on natural ingredients to combat varroa mites and other pests to protect the welfare of bees.

 

Phase 1 (April - June 2018): crowdfunding donations

Phase 2 (July - October 2018): Details of the specifications for production and the choice of suppliers.

Phase 3 (November - May 2018/2019): Production of casings and electronics.

Phase 4 (June 2019): Delivery of Apisolis.

 

 

 

 

            

Site web

What is the temperature of the vapour emitted around the bees?
The temperature is below 35°, and so does not entail any risk for the bees.

What are the sources are the formula’s components?
The ingredients of the "NATIVE" formula are Ecocert and FDA certified and are bio-sourced, natural, active ingredients.

Is the NATIVE solution compatible with organic beekeeping?
Yes, it is highly natural unlike the toxic compounds emitted by current smokers.

Are any consumables required for the Apisolis vaporizer to work correctly?
The resistance needs changing every 500 hives on average.

story:
Our motto is GET MORE!

The ocean is waving even when wind does not blow and when the sun does not shine. At the same time, water density is approximately 800 times greater than the density of air that allows receiving energy easier. The estimated efficiency of our generator has to exceed the efficiency of the existing “green” technologies and to get closer to the efficiency of thermal and nuclear power plants. At once without any harmful emissions and threat of radioactive infection.

Point absorber which is attached to the bottom

1.Gathers energy from a small part of the front of a wave.

2.It requires the use of springs or counterweight. This fact reduces the efficiency of work because of additional expenses for energy.

 

 

Point absorber which is established on the rigid basis (ashore)

1.Complexity of orientation on the waves.

2.Possibility of damage caused by waves because of the rigid basis.

 

Attenuator 

1.Gathers energy from a small part of the front of a wave.

2.The efficiency sharply decreases at increase in the period of a wave.

 

Point absorber with Heave plate

1.The efficiency sharply decreases at increase in the period of a wave.

2.It doesn't allow to make full use of the wave amplitude since it is always partially displaced in the direction of the movement of a wave.

 

Advantages of GETMOREter:

1.Works without springs and counterbalances, at the expense of own weight and displacement.

2.Takes energy both with a growth, and at recession of a wave.

3.Easily can orient itself in the direction of distribution of waves and also gathers energy from a wide sector of the front of a wave.

4.Effectively works at change of the period of waves and it can use practically any wave. (It’s a joke! GETMOREter won't be able to use very small wave which won't be able to create the necessary force for operation of the generator. But taking into account calculation of parameters of the generator under a concrete installation site, such situation is almost impossible).

5.Easily deviates at extreme blows of waves and avoids destruction.

1. The floating buoy – deploys GETMORETER along the front of a wave and allows to receive more energy.
2. The suspension – holds floating buoy.
3. Guides – set the movement to rods.
4. Rods – transmit the movement to a generator shaft and work serially at growth and recession of a wave.
5. The supporting buoy – forms the basis of the generator and returns construction in vertical position.
6. The anchor cable – fixes GETMOREter to the basis and allows it to deviate and rotate freely by 360 degrees.
7. The basis – remains GETMOREter at the bottom and serves as the house for sea inhabitants as an artificial reef.

 

Prototype Demonstrator #1 (November 2017)

Scale 1:20 Prototype #2 (May 2018)

We have already built the Prototype Demonstrator #1 and also Scale 1:20 Prototype #2. The last one was tested under real sea conditions and, of course, all of the results were successful.  Prototype Demonstrator #1 in action

 

Real sea testing of the Scale 1:20 Prototype #2

 

Nowadays the cost of installation of a new source of renewable energy is about 1500$ on 1 kW of rated capacity for wind generators and about 1000$ on 1 kW for solar panels.

Further, with the introduction of technology, GETMOREter’s cost has to become less than the cost of wind power generators and has to approach the cost of solar panels that will allow it to gain popularity around the world! But now, for development and creation of the first sample, we will need a little more means.

We consider that the amount collected (237 000 €) will allow us to create the full-scale GETMOREter’s model with a power of 100 kW taking into account the cost of the gifts to donators and other overhead costs.

The power of 100 kW will allow to provide with net and cheap energy up to 40 houses.

 

We want to assemble and establish GETMOREter in the Portuguese Pilot zone (http://oceanplug.pt/en-GB). There are not only good waves, but also all the necessary coastal infrastructure is created.

•The average height of waves in a year - 2 m

•The average period of waves - 10 sec

•The maximum range of tide - 3 m

•Characteristics of waves determine the generator’s sizes: length of the top buoy - about 18 m and width - about 4 m.

 

 

Are you interested in details? Then watch this video!

During the project we’ll tell you a lot more interesting about GETMOREter. We’ll show you how the idea of new type of the wave generator was developed; we’ll show our attempts to build up the working prototype; you’ll get to know our team better. Don't go away, we need YOU! Share this project with your friends, the more the company, the more cheerfully is to create something new!

JOIN US!

oceanpotential.pt

OceanPotential  OceanPotential 

Oceanpotential_ OceanPotential

 

 

 

Thank you for your attention!

story:
“a memory + a thought + an innovation + passion = DPDA Solution”

What is Disaster Prediction, Detection & Alarm System(DPDA)?

When I was a schoolboy, me and childhood buddy used to play a lot. Just like any other kid, we will meet and create comic stories, castles out of sand, create those paper boats for rain but one sinful day, I lost him in a Disaster(Floods) which took out his entire town. It was a big shock and finally, a moment of truth for me; Life is short and unpredictable. 25 years later, I saw his photo in my old book which made me realize that every day we work hard and harder to get money but have we ever thought of giving back? This reminded me of a great saying “We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give” It gave me the power to think about the word ‘Prevention’. What if that day we had a technology that would have predicted floods and alarmed us timely, my friend would have been alive. What if people who are climbing mountain know in advance about a Landslide occurrence, what about those lovely animals, wildlife and mother nature that can be saved from cruel and wild Forest Fire, how about saving those families that are in danger due to cyclones? and finally, WHAT IF TOGETHER WE CAN DO IT!

April 2017, we are ready to launch First Phase of DPDA (Disaster Prediction, Detection and Alarm System) under the GORM – I (Geographical Organized Remote Management) program. The purpose of this system is to predict and detect disasters much before they are in their raging state and update the target area by sending timely and regular updates with information uploaded to a central repository at a global level.

In our initial phase, we plan to deploy Ground Solution followed by a Robust Satellite Solution development start by Q3 2018. This campaign is created to gather required funds for software-dependent hardware equipment to deploy the ground solution as soon as possible.

Remember, "None of us is as smart as all of us." We need your support and contribution to make this happen. Your contribution will not go unnoticed and as a gesture to your contribution we are offering attractive and exciting perks developed with the help of nature that’ll keep you look young, fresh and rejuvenated. From facial kits, to authentic jute bags, saffron, silk shawls, carpets and much more. Look out for the perks!!

About me...

My name is Pande, Naturalists by passion and Computer Vision Scientist by work. From a long time, I have been thinking to build a solution that can predict or detect disasters and save millions of lives and nature’s beauty that we lose every year.

GORM – I is my own nurtured and nested program. Under the GORM-I program, the services emanating from infrastructure, are optimally synthesized to provide data and information required for efficient management of natural disasters. The Geostationary satellites (Communication and Meteorological), Low Earth Orbiting Earth Observation satellites, aerial survey systems together with ground infrastructure form the core element of the observation Systems for disaster management. The value-added products generated using satellite imagery helps in addressing the information needs covering all the phases of disaster management such as, preparedness, early warning, response, relief, rehabilitation, recovery and mitigation across the globe.

GORM – I program is divided into 4 phases with each phase containing a milestone that we want to achieve.

 

 

Phases Information:

Phase I: (Q2-Q3 2017): Ready to launch

For Phase I launch, we’ll deploy our solution to a Forest in India and will capture the temporal and spatial data for our further research followed by deployment in next forest.

 

Requirements Detailed:

Software Application:

  • Forest Wild Fire and Smoke Detection – Software & In-house testing completed
  • Wind Direction Detection – Software & In-house testing completed
  • Shortest Route Navigation System – Software & In-house testing completed

1 x Application Server - Ready

15 x Ultra-Long Range Infrared Camera System – Needs Funding

15 x High-Altitude Poles – Needs Funding

~45 km Cables & Wiring – Needs Funding

5 x GPS and GPRS System – Needs Funding

5 x Operations Server – Needs Funding

1 x Web Portal Development – Needs Funding

 

Phase II: (Q1 2018)

Flood Detection – Initial Analysis on-going

Cyclones – Initial Plan rollout

 

Phase III: (Q3 2018)

Landslide Detection – Initial Analysis on-going

 

Phase IV: (Q4 2018) (Concept Phase)

Satellite based Disaster Detection System

Concept Stage

 

 

Phase I: Forest Fire

Effects of Forest fire

  • Forest Fire take away homes, wildlife, as well as vegetation. All of the inhabitants of the wildlife environment now are found homeless. People often lose their houses as well if the fires are close enough to human housing. Vegetation is now obsolete if this area is near a farm or near the food of other inhabitants. Millions of dollars are spent repairing these damages and re-building homes and areas of vegetation.
  • The soil in the area of the Forest Fire has been completely destroyed. The soils in the forest are made with decaying nutrients and debris that have a lot of natural ingredients that help make the earth what it is. When a forest fire hits this soil, it becomes too hot and all of those nutrients are gone for good.
  • Animals lose their lives. It is sad but true fact that birds, squirrels, rabbits, and other wildlife animals are no longer a part of this great earth.
  • Trees and plants are gone as well. Trees and plants help to produce oxygen in the world. The less trees and plants there are the less clean air we have to breathe. With no plants or trees, the animals that did survive no longer have anything to eat.
  • Too much water in the soil can cause erosion. Firefighters use a great deal of water to put out these vicious forest fire. Too much water in the soil causes it to erode and make it useless.
  • Large amounts of smoke are released into the air which makes it difficult to breathe and also causes air pollution.
  • Unfortunately, some human lives are also lost in Forest Fire. Typically, people who are fighting the fire who lose their lives trying to save others.
  • Ash and smoke can cause serious health problems to humans who suffer from allergies and other medical problems. This same smoke and ash has the ability to permanently damage the lungs and the throat.
  • Incomes and jobs are lost for workers in the agricultural field whose field crops and animals were destroyed by the Forest Fire. When people are out of work, the economy suffers which makes it difficult to recover.
  • Insurance premiums soar sky high after a Forest Fire because now everyone is looking to obtain some kind of insurance to prevent such devastating losses. People are unable to afford these premiums even when they need them the most.
  • There will be restricted recreational areas that will not be able to be accessed until the area is clear of debris and is determined to be safe to inhabit or visit.
  • The loss of animals has the ability to also create extinction for certain animals and other creatures of the forest.

 

 

  • Why we choose Smoke Detection over Forest Fire as our detection technique?

 

An enclosed fire may include some or all of the following phases of development: (1) incipient phase, (2) growth phase (pre-flashover), (3) flashover, (4) fully developed phase (post-flashover), (5) decay phase, and (6) extinction. Ignition is the start of fire development. The duration of the “incipient” period, shown in above figure, is dependent on a variety of factors including the fuel type, physical situation, and quantity of available oxygen. Heat generation increases during this period, producing light to moderate volumes of smoke. The characteristic smell of smoke is usually the first indication that an incipient fire is underway. Early detection at this stage, either human or automatic, can control the fire before significant losses occur if it is followed by a timely response from qualified fire-fighting professionals.
 

 

Other Smoke Detection Characteristics:

  • Early-sign of Forest Fire
  • 95% of the Forest Fire contains Smoke
  • Reaches high altitude quicker than Fire
  • Easy to get in Field of View
  • Can prevent Forest Fire

 

  • Fire and Smoke Detection Ground Samples

Watch our DPDA software in action. Running and actively detecting Smoke and displaying various information and parameters.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • The Impact

Bringing in a solution for Forest Fire Pre-Disaster alerts would be of great significance. We can save millions of lives, nature’s beauty, infrastructure destruction and much more. Imagine that if we can predict or detect Forest fire in-time (during its incipient phase), we can save tons of Oxygen, Trees, Forest land, herbs, essentials, animals and other wildlife.

 

  • OTHER WAYS TO CONTRIBUTE TO MOTHER NATURE

At the individual level, we can follow these practices:

  • Plant trees.
  • Produce less waste (don't buy products you don't need).
  • Use eco-friendly products instead of plastics, chemicals and toxins.
  • Buy organic products to encourage organic farming.
  • Conserve energy by not wasting resources - water, electricity, gas.
  • Use eco-friendly transportation (walk, cycle, public transport).

 

At global level, we need to transform our education system:

  • Unmoderated production of unwanted goods for profit.
  • Develop eco-friendly technologies rather than working on profit friendly technology.
  • The technical and medical education institutes teach us building items in an isolated way, rather than taking in the effect of these practices on nature. It would be great if we think beyond the system and evaluate them.

 

 

  • We Need Your Help!

Your contribution is very important, and there are many other ways you can help:

  • Use the share tools provided by INDIEGOGO to circulate to your friends and encourage them to help us achieve our goal.
  • Use different social media channels to direct traffic to this campaign.
  • Your contribution will make the world safer, greener, healthier and stronger.

Cheers to good life!!
story_txt:
“a memory + a thought + an innovation + passion = DPDA Solution”What is Disaster Prediction, Detection & Alarm System(DPDA)?When I was a schoolboy, me and childhood buddy used to play a lot. Just like any other kid, we will meet and create comic stories, castles out of sand, create those paper boats for rain but one sinful day, I lost him in a Disaster(Floods) which took out his entire town. It was a big shock and finally, a moment of truth for me; Life is short and unpredictable. 25 years later, I saw his photo in my old book which made me realize that every day we work hard and harder to get money but have we ever thought of giving back? This reminded me of a great saying “We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give” It gave me the power to think about the word ‘Prevention’. What if that day we had a technology that would have predicted floods and alarmed us timely, my friend would have been alive. What if people who are climbing mountain know in advance about a Landslide occurrence, what about those lovely animals, wildlife and mother nature that can be saved from cruel and wild Forest Fire, how about saving those families that are in danger due to cyclones? and finally, WHAT IF TOGETHER WE CAN DO IT!April 2017, we are ready to launch First Phase of DPDA (Disaster Prediction, Detection and Alarm System) under the GORM – I (Geographical Organized Remote Management) program. The purpose of this system is to predict and detect disasters much before they are in their raging state and update the target area by sending timely and regular updates with information uploaded to a central repository at a global level.In our initial phase, we plan to deploy Ground Solution followed by a Robust Satellite Solution development start by Q3 2018. This campaign is created to gather required funds for software-dependent hardware equipment to deploy the ground solution as soon as possible.Remember, "None of us is as smart as all of us." We need your support and contribution to make this happen. Your contribution will not go unnoticed and as a gesture to your contribution we are offering attractive and exciting perks developed with the help of nature that’ll keep you look young, fresh and rejuvenated. From facial kits, to authentic jute bags, saffron, silk shawls, carpets and much more. Look out for the perks!!About me...My name is Pande, Naturalists by passion and Computer Vision Scientist by work. From a long time, I have been thinking to build a solution that can predict or detect disasters and save millions of lives and nature’s beauty that we lose every year.GORM – I is my own nurtured and nested program. story:
Short Summary

Hi Everyone, My name is Tenzin Lekden and I am the founder of Investrealfund.com. I am currently at my early Business Idea to App design Stage: 

I want to create an advanced app and AI software for financial market data analyzer and risk management that would help all investors in the Financial Market. 

With investment and trading in the stock market becoming freer in today's market, Many new & young impulsive investors make wrong investment decisions either due to lack of data at the professional level or Risk Management Analyses.

1: With our platform, we want to make sure everyone will be informed investors using our AI algorithm for Data Analyser and Risk management analyses.

2: Everyone shall enjoy the same level of advanced software market analyzer. for example, right now Bloomberg terminal is expensive, and only the elite financial institutions could afford this system. We want to bring that level of advancement to everyone's hands with cost-effectiveness.

In long term, we want to be known for our reliable industrial data resources tech company that can help not just financial participants but also all regulators and government bodies for the decision-making process.

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are raising £51,000 to develop the standard First version app 
  • We are offering a 10% stake

The Impact

In Milestone, Your investment and contribution will not just make this project come to life but also serve millions of young generations to make their own financial decisions with advanced AI  Technology and market Data at their fingertips.  

We want to provide everyone with the best financial tools and technological resources so that everyone will obtain the ability to make their financial decisions.

Risks & Challenges

I am currently taking my initial steps to bring my business idea to life. my biggest challenge at the moment is to get the fund I needed in order to build the app, which is why I am here seeking help and bringing to you a promising business proposal.

In the Long Run, I might face a bigger challenge & competition from Bloomberg Terminal but our unique strategy to cover retail investors first rather than financial institutions will give us a different way to enter into a bigger market.

How We are going to Do that:

1: We are going to build a product for everyone and not just to big corporates and asset management companies

2: We are coming up with a more cost-effective product with the same level of technology. 

Please get in touch with us for all queries:

Email: ten.info@investrealfund.com

Website: https://www.investrealfund.com/

story:
Short Summary

We are a group of four Ph.D and engineers coming from France, Canada, Brazil and Russia and we want to develop a complete solution for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), accessible via a Web navigator only, that enables to simulate every fluid flow in the following fields:

  • Aerospace & Automotive
  • Energy & Environment
  • Thermal & Building ventilation
  • etc.

The main softwares are open-source and the computations will be performed on the Cloud instead of supercomputers. The chosen solver is OpenFOAM.

What We Need & What You Get

Let's speak about money. We need 150 k€ to finance:

  • The salaries of the development engineers and the community manager that will promote the site;
  • The computers we are working on.

Every contributor receives 1 share of the company for a contribution of 10 EUR.

The Impact

Simulatos will make it more accessible to perform CFD simulations whatever your budget and wherever you are, since only a Web navigator and a good Internet connection is required on the client's side.

  • Most part of the benefits comes from the cloud computation, where a commision on every CPU hour pays our interface
  • We will also sell support and training on the platform.

Risks & Challenges

The main difficulty relies on the creation of an intuitive and easy-to-use Web interface that a average CFD engineer can understand as fast as possible. To reach this goal, we follow two options:

  • First, internally, a group of engineers will test the platform as users and return their impression to the developpers ;
  • Second, externally, students and academics associated with the Simulatos project will also test the interface and give an external opinion on the platform.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can't financially contribute and you have CFD skills ? Join the Simulatos project and become official tester. You will then have access to a certain number of free hours on the Cloud to permorm your own computations for free.

story:
We present you a new and convenient electric grill that has many advantages.

 

During the planning and development, which took place over 3 years, the focus was on creating an electric grill that is easy for everyone to use and can be used quickly. 

The disadvantages of a conventional charcoal grill were emphasized in the planning and development in order to replace and optimize them with a new technology.

 

Our innovative electric grill is ideal for people who like it simple.

Grilling with the developed by us electric grill is the newest way to grill. With a well thought out design, it is also simple in its use and particularly suitable for a healthy / Smoke-free grilling.

A quiet motor is built into the electric grill, which automatically turns the skewers at the correct speed. The turning function grills the meat evenly and the fat and juice first coat the meat so that it retains its full taste and remains juicy. The excess fat gets into the drip pan.

The vertical position of the heating coil in Our electric grill brings a beautiful design and many advantages. Due to the vertical position, the excess fat and the juice of the meat do not drip onto the heating coil, which prevents the formation of smoke that affects the taste and transfers pollutants to the meat.

In addition, our electric grill is compact, space-saving, easy to clean and easy to transport.

 

Technical specifications:

  • Power: 2700 Watts
  • Temperature at the Heating coil >800°C (1472°F Fahrenheit)
  • Grilling time: 15-25 Minutes depending on the type of food
  • Material: stainless steel, plastic
  • Automatic rotation of skewers 360 °
  • measurement: Width 23 cm (9 Inch) | Height 46 cm (18,1 Inch) | Length 40 cm (15,7 Inch)
  • Weight: 8,5 kg (18,7 lbs Pound)
  • for outdoor use: balcony, garden, terrace

 

Risks & Challenges

We have built a solid relationship with manufacturing partners to resolve production issues and prepare for any issues that may arise with scale-up. The injection molds and individual components have already been ordered. Financing is required as an additional source of income and with the help of your money we can negotiate optimal prices in order to be able to offer the product cheaper in the future. We will be responsive and transparent at every stage of our project, including production, shipping and customer service. If you have any questions about our campaign, please feel free to contact our team by leaving a comment.
