story:
The Trashless service has started in Austin! Please visit: www.trashlessatx.com. 

 

This campaign is no longer active and is not monitored anymore. 

 

Let's Go Trashless 

From pantry items to household cleaning supplies - most common consumer products come in single-use packaging - which is ecologically damaging and economically expensive to produce, transport, use, discard or recycle. 

Trashless (TM) will deliver common household products directly to local consumers in reusable containers, picking up the empty containers and delivering refills when prompted via a simple tap of a button on the Trashless mobile phone app.  

Delivering products that are locally sourced and sustainably produced, Trashless will add extra layers of sustainability to this new low carbon footprint way households consume products.

It's like The Milkman for Everything (TM). 

The difference: This milkman is powered by sophisticated technology, efficient production processes, and optimized logistics. 

 

What, How Much, When & Where? 

From pantry items such as oils, honey, coffee & condiments to cleaning supplies such as laundry detergent and hand soap, Trashless will deliver these most commonly consumed products on a flexible refill subscription basis (read on for more details).

Per unit, Trashless’ will price its products at around the same levels as similar products available in grocery stores in the same area - making it a no-brainer for consumers.

The Trashless online store on Loconomy.com with the initial product list and pricing is slated to go live on March 15. Perks credits will be issued by April 1. Deliveries will begin by the end of April.  

Trashless will first begin service in the Greater Austin, Texas, area. Read on for expansion plans.  

 

Who We Are 

Trashless is a new service from Austin, Texas based Lettuce Networks, Inc. - which runs a thriving, profitable, local meal-kit delivery service in Austin called Lettuce, as well as Loconomy.com - a hyper local ecommerce, engagement and logistics technology platform. Lettuce's mission is to enable people lead sustainable yet modern lives. Over the last few years, we have honed the cycle of sourcing sustainably produced local ingredients, assembling them, delivering final products in reusable packaging . . . then picking the packaging back up, sanitizing it and repeating this over and over again - profitably. This has set us up really nicely for the next major step in the company's evolution: Trashless. 

It all goes back to co-founder & CEO Yogesh Sharma's childhood, when he and his now deceased mother, Savitri Sharma, would go grocery shopping in Delhi, India, Single-use plastic packaging was on the rise, and she would say, 'The world will be drowning in these bags one day. Why can't products be delivered in reusable containers, taken back, washed and reused?' Those ideas have remained in the back of his mind, and now, finally, with your support, they will become a reality.

Not a year too soon - single use packaging is everywhere, and getting worse. 

Through ups and downs, we have persevered while staying true to our principles, finally finding success. This experience, core competence and Lettuce's infrastructure, marketing channels and delivery network in Austin will help ensure Trashless’s success out the gate, in Austin and beyond. 

 

But, first . . .  

Why: From a Rather Trashy Present, to a Trashless Future

You've heard it all - the stats, the stories about packaging waste and its contribution to the climate change crisis. This is real, urgent and ominous. Let's confront the truth first:

Yes, they all have varying ecological and economic impact:

Plastic: It gets all the bad rap. Well, it deserves it: 

 

Paper:  'Paper or plastic?' Answering that question at the grocery checkout with 'paper' may feel better ... but single-use paper carries its own environmental cost. Consider these stats:

Similarly, glass, aluminum. and other materials used in single-use packaging also carry a heavy toll: Mining, energy & water use in manufacturing, emissions, transportation, disposal and more. 

All these materials are quite durable - so much that they can be used over and over again - which is what Trashless is all about. 

Finally, What About Recycling? 

While it is well accepted that recycling is better than recyclable materials going into trash, recycling is environmentally costly: Transportation, sorting, smelting, recasting and more. Further it is a costly process that most municipalities have yet to figure out how to fund. Reuse is clear better than recycling.  

There has yet been no effective, foolproof systematic mechanism of reuse of packaging materials. 

 

So, What Now? 

What do we all do? Live in jungles, like cave people? Give up all the good things, the conveniences of modern life that come in single use packaging? 

No no . . . Just Go Trashless!

 

Trashless is Better in Every Way  

For you, your local community, and the planet: 

 

How It'll Work: The Customer Experience 

Starting March 15, you’ll be able to browse Trashless products and sign up on Trashless’ online store on Loconomy.com, starting with the Greater Austin Area. 

When you subscribe to products, Trashless will deliver two units of each on a regular delivery day of the week you set in your account. When one runs out, simply go to the Trashless app on your phone and tap Refill for that product. Meanwhile, you’ll have the second unit to use - ensuring that you never run out. 

When your total Refill orders exceed the minimum amount for free delivery (likely to be $25), Refills will automatically get scheduled for delivery on your next regular delivery day. You’ll be able to skip a delivery, or schedule one before the minimum is met for a nominal delivery fee. 

On the day of the delivery, simply put the used containers out at your front door in the original reusable bag they came in. They’ll be picked up, and a freshly refilled set will be dropped off. 

You’ll be kept informed at every step of the way via email, phone app notifications and/or text - your choice. Painless. Trashless. Guiltless. 

 

How It'll Work: Operations 

Building up on the operational experience we have gained with Lettuce - products will be sourced, filled and delivered, plus return containers processed with military precision for the highest level of customer satisfaction, operational excellence, and logistical efficiency.

Team: We’ll pluck the right people from the core Lettuce ops team to lead Trashless, seamlessly. We’ll tap into our pool of part-time workers who are well versed with the company’s core mission. And, we’ll leverage Lettuce’s vast network of vendor relationships for fast product sourcing. 

Technology: Loconomy’s battle tested end to end technology platform with custom built Refill functionality will power the entire lifecycle - marketing, customer acquisition, ecommerce, engagement, order management, routing, delivery tracking, driver management, vendor payments, and more. 

Infrastructure: Lettuce will leverage its current physical infrastructure in Austin, Texas - facilities, equipment, certifications, delivery vehicles, to get Trashless up and running quickly and cost effectively. This will serve as a template for expansion in other urban/sub-urban areas - either company owned operations and/or franchised. If you’d like to partner with us to bring Trashless to your area, please contact us at info@lettuce.fm.   

 

How Trashless Compares 

Trashless aims to reinvent the way fast-moving consumer goods are sold, delivered and consumed. We believe it is a better way - compared to everything else:  

 

Compared to the Grocery Store Bulk Section  

We love the bulk section in grocery stores - they are a great way to cut down waste and save money. But, it's not a comprehensive solution that fits today's modern lifestyle:

  

 

What's Going Trashless? 

Pantry Items

From honey to salt, cooking oils, vinegar, flour, pickles, energy bars, spices, condiments, snacks, baked goods, jams, jellies, sparkling water and more - most pantries are a hotbed of single-use packaging - ripe for a Trashless makeover. And, when it comes to food, Trashless addresses more than just packaging waste:

  • It is a solution to today's convoluted supply chains where mainstream food brands dominate, while local ones struggle.
  • It addresses the incredibly high number of miles travelled by packaged food.
  • It is a solution to the excessive addition of preservatives to prevent the food from rotting, vs. the freshness and nutritional value that comes with locally produced food.

Trashless will partner with local food producers, bringing them more sales, an efficient logistics / delivery mechanism, and a way to save on wasteful packaging materials.  

Cleaning Supplies 

This is the second category of fast moving consumer goods that are responsible for a lot of single-use packaging - perfectly good containers of detergents, soaps and cleaners - that end up being tossed away, just because they are empty. This needs to change, and Trashless is on it! 

We are already working with several regional contract manufacturers and distributors of sustainably produced, high quality common household cleaning supplies. As the customer base grows, significant economies of scale will kick in - resulting in a constant improving and more efficient model. 

Services 

Trashless will also offer some additional services that will enable you to conveniently lead sustainable lives: 

You already know that dead batteries shouldn't be just thrown into the trash - but properly disposed of. Result: Probably a bunch of dead batteries lying around that you can't remember to take to a recycling center, right?

What about composting food scraps? For most people, they guiltily just dump them into the trash - especially if the city doesn't have composting services.

Trashless plans to offer free dead battery and compost pick up in special containers, with its regular paid pick up and delivery stops. This will serve our mission to bring greater sustainability to local communities, and greater awareness. 

 

Risks & Challenges 

Like any other business, Trashless bears plenty of risks and challenges - weak customer adoption due to entrenched habits, operational inefficiency, technology, financial model, competition and more - and we are ready and nimble to face them all. 

But the biggest risks of them all? 

 

Perks 

Like everything else with Trashless, our Perks are simple: A store credit with a 20% discount and some goodie we'll send out no matter where you are. This means your contributions are going to simply come back to you in the form of a credit to purchase Trashless products when the service comes to your area (read more in the next section). 

Regardless of where you live and the perks, we hope you would contribute to our effort to create a new paradigm of trashless consumption that's better for you, your community and your planet. 

 

Trashless in Your Area  

We are launching Trashless in beautiful Austin, Texas, our home base. This will serve as a template for expansion in other urban/sub-urban areas - either company owned operations and/or franchised. If you’d like to partner with us to bring Trashless to your area, please contact us at info@lettuce.fm.   

This campaign will influence which cities we come to next: based on the contributions we get from various cities. Let's go Trashless! 

 

Future Roadmap 

As we kick off the service successfully, and gain market traction, we will broaden and deepen the Trashless product line, invest in operational efficiency, including order fulfillment automation, more product and delivery options, better reusable packaging, participation of more brands, more optimized delivery networks, expansion in other geographical areas, and more. 

 

Business Model 

Lettuce be very clear: This isn't just a bleeding hearts concept. It has a fundamentally strong business model behind it. With our extensive experience in technology, hyper local logistics, just in time packaging, team management, local sourcing, and financial modeling, we are well qualified to execute on it.

Lettuce's mission is to enable people lead sustainable yet modern lives. Over the last few years, we have honed the cycle of sourcing sustainably produced local ingredients, assembling them, delivering final products in reusable packaging . . . then picking the packaging back up, sanitizing it and repeating this over and over again - profitably. This has set us up really nicely for the next major step in the company's evolution: Trashless. It all goes back to co-founder & CEO Yogesh Sharma's childhood, when he and his now deceased mother, Savitri Sharma, would go grocery shopping in Delhi, India, Single-use plastic packaging was on the rise, and she would say, 'The world will be drowning in these bags one day. Why can't products be delivered in reusable containers, taken back, washed and reused?' Those ideas have remained in the back of his mind, and now, finally, with your support, they will become a reality.Not a year too soon - single use packaging is everywhere, and getting worse. Through ups and downs, we have persevered while staying true to our principles, finally finding success. story:
MEGATRON-V1.0 is a lead-acid battery desulfators, an equipment to improve the car/boat/plane battery life. AND REDUCE THE POLLUTION.

All vehicles use lead acid batteries for starter and accessories. Although these batteries contain lead, the correct disposal ensure that they will not pollute the environment.

Hi, my name is Marcel Pierson, a Senior thermal mechanic engineer, i am from Venezuela, a beautifull place, but, with the shadow of the thirdworld. Even we try to adecuate our society to the new century, we still have the ballast of the low tech, low quality industrial world. (A POLLUTIN WORLD).

But, we want to change this.

We designed the MEGATRON-V1.0 to be economical and durable. Also, accessible and efficient at the time of use.

We use a low tech manufacture procress, and we need to buy some machines and equipments to ensure us to compete with the lowest price of these equipments. We need a new MPCNC PCB MILLING MACHINE, one REPRAP 3D PRINTER and some othe small equipments to improve the manufacture, the final design and lower the cost to be accesible to everyone.

Even ONE small equipment like the MEGATRON-V1.0, installed in a car/boat/plane, will help the environment exponentially, since it is a battery not sent to the garbage, less expenses for the buyer, and ensure the battery will work at the most needed moment, when we need it.

One MEGATRON more in the world, one less lead-acid battery in the garbage.

Our megatron helps conserve the environment, and likewise extends the life of our vehicle battery.

EIGHT (08) of each TEN (10) lead acid batteries are replaced unnecessarily and / or prematurely.

This usually occurs when the battery has a lack of starting capacity, which is commonly caused by the accumulation of sulfate in the plates of the cells of the same. (Regarding the sulfation of the battery terminals, although it is by the same chemical principle, it is due to different causes.)

This situation in many cases is almost completely reversible, since there is the technology to avoid its formation early, being in this way possible to considerably increase the useful life of the batteries of your car.

The MEGATRON-V1.0 BATTERY DESULFATOR performs regeneration treatment and constant conditioner maintenance, that means the battery will permanently maintain its capacity and productivity to the maximum level.

After connecting the MEGATRON-V1.0 BATTERY DESULFATOR, and after a period of time of recovery and / or conditioning of the battery, you will check how the devices and accessories connected have greater power (more force in the Starter or brighter lighting, longer duration, etc.). One of the most obvious advantages is that it will help prevent your car from getting injured due to the battery, and also saves you money by making your battery last much longer.

One MEGATRON-v1.0 more in the world, one less lead-acid battery in the garbage.

My car is not guilty. we use megatron battery desulfator. we love envinroment.

story:
Overview:

We want to show iFilter (Tornado filter for vacuum cleaner) to the world. We would like to have comments and suggestions, especially from the Indiegogoss. People can find a use for iFilter. The potential of the product is great, it can replace the dust bag for all vacuum cleaners that use the filter bag that occupies the majority of the vacuum cleaner market. With your support, we can bring our project to life, and really make a difference in our cleaning efforts. Becoming a part of iFilter and making our vision of the future come true.

iFilter (Tornado filter for vacuum cleaner): Revolutionizing the dust filter system, replacing the dust bag, turning any conventional vacuum cleaner into a super vacuum cleaner, increasing the suction power by up to 5 times, saving power by up to 2 times, using forever, no arising charge for replacement of vacuum bags, minimizing the impact on the environment.

Problem:

The dust bag in your vacuum cleaner never changes. There is no others. You will always have to spend up to $ 100 to $ 120 annually to replace a paper dust bag or spend a lot of time waiting for the dust bag to dry out after washing, not to mention that washing absolutely clearly nano size speck of dust in fabric filter bag is extremely difficult. In case where it is not possible to replace (paper dust filter bag) or clean (fabric dust filter bag) it will cause blockage and reduce the suction capacity or can cause serious damage to the motor and this will be a significant cost to repair.

Paper bags filter for vacuum cleaner

Studies have shown that for vacuum cleaners with a filter bag, after only 10 minutes of operation (ie, after vacuuming about 200 grams of dust), the suction power has decreased by half and continues to weaken when the dust bag gradually fills.

Vacuum Cleaner work diagram

 

Inside filter bag, dust will reduce the suction power

But what if it could be improved? If you can completely remove the filter bag and replace it with another kit. And then, your dust filter becomes an enhanced experience, up to 5 times, and maintains maximum continuous gravity compared to using a filter bag, helping you to vacuum cleaner.

Increasing the suction power by up to 5 times if nothing obstructs airflow

Furthermore, what if your electricity bill with a vacuum cleaner reduced by half? You will not have to pay a eclectricity bill for the useless power of the vacuum cleaner when it tries to vacuum the air through the gaps in the filter bag that has already been filled with tiny speck of dust.

Illustrated vacuum cleaner bag filter typical

This is just an illustration and we are not referring to any manufacturer

Do not stop there - assuming that it's also used forever, easy to clean after use, cost savings and environmental protection.

It is difficult to clean the cloth filter bag

Solving problems:

This is iFilter, by combining Cyclone technology and Centrifugal force to create an innovative dust filter system that replaces the traditional filter bag, giving you a polite experience, more than 2 times energy-saving and more than 5 times vacuuming power. With three accelerating layers, two separating garbage, dust layers, iFilter  compresses garbage, dirt and pushes them down the dusty containing cup without interfering clean air. Keeping your vacuum cleaner capacity running at maximum power level, cooler motor and saving more energy than conventional filter bags.

For a household, only with one-time investment cost, but can be used forever, iFilter helps you save more than $ 100 - $ 120 paper bag filter cost per year. This not only means that iFilter pays for itself only after a few months of use - but the reduce of the environmental impact of iFilter for paper production is huge.

The best part? iFilter is commen for any vacuum cleaner using filter bags. The installation takes only seconds - no tools, no complicated directions, no hassle.

Our integrated adapter makes it possible to fit onto the current vacuum cleaner tubes.

iFilter is here to revolutionize your dust filter bag. Enjoying the fun of cyclonic technology every time you vacuum.

Transparent plastic structure, iFilter makes it easy to see the fill of garbage, dust, etc. in the container.

How can iFilter be able to separate and retain dust? This is because iFilter use cyclone technology and Centrifugal force.

Principle of separation of dust by centrifugal force
 
iFilter has 3 layer increase centrifugal force and 2 dusty filter layers and as mentioned above. We had to calculate and test a lot of times (with tombstone smelly and tear-free) to achieve the optimum result as today, the garbage and dust are completely trapped in the iFilter dustbin, ensuring that the air escaping from the iFilter is completely fresh and clean.
 
Experiment with fiber garbage - 120fps slow motion ultimate video
 

Experiment with fine powdered garbage - 120fps slow motion ultimate video

With a capacity of up to 500ml (both compartments), you can easily use iFilter to clean the whole house without having to worry about the trash compartment is full, however we still recommend you to dispode the garbage after use to ensure hygiene.

Although dust particles bind to each other, producing larger dust particles, do not make dust spit out when you litter in iFilter, but for those with asthma symptoms, we advise you to put some water into the iFilter before littering, this ensures 100% there is no dust coming out and harming your health every time you litter..

 

Easy to clean iFilter.

With attractive design and compact size, the iFilter can be left as a display in the kitchen rather than in a corner of the house.

Our vision for the future is a world where technology brings new innovations that not only improve the quality of life for people but also create sustainable future for their children.

By creating a five times more efficient dust filtration system, saving thousands of kw of useless household energy consumption every year - while giving them a luxury experience - we hope to do our part in this mission.

Our story

We are iMesh Team, a start-up company established in 2016 in Vietnam with 03 friends who have from 05 to 10 years experience working in large corporations in Vietnam. We work in the field of software development and IoT medical devices. Our work often involves working with prototypes for testing so the office is always filled with small pieces of plastic. The iFilter concept was launched in February, 2016, when our vacuum cleaner was blocked up at 11pm, when there were not many places still open to sell dust bags..

iMesh Team

Since then, Mr Tien Nguyen - Founder of iMESH Team has worked hard to make this vision a reality. 

Mr Tien Nguyen - Founder of iMesh Team

Initially, after the first prototype was completed, the result was good. And suddenly we discovered the hidden potential in iFilter. We have contacted our neighbors, friends, relatives and partner companies as testers and received positive feedback. Being encouraged by the feedback, we then went on to search for a manufacturer. The production process is not as easy as it looks, when we look back, we find that this job takes a lot of time. We finally succeeded and found a completely reliable and professional manufacturer that we could use.

iFilter is 100% originate from Vietnam.

iFilter is 100% fully developed and tested by iMESH Team. All production processes and distribution chains have been organized and are waiting to be put into operation.

From the bottom of our hearts, we want to thank our friends, family and supporters as you have helped us achieve this.

We can not do without all!

Your feedback, support and advice continue to inspire us every day to make a better product.

Main features of iFilter:

- Increasing suction force more than 5 times than using paper filter bag (or fabric)

- Saving useless energy, reducing the cost of electricity more than 2 times.

- Saving $ 100-120 annually for the cost of purchasing paper bags.

- Cleaning the dust at the nanometer scale

- Being easy to clean, able to use forever.

Timeline:

The potential of the product is great, it can replace the dust bag for all vacuum cleaners that use the filter bag that occupies the majority of the vacuum cleaner market. With your support, we can bring our project to life, and really make a difference in our cleaning efforts. Becoming a part of iFilter and making our vision of the future come true.iFilter (Tornado filter for vacuum cleaner): Revolutionizing the dust filter system, replacing the dust bag, turning any conventional vacuum cleaner into a super vacuum cleaner, increasing the suction power by up to 5 times, saving power by up to 2 times, using forever, no arising charge for replacement of vacuum bags, minimizing the impact on the environment.Problem:The dust bag in your vacuum cleaner never changes. There is no others. You will always have to spend up to $ 100 to $ 120 annually to replace a paper dust bag or spend a lot of time waiting for the dust bag to dry out after washing, not to mention that washing absolutely clearly nano size speck of dust in fabric filter bag is extremely difficult. In case where it is not possible to replace (paper dust filter bag) or clean (fabric dust filter bag) it will cause blockage and reduce the suction capacity or can cause serious damage to the motor and this will be a significant cost to repair.Paper bags filter for vacuum cleanerStudies have shown that for vacuum cleaners with a filter bag, after only 10 minutes of operation (ie, after vacuuming about 200 grams of dust), the suction power has decreased by half and continues to weaken when the dust bag gradually fills.Vacuum Cleaner work diagram Inside filter bag, dust will reduce the suction powerBut what if it could be improved? If you can completely remove the filter bag and replace it with another kit. And then, your dust filter becomes an enhanced experience, up to 5 times, and maintains maximum continuous gravity compared to using a filter bag, helping you to vacuum cleaner.Increasing the suction power by up to 5 times if nothing obstructs airflowFurthermore, what if your electricity bill with a vacuum cleaner reduced by half? You will not have to pay a eclectricity bill for the useless power of the vacuum cleaner when it tries to vacuum the air through the gaps in the filter bag that has already been filled with tiny speck of dust.Illustrated vacuum cleaner bag filter typicalThis is just an illustration and we are not referring to any manufacturerDo not stop there - assuming that it's also used forever, easy to clean after use, cost savings and environmental protection.It is difficult to clean the cloth filter bagSolving problems:This is iFilter, by combining Cyclone technology and Centrifugal force to create an innovative dust filter system that replaces the traditional filter bag, giving you a polite experience, more than 2 times energy-saving and more than 5 times vacuuming power. With three accelerating layers, two separating garbage, dust layers, iFilter  compresses garbage, dirt and pushes them down the dusty containing cup without interfering clean air. Keeping your vacuum cleaner capacity running at maximum power level, cooler motor and saving more energy than conventional filter bags.For a household, only with one-time investment cost, but can be used forever, iFilter helps you save more than $ 100 - $ 120 paper bag filter cost per year. This not only means that iFilter pays for itself only after a few months of use - but the reduce of the environmental impact of iFilter for paper production is huge.The best part? iFilter is commen for any vacuum cleaner using filter bags. The installation takes only seconds - no tools, no complicated directions, no hassle.Our integrated adapter makes it possible to fit onto the current vacuum cleaner tubes.iFilter is here to revolutionize your dust filter bag. Enjoying the fun of cyclonic technology every time you vacuum.Transparent plastic structure, iFilter makes it easy to see the fill of garbage, dust, etc. in the container.How can iFilter be able to separate and retain dust? This is because iFilter use cyclone technology and Centrifugal force.Principle of separation of dust by centrifugal force 
iFilter has 3 layer increase centrifugal force and 2 dusty filter layers and as mentioned above. We had to calculate and test a lot of times (with tombstone smelly and tear-free) to achieve the optimum result as today, the garbage and dust are completely trapped in the iFilter dustbin, ensuring that the air escaping from the iFilter is completely fresh and clean. 
&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;br&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
Experiment with fiber garbage - 120fps slow motion ultimate video
 

Experiment with fine powdered garbage - 120fps slow motion ultimate video
With a capacity of up to 500ml (both compartments), you can easily use iFilter to clean the whole house without having to worry about the trash compartment is full, however we still recommend you to dispode the garbage after use to ensure hygiene.

Although dust particles bind to each other, producing larger dust particles, do not make dust spit out when you litter in iFilter, but for those with asthma symptoms, we advise you to put some water into the iFilter before littering, this ensures 100% there is no dust coming out and harming your health every time you litter.. Easy to clean iFilter.With attractive design and compact size, the iFilter can be left as a display in the kitchen rather than in a corner of the house.Our vision for the future is a world where technology brings new innovations that not only improve the quality of life for people but also create sustainable future for their children.By creating a five times more efficient dust filtration system, saving thousands of kw of useless household energy consumption every year - while giving them a luxury experience - we hope to do our part in this mission.Our storyWe are iMesh Team, a start-up company established in 2016 in Vietnam with 03 friends who have from 05 to 10 years experience working in large corporations in Vietnam. We work in the field of software development and IoT medical devices. Our work often involves working with prototypes for testing so the office is always filled with small pieces of plastic. The iFilter concept was launched in February, 2016, when our vacuum cleaner was blocked up at 11pm, when there were not many places still open to sell dust bags..iMesh TeamSince then, Mr Tien Nguyen - Founder of iMESH Team has worked hard to make this vision a reality. Mr Tien Nguyen - Founder of iMesh TeamInitially, after the first prototype was completed, the result was good. And suddenly we discovered the hidden potential in iFilter. We have contacted our neighbors, friends, relatives and partner companies as testers and received positive feedback. Being encouraged by the feedback, we then went on to search for a manufacturer. The production process is not as easy as it looks, when we look back, we find that this job takes a lot of time. We finally succeeded and found a completely reliable and professional manufacturer that we could use.iFilter is 100% originate from Vietnam.iFilter is 100% fully developed and tested by iMESH Team. All production processes and distribution chains have been organized and are waiting to be put into operation.From the bottom of our hearts, we want to thank our friends, family and supporters as you have helped us achieve this.We can not do without all!Your feedback, support and advice continue to inspire us every day to make a better product.Main features of iFilter:- Increasing suction force more than 5 times than using paper filter bag (or fabric)- Saving useless energy, reducing the cost of electricity more than 2 times.- Saving $ 100-120 annually for the cost of purchasing paper bags.- Cleaning the dust at the nanometer scale- Being easy to clean, able to use forever.Timeline:

story:
Who We Are

ODIN Materials, Inc. is founded and operated by Doc and Rebecca Hudson in order to provide sustainable materials from renewable resources using regenerative processes. In short, we use climate-saving techniques to create materials using resources that can be replaced. We are a married founding team and dedicated to the success of our planet for the generations behind us. 

  • We use resources that also sequester carbon
  • Resources are used to create necessary building materials
  • These materials are more efficient than traditional building materials

The prices of building materials and their effects on the environment need to change. We can make better, sustainable building products with less impact and lower cost. We all use lumber at some point, whether it is a home project or for a trade, lumber is a massive necessity. IT CAN BE BETTER.

Meat and Potatoes

In order for us to create Dope Wood, we will need to fabricate a prototype for our wood press, purchase classifying equipment to separate fibers, obtain proper licensing, and hire talented individuals to be a part of our team. Once we have these things in place, we will be able to acquire hemp biomass from local farmers and start creating Dope Wood!

Our prototype will serve as the first step toward our goal of replacing traditional timber-based dimensional lumber. Trees are a valuable asset against climate change, this is a way to prevent the loss of such an asset. The growth cycle of hemp is much quicker than that of trees. This means we can plant and harvest more often than what is done now and in many places, not unlike trees, hemp can grow year-round with minimal water consumption. Pressing Dope Wood will be simplified by our system. The press will apply adhesive, heat, and pressure in one cycle. Once the wood is pressed, we will dry it and cure it in order to store it for a predetermined amount of time before we supply it to distributors and directly to customers. Our prototype will help us nail down and perfect these processes in order to hit a much larger production value. 

The Impact

Being able to stamp our lumber out of hemp rather than cutting down and milling trees will provide many advantages in logistical and mill costs. Every contribution brings us one step closer to providing a cheaper and more sustainable wood product. 

We started this journey several years ago living in Boise, Idaho. Even then, before Covid, lumber prices were high for the consumer. Not nearly as bad now, but still high. This led us to research alternatives, mainly in hemp. As a military veteran and spouse, we are firm advocates for the benefits of cannabis and are always working to disprove the stigmas. We worked hard during a pandemic to start our very own hemp farm in Ontario, Oregon in order to serve veterans with PTSD and provide the CBD/CBG that they need. Hudson Farms, LLC. was established in September of 2020 on 19 acres of land with ~6 acres that are currently registered with the ODA to grow hemp. We intend to add 5 more acres of hemp and a greenhouse next year. We currently have a CBD variety crop growing and we intend to use a portion of the flower for adhesive R and D for Dope Wood and the biomass will go towards building materials. Our intention is to use as much of every type of biomass possible, so we can provide an outlet for waste rather than it being burned in a field or used as ditch filler. We also hope that this will be an outlet for crops that have too high of a THC content and do not meet state-specific and federal regulations. These crops are typically disposed of by burning which is also not good for the environment. Dope Wood could be the green alternative and use that biomass in a renewable way.

Our process of turning hemp into dimensional lumber will make a large impact on all lumber prices. By introducing a structurally more efficient and cheaper product than current lumber, we will shift some of the focus from traditional lumber which will even out the supply and demand. Putting our products directly into the housing market will also help us lower the cost of home construction. 

Risks & Challenges

We have faced many difficult challenges and have overcome quite a bit to get to this point. This determination is our largest asset, but we are aware that there are always controlling factors that work beyond our means. The largest risk we take is that the press we design does not work as intended. Risk mitigation is a very important and valuable tool in this area, we understand the risk of mechanical failures and imperfections, we also know how to be proactive towards these risks.

Any company deciding to take on the global lumber industry must understand the parameters of that challenge, we are ready. Hemp is a miraculous plant and can take many forms, many more than a tree can. Lumber is only the beginning. ODIN Materials is focused on the creation of sustainable materials, we intend to make everything from aeronautics materials to textiles with some energy components in between. We view the challenge of the lumber industry as just our first step in providing people with sustainable and affordable materials. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We are developing the next step in materials manufacturing and product creation, not a whole lot of people know about it. If you are unable to contribute, please help us in spreading the word! we can be found on Twitter at @inc_odin and our website is www.odinmaterials.com. Not only are we helping to overcome ridiculous lumber prices and deforestation, but we are also trying to build better manufacturing practices for others to follow.  

Feel free to contact us at ContactODIN@odinmaterials.com

story:
Me & my Wife own two EV cars (Outlander PHEV and Nissan Leaf) and I’m electric car tuner (evtun.com). Main problem I have noticed while charging our EV cars at home is that we have 3-phase connection at home, but limited to 14,5A per phase (this is very common in Europe in small houses).
If you want to charge your EV car quicker, fuses will go off. 10A charger is a real maximum.
I decided to solve this in one step – intelligent 2-phase to „superphase” converter, that loads two phases equally. Also it monitors current and if you switch on something loading one of phases used, it will immediately reduce speed of charging of car to avoid fuses to react.

- My prototype uses clever conversion from 230V phases to 240V „superphase” - this helps with another 5% acceleration because EV cars limit current and accept any voltage up to 260V.

- Z-wave is added, you can integrate charger with your home network.

- Charger uses profiled charging and voltage for cars with known issues or with extra capabilities:

1. Outlander PHEV – it blocks prebalancing (factory charger slows down to almost 1A, for 25 minutes if battery was empty) so Outlander charges full 3.6 kW every hour, including first hour (without that trick – 2.2 kW only within first hour). This charger is almost 3x faster than factory 10A for Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV.
2. Nissan Leaf – charger charges it to 90% SOC, then stops, or 90% SOC, stops for 15 min to cool battery down and then – finishes charging (effectively this is faster and more safe for battery).

- I want to add bluetooth and RFID access (with cards or RFID tokens) and application to control more sophisticated parameters of charging / cooling battery.

- I also want to add 3.6 inch control panel with touchscreen

- Charger will have detacheable 400V cable, so you may have more cables, for 230V or for 400V for instance if you take charger with you

- If I have enough funds, I would like to produce IP32 protected mould for it (now it is IP30, so not splash proof).

I want this charger to be really fast alternative of factory Type1 chargers. My prototype works perfect for 3 months, now I want to convert it into final product.

I decided to use crowdfunding, as I would like to optimize design, look, weight and add some functions like improved Z-wave, bluetooth, control app for Android/iPhone and access with RFID. Also 3.6 inch touchscreen will be nice :)

Thank you for helping me and green future!

story:
REDEFINING WIND ENERGY

Bahari Energy’s mission is to research, develop and bring to the marketplace an adaptation of an ancient wind management technology: a wind tower or more accurately wind window. In order to cool the residences of Middle Eastern homes, wind catching windows were built in the uppermost portion of the residence - often atop a hillside with the residence below. (See Pictures- 1, 2, and 3). The wind entering the window circulates downward through the residence and out the lower level, providing cooling comfort along the way. Imagine standing at the entry to a cave with wind rushing past your face, downward toward the cooler interior.

 Picture-1     Drawing of a wind-catcher system 

 

Picture-2     A working windcatcher or badgir in central Iran

 

Picture-3      A working windcatcher or badgir in central Iran

 

 Picture-4        Rendition of a double Wind Tower attached to a school

 

The concept of wind catching is the foundation premise of the wind tower that you see in Picture- 5. The Bahari Wind Tower multiplies the speed of the wind entering and then utilizes the wind to produce torque which turns a turbine to drive a generator, producing electricity.

Picture-5    Pictured is a half-sized prototype fabricated under a small grant  provided by the State of Maryland

While simple in concept, keen architecture and proper location are key to a successful Wind Tower. Walking on the street, you may have experienced gusts of wind between buildings. (See Picture- 6). This phenomenon, called the wind tunnel effect, is caused by the proximity of buildings creating low pressure regions which increase the speed of wind. Wind Towers utilize the wind tunnel effect, transforming wind that is barely noticeable into wind that can be harnessed for energy, as seen in Picture- 4.

Picture-6     Wind Tunnel Effect

The Wind Tower design can be incorporated into the architecture of a residence or public building with relative ease. Its dimensional footprint is negotiable with a minimum 10 x 10 foot base with a 36 foot height and single turbine. By incorporating multiple turbines, manipulating wind vectoring and boundary layer effects, additional wind catching elements can be added. (See picture-5). 

 

The environmental impact and safety concerns of conventional external bladed turbines, with their massive turning propeller (See Picture- 7), are the leading causes for finding alternative solutions. In our alternative strategy, the turning element of this technology is housed internally. Thus, noise is kept at a minimum and moving parts are not visible. Wildlife are further protected via netting, which prevents entry into the tower. The tower itself is not an eyesore and may be incorporated into the visible structure or can be designed to be relatively obscure to the viewer.

Picture-7   Wind Farm

The wind tower advances the current wind harnessing technologies in usage around the globe to produce renewable energy at a relative micro-scale compared to distributed systems which have dominated the industry to date (see Picture - 8)  A fact not relatively well-appreciated is the cyclical effect that nature provides: wind blows most often and with greater intensity when the sun is not shining. Wind-centric wind tower technology will thus partner with sun-powered technology, finding its place in the continuum of available natural power sources including tidal and geothermal energy sourcing. The Wind Tower can be a sustainable source of energy for all households and companies. Mother Nature provides a wealth of renewable energy sources that can be used together. The Wind Tower can be equipped with solar panels to capture the scorching power of the sun during the day, when wind is at its weakest. When the sun sets, the Wind Tower can capture the more powerful and more frequent gusts of wind. 

Picture-8    Transmission lines

MuItiple Advances Incorporated into One Machine

Our technology is not simply one concept. It is a combination of multiple technologies to deliver the highest level of efficiency. Our technology incorporates patented wind catching designs, wind-shaping internal components, efficient light-weight turbine and torque enhancing gearbox design (See Picture- 9) with a pleasing architectural design that is malleable.

Picture-9   NASA Gear Bearing Technology

Features:

1- The Wind Tower’s superior technology generates electricity efficiently at wind speeds from 3 to 15 mph or (1.35 m/s) to (6.75 m/s) compared to other wind turbines requiring cutting in wind speeds of minimal 6 mph (2.7 m/s), and more typically 7 or 8 mph.

2- Favorable electric energy delivery prices – today’s corporate and individual consumers demand value for their dollars. Wind Tower can generate power as much as 90% below cost in markets such as New York City, Boston and Hawaii.

3- Scalable sizes.

4- Convenient location placement.

5- An installed Wind Tower is unobtrusive, and therefore unlikely to arouse citizen protests during zoning hearings.

6- Architecturally adaptable to any building designs.

Current Stage:

Wind Tower technology is proven. Bahari Energy has a working prototype for continued research and testing at the University of Maryland Baltimore County. Currently Bahari Energy is planning to build a full size unit ( 10 ft. x 10 ft. x 36 ft.), along with integration of NASA's gear bearing technology, and install it in the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center. This will be our first full-size commercial working unit. Subsequently, we will start marketing the Wind Tower, starting with our immediate potential clients who have shown interest to purchase one or several units.

Our accomplishments are;

1- Two patents relating to the Wind Tower technology.

2- License to use three of NASA's gear bearing technology patents to incorporate into Bahari Energy Wind Tower technology.

3- Proof of concept through half scale prototype testing and extensive simulations funded by a small grant from the State of Maryland.

Next steps to be accomplished are;

1- Efficiency development phase:

     a) Construct a full size Wind Tower

     b) Adopting NASA's gear bearing technology with the Wind Tower. 

     c) Introduce an energy storage unit for wind gusting environments

     d) Apply multiple generators and alternators per turbine

     e) Install multiple turbines

     f) Introduce multiple wind catchers

    g) Introduce basic smart tower components such as sensors to communicate with an internal CPU controlling device.  

2- Commercialization:

    a) Vast marketing to introduce the Wind Tower to the public and various government/private entities.

    b)  Hiring/training a sales force with crafted marketing tools

3- Production/Warehousing/Delivery

How Our Products Are Different From the Rest:

1- A smart Tower with CPU/sensors unit and various efficient components.

2- Up to eight times the energy output to comparable turbines.

3- Electricity generation cut-in rate of 3 mph of wind speed

4- Compact size ideal for urban areas

5- Modular quick-up design for emergency and field operations (military and severe weather applications)

5- Roof mounted, within or adjacent to buildings, or stand alone

6- Self-supported weight structure (if not roof mounted)

7- Environmentally friendly with internally hidden blades 

8- Easy to transport and assemble with knockdown thermal panels

9- NASA's gear bearing technology within the Wind Tower 

10- Gusting wind energy storage component

11- Multi-generators/turbines component

12- Smart Tower featuring by way of CPU control devise through sensors and selection of on-board various efficiency components to harness the most energy available at the time.   

 

                                             Unique Benefit

Scale-able output, Micro/Marco level for urban/rural areas or power plant usage.  

                                             Cool Feature

Integrated with most architectural condition. Architects can incorporate this technology into any property/building designs inside or outside as a utility or even artistic feature to enhance overall interior or exterior appearance of a building. It could also be used next to an elevator shaft to harness some of the energy from air movement of elevators moving up and down.

                                              Awesome Tech

Depending on type of usage and tower exposure, this tower can be used for placing advertising signs outside attaching to the Wind Tower walls, while generating power inside. The use of advertising could generate additional revenue which can pay for the technology.

                                              Killer Feature

Our Wind Tower technology will be a smart tower which will sense outside conditions and adjust itself accordingly to harness maximum electricity output.

Request Fund:

$100,000.00

Funding usage:

Fund generated from this campaign will be used to construct a full-size Wind Tower technology integrated with NASA's gear bearing technology and potentially to be installed in the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center compound in Greenbelt, Maryland

Extra funding usage:

In the event this campaign exceeds our requested amount, additional funding will be used to create a Smart Tower by adding several other components, sensors, and CPU unit.

This campaign impact:

The impact of your contribution will allow the company to fully develop a smart Wind Tower. This Tower will be integrated with various efficiency components and sensors to harness maximum energy by adjusting itself to any surrounding condition. Therefore, a smart renewable energy technology will have profound impact on our lives, our planet and create many new manufacturing, field work, electronic and research/development jobs. 

Bahari Energy intends to give shares to certain contributors, so that you may own part of the company. As Bahari Energy grows, so may your portfolio

Other ways to contribute:

People who do not fund can still spread the word so others can contribute and move the campaign into higher level by using the Indiegogo share tools

Perks:

1- All contributors will receive periodically online newsletter of the company and its technologies progress

2- Contributors with $75 or more will receive a T shirt with the Wind Tower logo

3- Contributors with $100 or more will receive one time 200% of their contributions credit toward direct purchasing of one or more towers under one transaction. For example a $1000  contribution will give you one time $2000 credit toward tower purchasing
story_txt: REDEFINING WIND ENERGYBahari Energy’s mission is to research, develop and bring to the marketplace an adaptation of an ancient wind management technology: a wind tower or more accurately wind window. In order to cool the residences of Middle Eastern homes, wind catching windows were built in the uppermost portion of the residence - often atop a hillside with the residence below. (See Pictures- 1, 2, and 3). The wind entering the window circulates downward through the residence and out the lower level, providing cooling comfort along the way. Imagine standing at the entry to a cave with wind rushing past your face, downward toward the cooler interior. Picture-1     Drawing of a wind-catcher system  Picture-2     A working windcatcher or badgir in central Iran Picture-3      A working windcatcher or badgir in central Iran  Picture-4        Rendition of a double Wind Tower attached to a school The concept of wind catching is the foundation premise of the wind tower that you see in Picture- 5. The Bahari Wind Tower multiplies the speed of the wind entering and then utilizes the wind to produce torque which turns a turbine to drive a generator, producing electricity.Picture-5    Pictured is a half-sized prototype fabricated under a small grant  provided by the State of MarylandWhile simple in concept, keen architecture and proper location are key to a successful Wind Tower. Walking on the street, you may have experienced gusts of wind between buildings. (See Picture- 6). This phenomenon, called the wind tunnel effect, is caused by the proximity of buildings creating low pressure regions which increase the speed of wind. Wind Towers utilize the wind tunnel effect, transforming wind that is barely noticeable into wind that can be harnessed for energy, as seen in Picture- 4.Picture-6     Wind Tunnel EffectThe Wind Tower design can be incorporated into the architecture of a residence or public building with relative ease. Its dimensional footprint is negotiable with a minimum 10 x 10 foot base with a 36 foot height and single turbine. By incorporating multiple turbines, manipulating wind vectoring and boundary layer effects, additional wind catching elements can be added. (See picture-5).  The environmental impact and safety concerns of conventional external bladed turbines, with their massive turning propeller (See Picture- 7), are the leading causes for finding alternative solutions. In our alternative strategy, the turning element of this technology is housed internally. Thus, noise is kept at a minimum and moving parts are not visible. Wildlife are further protected via netting, which prevents entry into the tower. The tower itself is not an eyesore and may be incorporated into the visible structure or can be designed to be relatively obscure to the viewer.Picture-7   Wind FarmThe wind tower advances the current wind harnessing technologies in usage around the globe to produce renewable energy at a relative micro-scale compared to distributed systems which have dominated the industry to date (see Picture - 8)  A fact not relatively well-appreciated is the cyclical effect that nature provides: wind blows most often and with greater intensity when the sun is not shining. Wind-centric wind tower technology will thus partner with sun-powered technology, finding its place in the continuum of available natural power sources including tidal and geothermal energy sourcing. The Wind Tower can be a sustainable source of energy for all households and companies. Mother Nature provides a wealth of renewable energy sources that can be used together. The Wind Tower can be equipped with solar panels to capture the scorching power of the sun during the day, when wind is at its weakest. When the sun sets, the Wind Tower can capture the more powerful and more frequent gusts of wind. Picture-8    Transmission linesMuItiple Advances Incorporated into One MachineOur technology is not simply one concept. It is a combination of multiple technologies to deliver the highest level of efficiency. Our technology incorporates patented wind catching designs, wind-shaping internal components, efficient light-weight turbine and torque enhancing gearbox design (See Picture- 9) with a pleasing architectural design that is malleable.Picture-9   NASA Gear Bearing TechnologyFeatures:1- The Wind Tower’s superior technology generates electricity efficiently at wind speeds from 3 to 15 mph or (1.35 m/s) to (6.75 m/s) compared to other wind turbines requiring cutting in wind speeds of minimal 6 mph (2.7 m/s), and more typically 7 or 8 mph.2- Favorable electric energy delivery prices – today’s corporate and individual consumers demand value for their dollars. Wind Tower can generate power as much as 90% below cost in markets such as New York City, Boston and Hawaii.3- Scalable sizes.4- Convenient location placement.5- An installed Wind Tower is unobtrusive, and therefore unlikely to arouse citizen protests during zoning hearings.6- Architecturally adaptable to any building designs.Current Stage:Wind Tower technology is proven. Bahari Energy has a working prototype for continued research and testing at the University of Maryland Baltimore County. Currently Bahari Energy is planning to build a full size unit ( 10 ft. x 10 ft. x 36 ft.), along with integration of NASA's gear bearing technology, and install it in the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center. This will be our first full-size commercial working unit. Subsequently, we will start marketing the Wind Tower, starting with our immediate potential clients who have shown interest to purchase one or several units.Our accomplishments are;1- Two patents relating to the Wind Tower technology.2- License to use three of NASA's gear bearing technology patents to incorporate into Bahari Energy Wind Tower technology.3- Proof of concept through half scale prototype testing and extensive simulations funded by a small grant from the State of Maryland.Next steps to be accomplished are;1- Efficiency development phase:     a) Construct a full size Wind Tower     b) Adopting NASA's gear bearing technology with the Wind Tower.      c) Introduce an energy storage unit for wind gusting environments     d) Apply multiple generators and alternators per turbine     e) Install multiple turbines     f) Introduce multiple wind catchers    g) Introduce basic smart tower components such as sensors to communicate with an internal CPU controlling device.  2- Commercialization:    a) Vast marketing to introduce the Wind Tower to the public and various government/private entities.    b)  Hiring/training a sales force with crafted marketing tools3- Production/Warehousing/DeliveryHow Our Products Are Different From the Rest:1- A smart Tower with CPU/sensors unit and various efficient components.2- Up to eight times the energy output to comparable turbines.3- Electricity generation cut-in rate of 3 mph of wind speed4- Compact size ideal for urban areas5- Modular quick-up design for emergency and field operations (military and severe weather applications)5- Roof mounted, within or adjacent to buildings, or stand alone6- Self-supported weight structure (if not roof mounted)7- Environmentally friendly with internally hidden blades 8- Easy to transport and assemble with knockdown thermal panels9- NASA's gear bearing technology within the Wind Tower 10- Gusting wind energy storage component11- Multi-generators/turbines component12- Smart Tower featuring by way of CPU control devise through sensors and selection of on-board various efficiency components to harness the most energy available at the time.                                                 Unique BenefitScale-able output, Micro/Marco level for urban/rural areas or power plant usage.                                               Cool FeatureIntegrated with most architectural condition. Architects can incorporate this technology into any property/building designs inside or outside as a utility or even artistic feature to enhance overall interior or exterior appearance of a building. It could also be used next to an elevator shaft to harness some of the energy from air movement of elevators moving up and down.                                              Awesome TechDepending on type of usage and tower exposure, this tower can be used for placing advertising signs outside attaching to the Wind Tower walls, while generating power inside. The use of advertising could generate additional revenue which can pay for the technology.                                              Killer FeatureOur Wind Tower technology will be a smart tower which will sense outside conditions and adjust itself accordingly to harness maximum electricity output.Request Fund:$100,000.00Funding usage:Fund generated from this campaign will be used to construct a full-size Wind Tower technology integrated with NASA's gear bearing technology and potentially to be installed in the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center compound in Greenbelt, MarylandExtra funding usage:In the event this campaign exceeds our requested amount, additional funding will be used to create a Smart Tower by adding several other components, sensors, and CPU unit.This campaign impact:The impact of your contribution will allow the company to fully develop a smart Wind Tower. This Tower will be integrated with various efficiency components and sensors to harness maximum energy by adjusting itself to any surrounding condition. Therefore, a smart renewable energy technology will have profound impact on our lives, our planet and create many new manufacturing, field work, electronic and research/development jobs. Bahari Energy intends to give shares to certain contributors, so that you may own part of the company. As Bahari Energy grows, so may your portfolioOther ways to contribute:People who do not fund can still spread the word so others can contribute and move the campaign into higher level by using the Indiegogo share toolsPerks:1- All contributors will receive periodically online newsletter of the company and its technologies progress2- Contributors with $75 or more will receive a T shirt with the Wind Tower logo3- Contributors with $100 or more will receive one time 200% of their contributions credit toward direct purchasing of one or more towers under one transaction. For example a $1000  contribution will give you one time $2000 credit toward tower purchasing

story:
The FlaX 3D printer is a recycling-focused filament production machine that can be used with pleasure by anyone interested in production, especially users.

FlaX is the filament production machine which is focused on recycling that anyone interested in production and especially 3D printer users can use with pleasure.

FlaX which started designing in 2017, has successfully completed all tests in one year and has become available in homes and Maker workshops.

FlaX makes production on its own, but it has two team-mates to help you to get your work faster and running more organized.

 

wrapper updated! 

wrapper 1.2 v 

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

It is actually a reduced version of the industrial extrusion machine.

These machines have 50 meter production lines due to their working style and production capacity.

FlaX has succeeded in bringing this production line to a level to be able to produce on your table by reducing it to fit your home conditions.

Production Prosess;

The auger inside the machine takes the raw material from the funnel.

Drag to the area of the resistance

Provides filament flow from nozzle after melting

The cooling air bearing allows the filament to cool down and prevents it from prolonging during downward movement.

The raw material in the funnel cycles the process.

 

During this entire cycle, FlaX ensures that the filament is of the same quality in every production by continuously calculating the precise temperature and speed settings to keep within the limits you set.

Why FlaX?

 

The advantages you will have with FlaX will give you the opportunity to be one step ahead in your projects.

• Thanks to the filaments that you produce in your home, you will be able to design the product color and quality variety according to your wishes.

• While your production costs are falling, you can continue your projects without any size dimension.

• It is possible to use extra filaments produced with FlaX in order to generate income.

• Thanks to its fast production capability, you can determine the price of the filaments you produce and sell them by e-commerce method and you can make a profit with FlaX.

Ease of Use

 

The way of the using FlaX is quite simple. At the design stage, the facilities which allow the use of even the younger individuals are considered.

• The power button gives the main power.

• The red power button activates the resistors.

• The green power button moves to the motor.

• Right dial adjusts motor speed.

• Left dial adjusts the temperature setting.

• Lets you focus on your work by saving you from fine tuning.

• It controls all the settings in the background thanks to its domestic software.

Color Selection

If you are working with FlaX, you do not need to buy a filament based kilogram for different color parts in your projects.

• Allows you to produce filament of your choice and the color you want.

• Makes you more creative and also provides economically more advantageous in your projects.

• You can produce colorful products with rainbow filaments that can create endless color combinations with the color pigments you will buy.

• You can produce as many colors as you can use with the part production technique and you can produce your products in different colors in your printers.

Color pigments allows you to define your colors.

 

Speed

FlaX is very fast in manufacturing, it has a production capacity of 1 kg filament per hour and saves you the time to wait for cargo, so you can spend more time on your projects and finish your work on time.

After the tests carried out by us, FlaX has been able to work continuously for 72 hours.

You can produce your filaments without interrupting your projects.

Production Quality

When producing FlaX, it uses FlaX WraPPer for layout and precision, so the filaments are produced with a precision of 0.03mm and the filaments produced are made to be matched to all printer brands by embracing the original FlaX pulley.

Raw Materials of Production;

  ABS Filament·    

  PLA Filament·     

  PVA Filament·   

 Nylon Filament·     

  eFlex Filament     

  Bronze Filament·     

  ePC Filament·     

  eMATe Filament·     

  eCOPPER Filament·               

  PETG Filament

Wooden Filament

Equipment of FlaX

With FlaX WraPPer (winder) and FlaX ShreDDer (crusher), you will be able to perform your operations in a shorter time.

 

• Using WraPPer during FlaX use only gives you a more precise and more organized environment.

• You can also produce with 0.3 precision without WraPPer, which means that you can only buy FlaX Filament Machineand create more economical solutions with one machine.

FlaX was designed as a stand-alone and making production capacity and its speed independent from ShreDDer and WraPPer.

FlaX ShreDDer converts your plastic products or pet bottles that you have collected in your house into raw materials.

Designed for recycling and suitable for home use, it works quietly and without vibration.

What Products Can You Convert?

 

• Domestic waste (PET bottle, plastic plate, plastic toys)

• Improper production waste (PLA, ABS, PETG, NYLON etc.)

By-products are optional and can be purchased later to create a more regular working environment and save time.

Profitability

FlaX enables you to save money economically while providing raw materials for your products.

When you look at the filament prices in the market, you will have to pay a minimum of 80TL to 100TL per 1 kg filament and as the brand and quality change, price will keep increasing.

However, the filaments you produce with FlaX are completely priced according to your preference.

• If you prefer to produce filament from scrap PET bottles, your cost can be almost zero cost in proportion to your desire to protect nature.

• If you have FlaX ShreDDer, you can use granular raw materials to make a decay, but if you do not have ShreDDer, you can also produce with granular raw material.

• You can produce filament in any color by paying only 25 TL per kg for ready-made granular raw materials.

• It provides an economical use with an hourly consumption of 160W electricity.

• • Switches off and on again the resistors at certain intervals during use to keep the power consumption low.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

In the first stage, the production capacity is limited to 900 machines per month. Due to the fact that the circuit boards for each machine produced are supplied from abroad and the inventory is difficult to make, the stocks are limited to 900 on a monthly basis. ARYATECH will increase the production capacity by eliminating this problem completely after printing of its own cards.

story:
Renewable energy, its creation and its use, have become something of a boring subject due to the way they are presented. This by itself is enough to stall progress and understanding. And there is no real central location to go to for a view of progress across a spectrum of technologies.

 

With The New Energy Focus, I will start to change that with both a website, and a magazine that is currently planned for quarterly issue.

 

The New Energy Focus will be a focal point for the latest information that is insightful while being entertaining and attention capturing. The secret will be in subject matter which will include articles on things people will find genuine interest in. I feel will start to break down some of the barriers, and biases, that surround the understanding of alternative energy and its use.

 

Along with information on the research, technology, and developments of energy we will also provide more exciting information on some of the uses of energy in the latest products.

 

Will people who disdain electric cars feel the same when reading about such cars as the Alieno Hypercar claiming 5221hp, or the latest model from Rimac? After reading about those, maybe they’ll be more interested in Honda's newly revealed Sports EV Concept - likely to become daily drivers for more people in the future.

With motorcycles, even Harley Davidson is now offering an electric variant with the development of their HD LiveWire … that may open some traditional eyes to see the works of established manufacturers such as Zero Motorcycles.

 

Flying cars are still not here, but the age of personal electric flying craft is. Dubai is about to premiere the Ehang flying drone as a sort of airborne taxi service, and Uber themselves commissioned a selection of architects and designers to design conceptual service hubs for their vehicles designed in collaboration with Embraer.

We will have a whole section on architecture, as the race to create efficiency in structures covers everything from vacation "pods" to residential homes, all the way through to commercial buildings and hotels. We'll showcase the already constructed and the conceptual - with an example being the design for condos mounted on wind generator towers on land and in the ocean.

Even boats and yachts are undergoing their own revolution, as demand grows for cleaner running and greater economy. The upside of the technology being incorporated is also quiet running and peaceful anchorages. Wait until you see the new Hinckley electric Dasher yacht and the Q Yacht Q30, then follow progress of the Energy Observer, the first real hydrogen powered yacht that processes seawater into hydrogen for propulsion.

 

PROGRESS

 

To get started we have launched our temporary website, and will be upgrading it to the full informational site as fast as possible. This will mean we will be spending the next several weeks contacting as many people as possible in the industry and gathering information and images. With this we will begin populating the site with as much of the latest information as possible

 

The magazine is in preliminary design, and is already starting to get exciting.

We’ll feature the look of the magazine right away on our website, and will keep everyone updated on its progress through the stages of design and growing content via a live link on the website to the latest stage of completion.

The Premiere Issue will be sent out in early November of 2018.

The magazine will be available digitally at no cost, worldwide, and we’re planning on a limited run of print pieces for promotional and special use as well.

 

 

 

That’s it for right now.

I really hope you see value in what I’m doing, and choose to help me in my endeavor. I will really appreciate it. Thank you!
