story:
Our battery charger does not need to be recharged, our design allows to maintain a charge 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year if necessary.

We can charge cellular phones, computers, music players, etc.

We will never again have to worry about running out of bacteria and not having a close contact to charge our appliances.
story_txt:
Our battery charger does not need to be recharged, our design allows to maintain a charge 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year if necessary.
We can charge cellular phones, computers, music players, etc.
We will never again have to worry about running out of bacteria and not having a close contact to charge our appliances.

story:
Let us think of outdoor electronic devices like the systems in weather station, some sensors or a data logger. In most of the conditions no power outlet is available and then we have to switch to batteries but they also soon gets off. So this solar power unit is designed to power your devices easily with very high power efficiency.

Why use solar power for low power applications?

Solar power is most easiest and most practical way to produce energy and to drive our future to a better tomorrow. However, solar power is not just a niche! One day, we will all be using solar power for every small and big applications and then solar energy would not be a non conventional source of energy. 

By using solar power for low power applications, we are taking big step towards solar power for small electronic devices. This enables a new class of embedded systems.

When you have a project like weather station, remote data logger, etc. or applications like this, you do not have to keep your sensing units on all the time. And of course in all this applications, powering is the major issue. If you turn on the the unit in 5 minute, it can save a lot energy. This unit has time delay of 5 minutes. The unit can also power your units when there is no sunlight(at night) as it has a rechargeable battery inside.

It's not just a solar powering unit and not just a timer. It's a combination of both of them!

Moreover this powering unit has a low voltage sensor which switches the unit to run on battery power when there is not enough sunlight.

Features:

  • Time switching device 
  • Can also work without sunlight!
  • Easy to use
  • Highly compatible with Arduino and other low power systems
  • Long battery life
  • Detachable solar panel
  • Less charging time
  • Portable
  • Clean energy

I repeat! It's portable...

Where you would use it?

This unit can be used by industries and also by electronic enthusiasts. 

Just click it and forget everything!!

Electronic enthusiasts can use it to make some great time switching projects and some outdoor circuits like weather station, remote data loggers, etc. Most of the makers widely use Arduino to prototype their projects and thus this unit is highly compatible with Arduino. 

Weather Stations

This unit can be used to power weather monitors. Here it is not necessary to keep the sensors working 24/7. They can be made working using specific time delay which can save a lot power. 

Data logggers

The unit can also be used to power data loggers. They can collect data at specific time delays saving energy.

Powering copper pipe theft alarm

Copper pipe theft is increasing day by day increasing demand of copper. For prevention of this, copper pipe theft alarms are placed in industries.

"There's no question the theft has gotten much, much worse," said Mike Adelizzi, president of the American Supply Association, a nonprofit group representing distributors and suppliers in the plumbing, heating, cooling and industrial pipe industries.

This unit can be used to power the alarm system. In daytime we can use timer mode as the chances are lower for theft at daytime. For night time, special switch is placed in unit which keeps Arduino awake all the time. Thus, saving energy at daytime and using it at night.

Leakage detection

The unit can be used to power leakage detector circuit. This will check the leakage every specific time interval thus, saving energy.

In industries:

The timers are necessary to time the tasking and production which then enables to calculate costs and other elements.

But here, it's not just a timer it is power saving timer which powers your equipment.

Inspirations:

There were few online projects that made the making of prototype possible like:

https://www.hackster.io/igorF2/solar-charged-ba...

https://www.instructables.com/id/SOLAR-POWERED-...

Rates:

If you combine a solar powering unit and a timer, it will cost you 30$ in all but by backing this campaign, you  can get them in low prices up to 17$ per unit. 

And we will plant a tree whenever backer back this campaign no matter he claims any of the perk or not.

Please support us by backing this campaign and also share this on facebook and twitter.

Thanks!
story_txt:
Let us think of outdoor electronic devices like the systems in weather station, some sensors or a data logger. In most of the conditions no power outlet is available and then we have to switch to batteries but they also soon gets off. So this solar power unit is designed to power your devices easily with very high power efficiency.Why use solar power for low power applications?Solar power is most easiest and most practical way to produce energy and to drive our future to a better tomorrow. However, solar power is not just a niche! One day, we will all be using solar power for every small and big applications and then solar energy would not be a non conventional source of energy. By using solar power for low power applications, we are taking big step towards solar power for small electronic devices. This enables a new class of embedded systems.When you have a project like weather station, remote data logger, etc. or applications like this, you do not have to keep your sensing units on all the time. And of course in all this applications, powering is the major issue. If you turn on the the unit in 5 minute, it can save a lot energy. This unit has time delay of 5 minutes. The unit can also power your units when there is no sunlight(at night) as it has a rechargeable battery inside.It's not just a solar powering unit and not just a timer. It's a combination of both of them!Moreover this powering unit has a low voltage sensor which switches the unit to run on battery power when there is not enough sunlight.Features:
Time switching device 
Can also work without sunlight!
Easy to use
Highly compatible with Arduino and other low power systems
Long battery life
Detachable solar panel
Less charging time
Portable
Clean energy
I repeat! It's portable...Where you would use it?This unit can be used by industries and also by electronic enthusiasts. Just click it and forget everything!!Electronic enthusiasts can use it to make some great time switching projects and some outdoor circuits like weather station, remote data loggers, etc. Most of the makers widely use Arduino to prototype their projects and thus this unit is highly compatible with Arduino. Weather StationsThis unit can be used to power weather monitors. Here it is not necessary to keep the sensors working 24/7. They can be made working using specific time delay which can save a lot power. Data logggersThe unit can also be used to power data loggers. They can collect data at specific time delays saving energy.Powering copper pipe theft alarmCopper pipe theft is increasing day by day increasing demand of copper. For prevention of this, copper pipe theft alarms are placed in industries."There's no question the theft has gotten much, much worse," said Mike Adelizzi, president of the American Supply Association, a nonprofit group representing distributors and suppliers in the plumbing, heating, cooling and industrial pipe industries.This unit can be used to power the alarm system. In daytime we can use timer mode as the chances are lower for theft at daytime. For night time, special switch is placed in unit which keeps Arduino awake all the time. Thus, saving energy at daytime and using it at night.Leakage detectionThe unit can be used to power leakage detector circuit. This will check the leakage every specific time interval thus, saving energy.In industries:The timers are necessary to time the tasking and production which then enables to calculate costs and other elements.But here, it's not just a timer it is power saving timer which powers your equipment.Inspirations:There were few online projects that made the making of prototype possible like:https://www.hackster.io/igorF2/solar-charged-ba...https://www.instructables.com/id/SOLAR-POWERED-...Rates:If you combine a solar powering unit and a timer, it will cost you 30$ in all but by backing this campaign, you  can get them in low prices up to 17$ per unit. And we will plant a tree whenever backer back this campaign no matter he claims any of the perk or not.Please support us by backing this campaign and also share this on facebook and twitter.Thanks!

story:
What are we doing?

Hi, my name is Francis, and I am the founder of Avocado Solar. We are passionate about solar energy solutions for global warming. Our goal is to create great solar products that people love. Recently, my startup was accepted into Singularity University's Global Startup Program (GSP)2019 cohort. GSP supports startups that address global grand challenges (GGCs) such as global warming, poverty and illiteracy, while helping startup entrepreneurs start, grow and scale their businesses. We are raising funds to participate in GSP and lay the foundation for smart solar solution development. 

What is our Massively Transformative Purpose (MTP)?

Our mission (MTP) is to accelerate the mainstream adoption of clean energy. Our moonshot (inspirational goal) is to achieve 100% clean energy adoption by 2030. We must do this not only for our generation, but for our children and future generations. Global warming is unequivocally real. We cannot ignore it any longer. Some disastrous effects of climate change include: more severe weather such as hurricanes, tornados and wildfires, wildlife extinction, acidic oceans and higher sea levels (flooding lowlying cities).

Click here to read NASA's evidence for Global Warming

How can the Global StartUp Program (GSP) help?

Over 90% of startups fail. This is due to many reasons such as a poor business plan, not meeting market needs with their products (i.e., poor product-market fit), etc. GSP will best position our solar startup for success, helping us build the best solar products that people truly love. We want to bring forward-thinking products to consumers that enriches people's lives while at the same time benefiting our planet. Without GSP, there is a risk that our products will not meet your expectations. GSP will help us launch a company that focuses on making great solar products and services that meet (and exceed) consumer needs.

 


Click here to read GSP's full document (PDF) 

Why are solar products important?

Simply put, solar products are great for the environment. Traditional energy production methods using fossil fuels, like coal, result in the emission of greenhouse gases. This is important because greenhouse gases (e.g., carbon dioxide, methane, etc.) increase global warming. If we can get more people to use solar products, we can drastically reduce greenhouse gas emissions and global warming. 

And if that isn't enough, solar products will keep money in your pocket! While the upfront cost may seem high, solar technology is a great investment because solar power is free! So even if you can't operate completely on solar power, you will still save money (and the planet) in the long term. 

How can you help?

At Avocado Solar, it is our mission to create great solar products that will help you, and benefit our planet. We strongly believe GSP will jumpstart our mission. We are on a tight deadline to raise the tuition needed for this wonderful program. 

You can help in several ways:

    1) Donations of any size are greatly appreciated to help meet our $30,000 goal.
    2) If you can't donate, please share this post and help us spread the word!
    3) If you know someone who may be interested in our project, please pass the word - everything helps!

Use of Funds

Our $30,000 goal will go completely towards the GSP tuition. This will allow us to take the first steps necessary to create innovative solar products for the world to love! Any funds raised beyond our initial goal will go towards refining our minimum viable products (MVPs) to get them into your hands as quickly as possible!

We invite you to join us on our journey, and be a part of the solution.

story:
Short Summary

I've always dreamed to explore the world, to understand its unique mechanisms and to help us humans to use it properly creating a future without destroying it. My name is Todor Mihaylov, a renewable energy engineer, teacher and artist, always asking questions and creating things.

I've started this project in Varna, Bulgaria with Stiliyan Hvarchilkov, a good friend who study naval architecture here. Our idea was to make more people aware of the constantly growing problems with the environment, especially the sea.

We needed a kind of an "eye" able to explore and record the magnificence and the problems all around the world, so we can share it with you. After about two years of developing, changing from a solar powered vessel in different sizes, able to travel around the world without stop, we finally get in to the idea to build an autonomous sea drone, which is much more cost-effective and secure explorer (with no people on board), able to travel on top and underwater. And the best part of this solution is that you'll be able to buy one, so you can explore the sea yourself.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Finding resources is a crucial part in the beginning of every project. This is the point where many good ideas and causes die, before they were even born, and we are not exception.

We already managed ourselves to build our own sustainable laboratory and to buy some initial electronics and materials to start working. But in order to prototype such advanced technology, we need a financial resource which we can't cover. This is why we need your help!

We've planned a 25 000 USD to be needed in order to create a real working prototype, ready for demonstration. Costs will be distributed as follows:

1. Materials and technologies: The bigger part of the "cake" is for buying materials, parts and some custom technologies (for example, the solar "sail/wing" of the drone should be manufactured by third-party company, by our own custom design).

2. Required instruments: We also need some advanced tools to help us with creating the body, mechanics and electronics.

3. Engineering work: Includes the costs for professional engineers who will need to guide our team and to deal with the complicated tasks.

4. Test, fixes and improvements: We realize that the prototype may not succeed from the first time. This is why we've planned some additional costs for dealing with eventual failures.

That's enough for what we need.
What you get for your help is more important for us...

During the prototype developing process, we prepared a valuable reward for your help: donation certificates, recording your name on our "wall of fame", personal update notifications, basic or full access to the on-board monitoring platform and opportunity to invest. 

1. Contribution Certificate: Every perk provides you a personal donation certificate that we print and send via post, all over the world. And because helping us you help the sea and nature, we use natural materials to make it. Pictures will be available soon.

2. Your Name on our "Wall of Fame": We design a special board in front of our laboratory, that will contain the names of everyone who help us to move ahead. 

3. Personal update: For some of the perks we provide a personal e-mail update for the stage of development including important events, latest development strategies, release dates etc. 

4. Access to the on-board monitoring platform: Neptune is a research water drone. It will be equipped not only with cameras, but also with bunch of sensors, probes etc. All the data will be available online, but with limited access and will be much more expensive. Some of the perks give you the unique chance to monitor the Neptune's data, without any limits.

5. Opportunity to invest: Because we develop a prototype, we can't provide a pre-order option. But you have a way to invest in this project. The "Invest in Neptune" perk gives an approximately calculation of the price for commercial version of Neptune. When we succeed and get to the market, if the real price is lower, we will return you the difference. But if it's higher, we will send you the product without asking you to pay more. 

 

The Impact

Starting with a single sketch, this project underwent a major development, revealing its true mission and application, not only in our work, not only for other organizations, but also for people like you, who dream to explore the unknown itself. 

The main goal of Neptune is to become your "eyes without limits" in the water, revealing the magnificence and problems of the river, sea and the ocean, helping you not only to explore it, but to understand it and to join us in the way of preserving it. We can do it together. But we need your help to take the road from the concept to the production line. 

 

Risks & Challenges

A prototype explorer, fully equipped with analyzing and monitoring system will be created, whether this campaign does reach its goal or not. So this is not a question. But we took a risk when we placed the option (perk) to invest into a future market product.

We are ambitious, qualified and experienced to deal with every difficulty and failure, but we are not immortal heroes. The way to the production-line is too long and there is always a chance for something to happen that we are not able to overcome. This is why we provide a protection of the "Invest in Neptune" perk, so if we aren't able to produce and send you a product, you will be fully refunded.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can contribute for the success of this campaign in many ways: choose a perk, share or just follow our journey and give us feedback.

Check out our channels and pages:
The Rare Blue Website, Facebook, YouTube, Instagram

Don't forget to try the Indiegogo share and comment tools. It's easier.

Now fill your glass with rum like a true Sea-Wolf, and join us on this amazing adventure!

THANK YOU!

story:
Project Ark is a revolutionary fundraising project backed by WWF Panda Labs using "digital collectibles" (NFTs) to directly support community-led conservation projects that brings back the bison to the Carpathian Mountains.

This is an exclusive chance to get your hands on a rare and unique piece of artwork! These exquisite digital collectibles embed the century-old, local traditions of intricate Romanian Eggs transformed into precious and exquisite visual artworks that even include melodious original musical compositions!

Proceeds from the digital collectibles in the form of Eggs will unlock the funding needed to support a community conservation challenge led by WWF in Romania that brings back the bison to the wilder side of Europe - the Carpathian Mountains - as well as to develop the digital infrastructure making the link between the global participants and the local do-ers, both in terms of tracing funds, impact and enabling participatory decision making. 


EGG-CITED?

The NFT eggs are ornate, 3D, and come in four tiers: Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum. Furthermore, a portion of the eggs contains a hidden reward inside. The designer for the NFT Eggs, Arturo Fernandez, drew inspiration from the century-old Romanian tradition to design these incredible pieces of digital art. 

 

One thing that makes our NFT eggs extra special is that they come with entirely original songs, which utilize traditional Romanian instruments to create some very ethereal sounds. The music was created by the incredible Fredrik Eriksson and Jake Goble from the bands Grizfolk and Enjune. They bring years of experience across the music industry, not only performing but also working with some of the world’s biggest brands in the world via their company PURPLEGANG. Their contribution to Project Ark was born out of their artist project Allauras, which was conceived as a way to assemble and empower a new generation of digital artists who have the passion to create impact through audio/visual experiences.

This will be the only time that you will be able to purchase the digital collectible Eggs (NFTs) without having to acquire them using cryptocurrencies.   The initial round of funding marks an important moment for what is about to come, as the digital assets will allow you to have access to specific events, celebrities, and much more. ​

FROM NFTs to NGOs

Project Ark is supporting the testing of a project in a landscape that is home to Europe’s largest network of virgin forests, where the highest populations of wolves and brown bears are, and where WWF has been leading an ambitious initiative that re-introduces the bison in the region - with now over 60 free-roaming bison.

In order to boost these efforts and slow down the decline of these precious European ecosystems, we need to channel funding directly to the local communities who are standing in the front line with their hands on these natural resources. By this, we aim to fund locals to do conservation work rather than making a living from over-harvesting natural resources - and create a collective rewards system if impact is achieved.

- Read all our collaboration with WWF in Romania through their official website. 

Current conservation efforts funding campaigns are at a standstill during corona times, which has affected a lot of activities and projects to protect and conserve our endangered biodiversity. Project Ark is on a mission to bring a whole stream of funding towards vital projects that are meant to protect our natural resources. Not only this, but the digital assets have an intrinsic value themselves being created by top-notch artists in the creative space, making them beautiful and rare pieces of art. 

Because all the transactions on the blockchain are transparent, once fully built, you will be able to see not only how much money has been raised, but also where it went and what impact it created - closing the gap between the NGOs efforts and the supporter!

About Project ARK

The Project Ark family is built on solid grounds, with more than 30 years of combined experience in the social impact space. The team spans 12 countries with backgrounds in data science, blockchain, finance, arts, business, sustainability, marketing and communications. We are on a mission to disrupt traditional models of fundraising by enabling revolutionary solutions that enable a funding line directly from the supporter to the communities on the ground. 

So far, we have garnered real interest from the Sound Venture Challenge where we ended up in the final, presenting our solution to Mark Cuban and Ashton Kutcher, as well as being present at the Oscars GBK event, bringing Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) to this year’s 93rd Academy Awards nominees, with proceeds going towards WWF. 

Rewards

- Read all about us and learn more about our vision, mission and projects on our website.

Sharing is caring!

Your voice and your active involvement is the most valued way that you can support us at Project Ark.

Spread the word on social, start conversations to create awareness, every little step you take will make a difference for us to reach our goals and help the natural world regenerate to its glory days!

story:
FragraTest

Perfume is an essential element of style, a way of life, a kind of an indicator of social status since time immemorial. In the distant past only rich people could afford a nice aroma; nowadays, the opportunity to adorn ourselves with a fragrance is available to everyone. The choice of an individual flavor is very difficult and responsible process, since the right perfume for one person means self-confidence and attraction to others; in unity with the atmosphere, it promotes human beautification and the necessary entourage creation.

What Is It

✅ Our project "Fragratest" is an innovative tool in the beauty industry, the field of perfumery in particular. 

Like any other industry, the production of perfumes requires technological development. Yes, new fragrances are emerging, new bottles design is developing, but the means of representing it to the consumer over the past few decades have not changed. 

We offer a new, more sophisticated approach to the perfume creationspresentation - Fragratest, the essence of which relies on the basic laws of physics and chemistry. 

The idea is that when you apply any perfume to the skin, the smell is FIRSTLYdistorted by the influence of body temperature, which directly depends on external stimuli in the form of the time of year and day. Fragratest minimizes these distortions already at the stage of choosing a perfume. By adjusting the temperature regime of the device, it is possible to evaluate objectively what will be the smell of the perfume in winter and summer, in the afternoon and in the evening.

How Does It Work

✅ Fragratest is a miniature accessory simulating the properties of human skin in different temperature states. 

Fragratest can be regulated and operates in several thermal modes; the range is 34-40 Celsius Degrees. Due to this, the customer/buyer/owner, by choosing the perfume and wanting to know its exact aroma throughout the temperature spectrum, applies the perfume on the Fragratest, regulates the temperature and smells it. That is how he testes the fragrance and makes the most correct choice. 

The package consists of a heating part that has the coronary structure, a thermostat, a thermostatic regulator, a carrier made of eco-leather and a power supply unit/battery (rechargeable/replaceable).

Skin, unlike paper, is capable to disclose the fragrance better and wider. Perfume has the real aroma on the skin while on paper it's a clean smell, which will never feel like when worn.

Who Is This For

✅ Fragratest can be used both individually and in perfume shops as an innovative alternative to blotter (disposable paper strip).

In the first case, the accessory serves as an assistant in selecting the most appropriate perfume before leaving home. In the second case, as already mentioned above, it is a new generation blotter. Therefore, users of this product are the brand/manufacturer, and the retailer/store. 

Fragratest is a branded accessory, the design and size of which can vary depending on the wishes of the customer. 

Fragratest Advantages

✅ Ecological aspect

Fragratest is a qualitative replacement for blotters, used in perfumery stores in huge quantity that from the point of view of ecology assumes constant deforestation. Fragratest is not a one-time item. With proper cleaning after applying the perfume, the object is sterile and reusable, unlike a disposable paper blotter. In the end, it is unreasonable to sniff a piece of paper, instead of enjoying oxygen that could have produced a tree that the blotter was made of.

✅ From the Marketing Point

Fragratest is a symbol of a new culture of conscious consumption.  

The modern world dictates rationality, an analytical approach to the choice. Fragratest, reducing the time for purchase deliberation, relieves doubts and the need to make choices on the basis of an incomprehensible smell coming from a piece of paper, lying in your pocket or at the bottom of the bag after shopping. This old-fashioned method of choosing perfume has already outlived itself.

The buyer's satisfaction is driven by the reasonableness of the purchase in his own eyes. Using Fragratest in the process of choosing a potential purchase completely involves the client; the work done by him and an individual approach add to the purchased product of unique value. Thanks to Fragratest, satisfied buyer = loyal customer.
story_txt:

Perfume is an essential element of style, a way of life, a kind of an indicator of social status since time immemorial. In the distant past only rich people could afford a nice aroma; nowadays, the opportunity to adorn ourselves with a fragrance is available to everyone. The choice of an individual flavor is very difficult and responsible process, since the right perfume for one person means self-confidence and attraction to others; in unity with the atmosphere, it promotes human beautification and the necessary entourage creation.

story:
Hello. My name is Navyansh Malhotra and I am a young maker. My aim is to create projects that benefit us and are also environmentally sustainable.

How I started

From a young age I was fascinated by how things work. I started by trying to make an RC Plane, as well as opening RC cars and trying to tinker with them. That is what led me to more advanced electronics and circuitry.

My Skillset

In the couple of years of making, I have developed many skillsets including Rapid prototyping, Problem Solving, Design thinking, Hardware, Basic mechanics and using Microcontrollers. As I constantly iterate most of my projects, I generally use prototyping boards such as Arduino or Raspberry Pi. That has greatly expanded my ability of using such boards. I also have conducting after school co-curricular activities with key stage 3 (age group: 11 to 14 year olds) to familiarise them with Design and Technology concepts such as CAD CAM and Robotics. 

My Passions

Apart from technology and making I enjoy photography. That is an excellent diversion and relaxation after the endless hours of stress and screen. [My website is; www.navyansh.com]

 

Above is a CAD representation on how I hope Solaride will look when it goes to the market. With your pledges in this round of funding, I hope to test the electronic systems and smart panel technology along with the first mechanical structure in a possible form of a personal SV. 

Fuel cars are the number 1 cause of global warming that we can eliminate by changing small decisions of ours. Hydrocarbons, Nitrogen Oxides and Carbon Monoxide along with multiple other greenhouse gasses are emitted from fuel cars, which can cause lung cancer and possible death. You can keep your family as safe and clean as possible although we are all breathing the same toxic air. 

The average American spends over USD 2000 a year on fuel. If I can achieve my final goal of Solaride being under USD3000. That means a new Solaride every year!

 

Now you must be wondering aren't there so many SVs (Solar Vehicles) being developed? If I were to ask you to go out and buy one, no matter what your budget you would not be able to because there are none in the market.

I want to change that answer to a YES!

There is a SV in the market. SOLARIDE - one that can be afforded by all. 

Solaride will use smart panel technology that I have conceptualized. The basic idea behind the technology is that the panels will track and follow the sun to optimise efficiency and performance. 

Solaride will be designed for the modern urban environment - a truly practical design. 

 

Timeline

Your Pledge

Your pledge will help me drive it to the next level and making it one step closer to you. 

I intend to use the amount for creating the first functional prototype for the vehicle using an MVP principle. The first prototype focus is on the battery array and the panel arrangement including the tracking technology. 

This is a highly futuristic and experimental project however I am confident of being able to take steps forward with the first prorotyope itself. 

 

Would you like to drive Solaride? Click the Pledge button now, and please do share with your friends and family.

story:
Our Story

Our Founder invented the Bikers Guardians many years after having one of his motorcycles stolen from outside a fish & Chip Shop in Matlock. He was only away from his motorcycle for about 10 minutes when two men loaded his motor cycle onto a van and drove off. Onlookers thought he had broken down never thinking that they had stolen his vehicle. He was distraught for many days and this planted the seed in his head regarding motorcycle security in town centers.

This is new prototype technology providing a multi parking solution to prevent the ever-increasing problems of motor cycle crime, both in the UK and globally.

Our Global Challenge

The rise of motorcycle crime has been widely publicized in recent years. Statistics gathered by the Highways Department indicate that there are over 1.8 million registered motorcycles and scooters on our highways today. Councils are doing their best to encourage more motor cyclists to bring their motor cycles in to the town and city centers as they ease congestion and also aid in the reduction of harmful emissions.

Consumers are also now far more concerned with the impact of stolen motor cycles as they are used for all kinds of crime such as snatch and grab, shop thefts, drug related crime and much more.

Our Expertise

SecuresIT Limited is an innovative new business which aims to take the Motor Cycle Security market by storm with its revolutionary device (BikersGuardians). Our team brings a combination of over 128 years of marketing, cybersecurity and international business and engineering expertise to this project.   We've successfully built products and service companies both in the US and UK.   The US based cybersecurity company involved in our project is a former INC 5000 awardee and recently listed as one of the top Cybersecurity companies to watch in Virginia for 2021.   

Prototype Build

We have selected and acquired a manufacturing company in the UK to work the integration and development of Biker's Guardian initial prototype.  Our figures are based on estimates from our detailed project requirement specifications from our engineering and cybersecurity experts.  We've implemented cost controls with our manufacturer to maintain our project to budget.  The budget includes cost of materials, integration labor and testing of the prototype. 

Lastly, the primary outstanding risk to our project timeline is there is a worldwide shortage of semiconductor and microcontrollers; due to the manufacturing impacts of COVID 19 .  So we are tracking with our manufactures any fluctuations in cost and delivery time for these components.

We Need Your Help

The goal of our campaign is to raise  funding £87,230 to develop one unit prototype for this  new technology.  The prototype as shown in our video will be  providing a  multi parking solution to prevent the ever-increasing problems of motor cycle crime, both in the UK and globally.

We thank you for your support and  invite you to check out our website to learn more about Bikers Guardian features and feel free to share:

https://www.bikersguardian.com/

We appreciate  and are grateful for your time and hope you can support us helping provide a safe and green way for motorcyclist to secure their bikes.

story:
Intro

What if abundance could be easy and joyful for the world? What if we could feed the whole world and even start reversing global warming? Solquatica creates abundance!

I’m asking for your help in a revolutionary technology that makes solar panels 3 times more cost-effective and simultaneously produces food. We are talking about creating the lowest electricity and food prices in the world!
 

I’ve achieved this by combining aquaponics and solar power in a very special way....
This solar panel system floats on aquaponic pond water and collects extra light by using sunlight reflectors and sun-tracking motors. The plentiful power nurtures the fish and vegetables as well as nearby communities. At its heart: Solquatica is about synergy for ultra-efficiency! 

 

Fundraising goes towards:
 

1.  Powering an actual eco-community in Big Island Hawaii with Solquatica’s advanced solar power/aquaponics hybrid system.

2. Creating a company that empowers communities and cities to thrive through synergy. The vision is to awaken humanity towards utopia by showing how effortless it is to create thriving, happy communities.
(More budget details at bottom)

Timeline Synopsis

 

The first prototype within weeks will show 2.2x efficiency! And within 4 months, the goal is to show 3 fold efficiency that powers an eco-community in Big Island Hawaii. 

 

Why You Should Care

Solquaticas output will lead to the highly positive social and planetary impact. 3 times more electric energy equates to 3 times more wealth starting with early adopting communities. This means lower utility costs, more food, and greater opportunities for grants and funding for innovation and social impact. Solquatica also results in more time and effort on the things we really care about - healing our collective emotions, restoring planetary health, establishing decentralized sovereign power, and realizing our highest dreams! Virtually any area of society or life is drastically impacted. 


Solquatica can accomplish in months what usually takes decades because it is about cooperation. Fish, vegetables, and solar power working together will always outpace any technology on earth in terms of speed, profits, and overall good vibes. From there, we can expand. All issues in the world - plastic wastes, CO2 capture, lack of resources, etc are only a problem if we treat them like separate issues. When we intentionally combine them to function as one ecosystem just like in nature, we thrive! When all the world’s issues unify, we unify - back into our hearts. There is no higher goal.

About Me


The journey started at 8 years old where my heart knew that I could make a huge large impact on earth. With this, I eventually studied chemical engineering--And then to balance knowledge with wisdom, I spent 15 years of seeking wisdom through spiritual communities and reflection (vedic, neo-advaita, and more). 

 

Experiencing expansive bliss and love, I knew the inner states of miraculous limitlessness could be bridged to the conventional world. Through technology, it would start supportive of their basic needs. It took me many years to ground and integrate the creation of Solquatica; I moved to Big Island Hawaii on Jan 1, 2020 to find community and like a miracle, people started showing up with similar dreams and talents!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Technology


Patent pending, the design of Solquatica is much like the lotus flower sitting upon lily pads in a pond. It is all about biomimicry and synergy.

Like the flower tracks the sun, the panels and reflectors follow and fully face the sun at all times. Being weightless in water saves material and helps Solquatica rotate much easier. And just like with plant stems, it draws water up to cool the panels for higher efficiency/longevity. The lily plant provides oxygen and filtered water to nurture the fish just like the panels power the aquaponics system to do the same. 

 

And just like the lotus plant, it uses local wastes to build itself; the floats and beams for the platform can use plastic wastes from the city while the aquaponics section can take all human organic wastes when pasteurized. Analysis from engineers concludes at least a fantastic 2.2x improvements for photovoltaic solar energy output and panel lifespan! And the food can be produced 40% more cost effectively!   

 

The final element could be the most important. The lotus flower uses beauty to attract the bees to come dine. Solquatica’s first installments at an eco-village will feature aquarium window side seats in dining areas where people can literally watch gorgeous fish below the solar panels while eating fresh veggies and fruits from the aquaponics system itself! World change made profitable, beautiful, and delicious!

 

This is why Buddha chose the lotus flower to be the symbol of effortless beingness and inherent richness. It represents our heart. 

 

For more details on the technology, please visit www.solquatica.com

 

 

Where will the money go?

 

It’s important to us to be transparent with where your money will go in this project. Solquatica is from the people and for the people. 

  • LLC/Provisional Patent/Legal Expenses/TAXES
  • Team Education/Training/Networking - showcase, network, investor relations, and educate communities
  • Building Materials and table top demonstrations of advanced synergies - to power eco-communities (5 kW system with bifacial panels, batteries, BOS)
  • Labor - help construction of larger prototypes
  • Land Site Acquisition
  • Consultants for scaling, coordination, design
  • On-demand design work & art (Solquatica is the collision of art & science. Beautiful & functional)
  • Marketing/Partner & Assistant (Grants/COO/outreach/referrals/website/social media etc)
  • Videography/Documentation
  • Business Licensing & Specialists (industrial engineering analysis, Zinc8 partnership, low tech synergies using Na(metal)/H2)

 

If you have any questions please reach out to us & check our website www.solquatica.com

We hope you will join us for this journey!

story:
What's eMag+?

eMag+ is a cross-platform global digital magazine newsstand. It gives you all-you-can-read access to thousands digital magazines with a low monthly price.

eMag+ is available to use on smartphone, tablet and computer. You can even save your favorite magazines and read them offline without using the internet.

 

Why Are We Doing This?

Approximately 80,000 to 160,000 trees are cut down daily worldwide. This estimate is based on the Global Forest Resource Assessment, most recently conducted in 2015, which estimates that Earth lost around 60,000 square kilometers of trees globally in one year.

Every year, approximately 5,000,000,000 pages are printed for magazines. That’s caused more than 2,000,000 trees are killed every year.

To save these trees and save the environment, eMag+ is designed to turn these printed magazines into digital magazines. The more people move to digital magazines, the more trees we can save.

 

How Does eMag+ Works?

eMag+ is split into two parts:

  • We all know Content Is King. So we have a self-publishing system for publishers to easily distribute their magazines to eMag+ for free based on a revenue share modal. That means publishers can easily upload the existing PDF files of their magazines to eMag+ to monetize and boost subscribers. This design ensures that we get excellent content for our readers.
  • The second part is the mobile app and web app, which allow readers to subscribe and read their favorite magazines on smartphone, tablet and computer. Currently we have already finished the iOS app, Android app and web app.

 

All You Can Read

With a low monthly price ($7.99/month), you are able to subscribe "eMag+ Premium" plan and read as many current or past issues as you like.

The eMag+ Digital Newsstand creates a sustainable solution with a low monthly fee and unlimited access to thousands magazines. All you can read and read anywhere anytime. It is not only more convenient than print magazine, but also saving money.

 

Anywhere & Anytime

eMag+ redefine the reading experience for magazine readers. Users can even save their magazines and read them offline without using the internet, which is perfect for travelling!

Discover a new way to read your favorite magazines with eMag+. This design challenges the reading experience while also solving the common complications of magazine subscription.

 

Read, Comment & Share

Read and download as many magazines as you like. Anywhere. Anytime. Rate and comment your favorite magazines. Share your comments with your friends.


Rewards

See pricing & pledge level chart below. Except eMag+ Premium subscription, we also provide our other 3 software products for rewards. They are ePageCreator, Mag2GO and FlipCreator.

  • To learn more about ePageCreator, please visit http://www.epagecreator.net
  • To learn more about Mag2GO, please visit http://www.mag2go.net
  • To learn more about ePageCreator, please visit http://www.flipcreator.net

 

Why We Need Your Help?

We need your help to realise the potential of our platform. We’re raising money to help us expand eMag+ to the web, which will let more people get involved and make spreading the platform a lot easier. 

Currently we have approximately 50 magazines. Extra money raised will be used to do marketing and attract more publishers to publish their magazines on eMag+. We will also develop new features that will redefine the reading experience for readers.

 

Stretch Goals

We'll add 50 more magazines and totally get 100 magazines on eMag+. All you can read.

We'll add 100 more magazines and totally get 200 magazines on eMag+. All you can read.

We'll add 300 more magazines and totally get 500 magazines on eMag+. All you can read. We will also add 50 books, which can be purchased separately.

We'll add 300 more magazines and totally get 800 magazines on eMag+. All you can read. We will also add audio and video supported for magazines. This new feature enables publisher to embed music and videos on magazine.

We'll add 200 more magazines and totally get 1000 magazines on eMag+. All you can read. We will also add a new feature called iNight, which is a night mode that changes the screen's luminosity (Day/Night modes) when you read magazines and books. This make the display is much easier on your eyes.

We'll add 500 more magazines and totally get 1500 magazines on eMag+. All you can read. We will also add 200 books, which can be purchased separately.

We'll add 500 more magazines and totally get 2000 magazines on eMag+. All you can read. We will also add 500 books, which can be purchased separately.

 

Risks and Challenges

With launching a successful digital newsstand, we are aware of the challenges that come with it. The good news is that many of these challenges have already been solved before, and as such, are much easier to deal with nowadays. We have finished the self-publishing system, web app, iOS app and Android app. The mobile app is available on both of App Store and Google Play. We are excited about this!

Currently we have approximately 50 magazines and books ready for reading on  our platform. Our biggest challenge is to get more publishers to publish their publications on eMag+. 

As far as risks, well there is zero risk that this platform won’t be launched. Our team members have been volunteering their time until now and are ready to keep working until the system is available for every reader and every publisher, regardless of how much money is raised.

 

Reach Out to Us

Do you still have questions or special requests? We will be happy to help.
Feel free to contact us at support@emagplus.com, and we will respond as fast as possible.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  1. Beyond making a monetary contribution, You can visit us, help spread the word and help us expand our reach. Please help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family on Facebook and Twitter and all your colleagues on LinkedIn. The more entrepreneurs know about eMag+ by the time we are ready to launch, the smoother our introduction will go.
  2. We offer free trial for 30 days. So you can just download our mobile app and start to read magazines right away. We’d love to hear from you about your experience using eMag+. If you are a publisher, don't hesitate to upload your publications to eMag+. It's free.

Thank you for your time.

story:
Our Vision

 

Our Story

 

ENNOVA FRANCE is a technological innovation and design start-up founded in 2016.


Ennova is a firm that designs its own projects and proposes solutions for other technical projects. It specializes in importing electronic equipment intended for sale to professionals and to individuals.

With locations in France and in Hong Kong (Ennova HK) since May 2014, we work with many French industry experts and a large number of Chinese factories.

To date, the company has completed several projects, such as the MULTI-TANK S3, the world’s first e-cigarette with multiple tanks; EPOWER, a major innovation in USB cables; and now, POWER LIFE, the first multifunction battery offering a capacity of 90,000 mAh.

 

Ennova Today 


We are currently broadening our line of business to sell innovative electronic products.

Having traveled a number of times on business, primarily in Asia, we have noticed that many innovations are breaking through in a lot of countries, yet those concepts are unknown in Western countries.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

POWER LIFE is the revolutionary power bank with a multitude of functions, capable of providing power between 500 and 800 watts. It can charge a large number of electronic devices and household appliances between 5 and 230 volts. It includes several ports for compatibility with a wide range of electronic devices. Practical for camping, hiking, road trips… Whenever you want, wherever you want, POWER LIFE will give you energy.

Charge whatever you want, whenever you want, wherever you want.

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 







 

 

A USB 5V 1A port and a USB 5V 2.1A port.

 

 

 

A laptop computer port programmable for 12, 16, or 19V.

 

 

 

 

A 110-230V, 50/60Hz universal port.

 

 

An EC5 12V port provided for starting a car.

 

 

 

A 10W wide field light.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Turning the button to the ON position allows you to use the 220V port as well as the two lights.

 

 

 

 

Turning the button to the ON° position allows you to use the laptop computer port as well as the two USB ports and the two lights.

 

 

 

 

Turning the button to the ON°° positions allows you to use all of the ports, as well as the two lights.

 

 

 

 

To turn on the two lights, press twice in quick succession on the "Power Supply" button, located above the laptop computer port.

 

 

 

 

When you have pressed twice, the front-facing light will come on. You can then dim or brighten it by continuing to press the button and releasing it when the light has reached the desired level of brightness. Tap twice again to turn on the side light; the front light will turn off. Follow the same procedure to set the brightness of the side light. Finally, tap twice once again to turn off the light.

 

 

 

 

It is possible to set the output voltage for the laptop computer port at 12, 16, or 19V. Simply press the "Power Supply" button to navigate among the different voltages. Five seconds after the device is turned on, the voltage selection will lock in order to protect your laptop from any improper handling while plugged in.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Can charge 5 devices simultaneously

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Accessories included with POWER LIFE:

  • POWER LIFE.
  • 220V charger for European outlets.
  • Various connectors for laptop computers (8 connectors).
  • Extension cord for laptop computer connectors.
  • Pliers to start a car with alligator plier and EC5.
  • Flat screwdriver + spare fuse.
  • USB connector with Micro USB / Mini USB and iPhone plug.
  • Two-compartment transport bag + shoulder strap.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

INFORMATION ABOUT DELIVERY

 

Where do we ship?

 

We can ship all over the world, to Europe, the United States, and Asia. VAT and GST taxes are included.

When do we start shipping?

 

The first items will leave our warehouses starting in November 2017.

French contributors can expect to receive their POWER LIFE within three to five business days after it is shipped.

Contributors in Europe and abroad can expect to receive their POWER LIFE within eight days after it is shipped.

 

WHY ARE WE CROWDFUNDING?

 

Ennova is a start-up that is always on the lookout for innovative products to develop.

That’s why we decided to set up a crowdfunding campaign in order to share our projects with people who appreciate innovative ideas.

Those same people can provide valuable input that will help us to enhance our products.

 

FAQ

 

Q: What are the main characteristics of the product?
A: This product can be classified as a type of converter.

 

Q: What will be included in the packaging for the POWER LIFE?
A:POWER LIFE.

  • 220V charger for European outlets.
  • Various connectors for laptop computers (8 connectors).
  • Extension cord for laptop computer connectors.
  • Pliers to start a car with alligator plier and EC5.
  • Flat screwdriver + spare fuse.
  • USB connector with Micro USB / Mini USB and iPhone plug.
  • Two-compartment transport bag + shoulder strap.

 

Q: What colors do you offer?
A: Black and red.

 

Q: How do I get a full charge?
A: Around 30 times from empty to full charging for iphone6 +, 30-35 times for other mobiles.

 

Q: how long to mobile loads?
A: the output current is 2.1A, provide faster charging than original mobile chragers,
      around 1 hour for full charging, it will depend on you mobile.

 

Q: How many times to start cars?
A: Can provide over 90 times to start 2000cc cars continuously.

 

Q: What is the time of alternating current output?
A: It can provide 7 hours working on 80W television, 8 hours working oncomputer,
     70 hours lightning on LID lamp and LED torch.


Q: What is the holding time?
A: 24 months, it's advised to recharge it every 3 months.

 

Q: What is the warranty?
A: we are offering a 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty to all of our contributors.

 

Customer Service

 

Any problem with your product or any infomation about it you can contact the after sales service at: sav@ennova-corp.com

if you have any suggestions about our product or question about our company you can contact us at : contact@ennova-corp.com

story:
Meet Jenni

Jenni was created to help people in cities choose clean energy and do their part for the environment. When you live in an apartment or condo, it can be hard to make changes that are easy to implement, measurable, and good for the planet. This is especially true when it comes to renewable energy. That’s where Jenni comes in.

"I use the latest USB-C charging protocol to power your MacBook Pro."

Who is Jenni?

Combining smart, connected technology, solar photovoltaics and energy storage, Jenni allows you to intelligently harness the sun. Charge all your tech devices using clean energy, all without changing your habits.

"I communicate securely via WiFi with the cloud to interact with the community."

How does Jenni work?

Jenni works subtly. Naturally, she charges during the day when the sun is out. While she charges you can plug in your phones and laptop and let them charge from Jenni rather than the grid.

We built Jenni to be intelligent. She anticipates charging needs assessing weather and charging patterns to make appropriate re-charging decisions to make sure you always have power. Jenni takes advantage of the sun and off-peak times to ensure you pull the most environmental and economical energy available.

With the charging HUB on a nearby counter or near a window, plug-in the SOLAR+ for a combined 25W of potential solar power. SOLAR+,  the light weight window panel, suction cups to a nearby window and connects into the HUB via a cable to recharge her 120 Wh battery.

What makes Jenni unique?

Connected to your home WiFi, the Jenni app keeps you updated when you’re away from home. Just check in and show your friends how much energy you’re generating, the amount of clean power you have stored, and the difference you’re making compared to the community. She’ll also alert you if there’s ever a power outage at your house. You’ll be notified when she loses connection to the grid in case you need to take action.

A social network for clean energy.

Connecting you to other Jenni backers around the globe, watch as the impact of charging your devices add up. Together these actions will contribute to a cleaner, greener energy future. Acting as a gateway to renewable energy, Jenni will support you on your renewable energy journey.

If every household in these cities used Jenni to power their mobile devices, it would be the equivalent to taking the following number of homes off the grid:

As featured in:

 

Geek IT

Charging Capabilities

Meet The Team

Follow us

Always stay up to date with Jenni's latest updates on social media, and pick up some daily news from the world of solar power and the green energy revolution!

• WEBSITE: www.getJenni.com

• INSTAGRAM: www.instagram.com/get_jenni

• FACEBOOK: www.facebook.com/GetJenni

----------------------------------------------------------------

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Q: Do you offer a referral program for this campaign?

A: Yes, we do. First, buy your Jenni on our Indiegogo campaign. Then, get 4 friends to buy one as well, and you will be reimbursed on one Jenni! Here's how:

1. Log into Indiegogo (NOTE: you must be logged in!) and go to the Jenni campaign page.

2. Click the Twitter or Facebook icons to share the campaign via social media OR, click the “link” icon to copy your own personal link to share by email, messages or any other private communication with your friends.

3. Your link is personal and can be traced back to YOU. When someone visits the page through your link and contributes to the campaign, Indiegogo’s system will automatically credit you as the referrer.

4. If four of your friends have bought Jenni through your link, you will get your total pledge amount for one (1) Jenni (including any shipping costs) back from us.

Q: Can I order Jenni even though I do not live in Canada?

A: Yes, we ship Jenni worldwide.

Q: What are the shipping costs for Jenni?

A: Shipping is free within Canada, $25 for the United States and $50 for the rest of the world.

Q: My order number is 0. Should I be worried?

A: No need for concern. Before the campaign ends, the number is "0". After the campaign ends, every contribution is assigned a proper order ID for shipping of perks.

Q: Are there better locations for Jenni to reside in my house?

A: Yes. Above the equator, a south facing window is optimal, with east/west facing windows providing morning and afternoon sun, respectfully.

Other Campaign Supporters

When someone visits the page through your link and contributes to the campaign, Indiegogo’s system will automatically credit you as the referrer.4. If four of your friends have bought Jenni through your link, you will get your total pledge amount for one (1) Jenni (including any shipping costs) back from us.Q: Can I order Jenni even though I do not live in Canada?A: Yes, we ship Jenni worldwide.Q: What are the shipping costs for Jenni?A: Shipping is free within Canada, $25 for the United States and $50 for the rest of the world.Q: My order number is 0. Should I be worried?A: No need for concern. Before the campaign ends, the number is "0". After the campaign ends, every contribution is assigned a proper order ID for shipping of perks.Q: Are there better locations for Jenni to reside in my house?A: Yes. Above the equator, a south facing window is optimal, with east/west facing windows providing morning and afternoon sun, respectfully.Other Campaign Supporters

story:
Our journey

5 years ago, while perusing one of my many science based forums, I came across a disturbing article about the struggle for a safe and environmentally friendly way to dispose of used batteries. It turns out that even batteries that are recyclable contain at best only 10% recycled products, the rest is chucked into the landfills around the world.  And you say "how bad can one little battery be?"  That's the equivalent of saying one snow flake never hurt anyone... The real problem is the massive number of them that corrode and decay each and everyday in our landfills - or worse - the unimaginable number that is simply thrown on the ground because there wasn't a garbage can near by at the time.  These all leach their deadly toxins into the ground and eventually poison our plants and animals and even our water supplies.  I decided there had to be a better way and with the help of my team, I present our solution:

Lighthouse Lanterns

My team has spent 4 years developing our lantern which runs with water and a pinch of salt.

The light is 5  1/2" tall and 3  1/2" wide. The weight is 13 oz dry and 1 lb 3 oz with water.

What makes us different is that our product will run for 5000+  hours before the one consumable item, which is the anode, needs to be replaced.

There is NOTHING comparable to this on the market today.

Our lantern is completely safe and non-polluting.  It can be used in a closed environment as well as outdoors.  There are absolutely no batteries or noxious gases. 

Anyone can use it ANYWHERE.

It has a great compact design so you can take it hiking, or camping without the weight of all those heavy batteries or tanks of propane.  The light output is bright and will light up your space or tent very well.

What we need and what you get:

As a start up company, the funding we hope to earn will help us greatly to enhance our production.  We will apply the funds toward having molds made that would allow us to manufacture our product more cost efficiently and faster. 

The funds received will allow us to have molds made. Currently, we are building the lanterns using individual components which is very time consuming.  Certain key molds would result in a faster manufacturing process and thereby allow us to reduce our costs.

Our perks will allow our generous contributors to help make a difference in our responsibility to care for our planet as well as obtain our highly unique product on the ground level.

We will be shipping within 30 days as the product is being made here in the USA.

In the event we do not reach our goal, the funds received would still allow us to purchase various components in quantities to produce our lanterns more efficiently.

The Impact

Lighting is a commodity item. Everyone uses it and needs it. Our product literally "shines" in it's usefulness for camping, hiking, emergency preparedness, and supplemental lighting both indoors and outdoors.  We are dedicated to making innovative, useful items that are Eco-friendly and actually needed.  Our lantern will make life a little better for people in general and a lot better for our planet.

Our goal is not only to market our lantern here in the USA but future production would make the lantern available to areas of the world that would most benefit from this long lasting technology.

 

Risks & Challenges

We feel that because we are manufacturing the lantern here ourselves in the USA that we have much more control over the manufacturing process and not subject to some of the many challenges that result from off shore manufacturers such as late delivery, and inferior builds.

We do source a few of our components over seas that are instrumental in allowing us to build the lantern at a competitive price but as stated, all manufacturing and shipping of the final product is from Oregon in the USA.

In the unlikely event that we can't meet our shipping goals, we will absolutely keep everyone in the loop and post updates regularly.  Nothing is more irritating than being left in the dark (No pun intended) about where your order is.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that sometimes a financial involvement may not be possible.

In that case, you can help us with your participation in social media via Indiegogo share tools.

Your generous help through receiving a perk and/or getting the word out is greatly appreciated.

story:
When was the last time you endured a power outage?  For me, it was today between 6:00am and 14:00pm.  I'm not complaining too loudly given that in recent weeks storms and fires in New South Wales have created outages of up to 3 days.  For some people, in the midst of catastrophic fire conditions, the loss of power meant the loss of access to vital information and communications.

Imagine a domestic power supply that is direct, efficient, and free*.  No bills, no transmission lines, no outages.  A power supply completely independent of coal fired power plants and electricity companies.  Now imagine the convenience of accessing the same technology wherever you go.

The seed for HIVE technology was planted over 10 years ago during a NEXUS conference on the Gold Coast, Australia.  Since that time there has been research, drafts, failures, more research and developments until finally, in September 2019, a provisional patent.

* excludes purchase and installation costs of HIVE home fixed application and purchase of HIVE portable applications

The Patent﻿ - HIVE technology
Hydro•Injected•Vortic•Energy

Direct energy source with 4 applications:

• fixed (hard wired) power supply for domestic application
• portable multi appliance power supply
• portable single appliance power supply
• portable USB charger

HIVE technology is a genuine free energy technology delivering complete freedom - off the grid, sustainable and instantaneous delivery of power wherever you are.  

The Plan

In order to finalise the patent application it is necessary to engage an industrial designer to complete:

• detailed design specifications/drawings
• 3D printing & working prototype(s)
• production manifesto

The goal of this campaign is to raise $150,000 to finalise the patent.  

In the spirit of a grass roots crowdfunding campaign, I am asking for your help to reach this target by donating any amount affordable for you.  There are no perks.  Simply the opportunity to support a cause which will create a better future for humanity  and our planet.

Please consider donating and SHARING this campaign on your social media as far and wide as you possibly can.  Even a small donation can make a huge impact if shared with all your friends, family and colleagues.

The Big Picture

Ultimately, the vision for HIVE technology is to operate as a Not for Profit organisation where commercial sales will fund the provision of HIVE applications to remote communities where there is currently no access to power.  

To realise this vision I need YOUR support - please donate what you can (no amount is too small) and SHARE (this is where the magic happens).  All funds raised through this campaign will assist in the finalisation of the patent.  Once the patent is locked down then we can get down to the business of raising seed capital to make this game-changing technology a reality.  

"The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do" - Steve Jobs

I'm that kind of crazy - hoping you are too.

story:
Our Futurist 'Think Tank' in the USA

The Morpurgo Family, refugees from the Spanish Inquisition, again became Holocaust refugees in 1940, going from riches to rags then back up to riches yet one more time, through their dogged determination to preserve their artistic and scientific skills and share in 'The American Dream'. 

Millions of displaced persons everywhere today have the ability to do the same.  One such global economic recovery plan is the planting and nurturing of cash-crop trees and hydroponics on barren or ravaged land, even while tapping internet social networking and other futuristic means of staying connected 'melting-pot fashion' to the global community as both artists and scientists - thereby bringing Democracy and Universal Human Rights to new futuristic communities. 

Such islands of cultural enlightenment will very quickly appreciate in value and can eventually be sold to green corporations anxious to properly feed the world and reduce carbon imprint. Camping and developing such real estate can provide a financial means for refugee families to regain their former stability.  The Savant Garde Institute, a 501(c)3 educational foundation connecting artists and scientists in its global cultural 'think tank', is one such organisation seeking funding to facilitate the establishment of such agrarian cultural communities. 

Why Us???

The Baronial Generali Morpurgo Family,  some of whose last living direct descendants have started this Indiegogo Campaign, has been funding out-of-pocket, as most compassionate and social-conscious people are, for Centuries!  (Incidentally, our great-grandparents financed the building of the Suez Canal.)  Today, exciting new global futuristic advances are pointing to more effective ways to better the condition of All of Humankind while it races to save the Planet from the next wave of mass extinction.  Informally founded by us since 1940, The Savant Garde Institute's 'think tank' is one of many working on this problem - but what makes us different is that we, as creative masterbuilders, are flexible, definitely not part of the establishment, and our problem-solving strategies are prompted directly from the people who apply to us for help.  We would like to help more, but our resources are presently sorely lacking. 

What We Need & What You Get

Are you one of the super-rich? Leverage $100,000,000 to us, hold 51% of stock in our subsidiary "C" corporation acquiring and developing cheap global real estate for our tree-farming program, PLUS a 50% interest in our Art also for collateral, and watch how wisely we expend and grow your money.  Who knows?  It might save the world all by itself!   (Go to our online Gallery at fineartamerica.com/profiles/annselm-morpurgoaffiliateId=G34609 to view our Collections.  Meanwhile, buy our reproductions and artifacts too!)   

But if you are not super-rich, contribute $100 and get one of our special 100% heavy cotton free Unisex&Unirace t-shirts (Retail Value:$25) directly from us to let everyone around you know more about our goals and projects.  Nearly 100% of all the funds we collect go to expand our out-of-pocket assistance to indigent, often homeless creative persons in the USA and hopefully, soon also abroad.

Be sure to use the Indiegogo tool buttons above for FAQs and other questions.

story:
Summary

Climate change is real, and we’ve got to act fast. Maybe you already recycle, compost, or bring your own bags to the grocery store. But what else can you do?

The Moving Water Company is raising funds to build and test a prototype for a home tidal power generator. Support the campaign and spread the word!

The Problem: Fragile Power Grid & Climate Crisis

The U.S. is the 3rd largest consumer of coal for generating electricity.  But our current power grid has a lot of problems:

  • Outdated and vulnerable to disruption: Every time a hurricane or severe storm hits, we expect--and even accept!--extensive power outages.
  • Inefficient sourcing: Fueling large power plants requires billions of tons of coal to be mined and transported before the power can be used
  • National security hazard: At any time a foreign enemy or a breakdown in the supply chain could create widespread power failure.
  • Pollution contributing to climate change: 83% of the CO2 emissions in the US are from generating electricity.

 

The UN’s 2018 report on climate change has spurred many to action to reduce waste and pollution in order to help mitigate the effects of years of environmental damage.

I believe there is a creative, positive answer to fighting climate change: investing in renewable energy.

The Solution: Renewable Energy from Tides

Solar and wind power are increasingly gaining traction in the U.S. But what about power generated from ocean tides?

Countries all over the world are successfully harvesting the immense power of ocean tides and are successfully providing power for whole communities. 

In European countries that border the ocean, almost 5% of their energy comes from tidal power installations. 

But in the United States and other places around the world, that number is virtually 0%. 

For a country as large as the U.S. that borders 2 oceans and the Gulf of Mexico, why haven't we taken advantage of the incredible power available in the tides along our coastlines?

 

Our Goal: Home Tidal Power System

Tidal power is proven to be successful on a large scale all around the world. But so far nobody has developed a viable alternative for homeowners who live in areas of high tide fluctuation or moving streams to take advantage of the free green energy that changing tides or river flows offer.

The Moving Water Company seeks to fill that gap by developing a small-scale tidal power generator for individual coastal homes.

By supporting this campaign you can help...

  1. Generate power: Build and test a prototype for a home tidal power system that the average homeowner could afford.
  2. Generate awareness: Raise awareness of the potential of alternative, renewable energy sources.

 

I believe that we can ultimately help countless people around the world to save money, become more self-sufficient, and make strides in making green energy solutions accessible. Join the community of people who want to see this happen!

 

Donate today and receive a special thank you gift when the campaign ends!

But if we don't reach our goal, your donation will be refunded to you by Indiegogo.

 

How It Will Work

Overview

We want this small-scale tidal power generator to be as simple and compact as possible. The system will fit on the homeowner's dock or pier and will feature 2 cross-flow turbines (Banki turbines), gear transmission box, and batteries.

As water flows in or out, the turbines will turn the gears and produce DC current that will be stored in the batteries. That DC current will then be available to convert into AC current that can power the home.

Doing the math

Two turbines (42-inch in diameter, 4 feet deep) will be in the water at all times. They will spin for between 18-22 hours daily at a rate of 30 RPM (revolutions per minute). This high-torque, low-RPM rotation will be amplified into 300 RPMs through a gear transmission in watertight housing.

Initial renderings of the home tidal power system

The gearbox will power a generator that feeds power into an array of high-capacity batteries. A radium controller will help convert the DC power into AC power. This power could be directly wired into your home's power system or used as auxiliary power.

 

 

The prototype will use many preexisting components, but we will also make some custom components ourselves.

 

What We Need

This tidal power generator is still in the concept stage. In order to move forward with this idea, I need to build and test a prototype.

Acquiring components, manufacturing a full-size prototype, waterproofing the components, engineering the electrical components, and running extensive tests will cost about $50,000.

The fact that you’ve read this far proves that you care about protecting the environment and making a difference in the face of climate change.

 

By supporting this project, you could participate in making progress in attainable renewable energy solutions.

 

Generate power, generate awareness. Let's do this together!

 

 

The Perks: What You Get

When you donate at any amount, you are joining a community of people who believe that real change begins at the individual level. 

If we reach our campaign goal of $50,000, you will receive a thank you gift per your giving amount:

  • $25: Moving Water Company decal
  • $50: Moving Water Company hat
  • $50: Moving Water Company t-shirt
  • $100: Private video interview with Hamp Stevens
  • $200: Super Donor Pack
  • $500: Your name on a generator

OR if you choose to bypass a perk and/or want to give a custom amount, you can simply hit the pink "Back It" button at the top of the campaign page.

Whatever your giving amount, we'll add your name to the Donor Hall of Fame on our website (with your permission). Once you donate, just email us at hamp@water2power.com to let us know if you'd like to be added!

If the campaign does not reach $50,000, however, your donation will be refunded to you by Indiegogo, which means we would not be able to fulfill perks.

 

The Impact

We need to start thinking creatively about how to make clean energy accessible to individuals not only in our own country but also all around the world.

From observing the tides in my own backyard on the coast of Georgia, I estimate that useful power can be generated on an average of 20 hours per day.

Currently, there are about 50,000 homes on the east and west coasts of the United States that could benefit from this clean, safe energy source. And eventually, this could be used as a clean, affordable energy source all over the world.

If this campaign is successful, I will be able to build and test a working prototype and make strides in making tidal power accessible to individuals.

 

Tidal changes in my backyard.

 

High and low tide on the marsh in my backyard. That's roughly a 10-foot difference 4 times a day, every day!
 

Risks & Challenges

All of my calculations and plans are based on observations I’ve made with the tides in my own backyard on St. Simons Island, GA. The effectiveness of the generator may vary from place to place, based on several factors. The difference in tidal changes and water speed, for instance, could affect the amount of power that a home could generate.

Our goal with this campaign is to raise enough funds to build a prototype and put it to the test. We want to make sure the testing period is long enough and thorough enough to diagnose problems, make improvements, and fine-tune the technology. Until we can build and test a prototype, we won't know how effective this home tidal power system will be.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren’t able to contribute financially, you can still help turn this idea into a working prototype. Here’s what you can do:

  1. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and here on Indiegogo.
  2. Share this campaign with your friends and family.

It’s that simple to make a difference! Thank you!

Generate power. Generate awareness. Join the renewable energy adventure!
Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube

#water2power #themovingwaterco
