When you donate at any amount, you are joining a community of people who believe that real change begins at the individual level. 
If we reach our campaign goal of $50,000, you will receive a thank you gift per your giving amount:


$25: Moving Water Company decal

$50: Moving Water Company hat

$50: Moving Water Company t-shirt

$100: Private video interview with Hamp Stevens

$200: Super Donor Pack

$500: Your name on a generator

OR if you choose to bypass a perk and/or want to give a custom amount, you can simply hit the pink "Back It" button at the top of the campaign page.
Whatever your giving amount, we'll add your name to the Donor Hall of Fame on our website (with your permission). Once you donate, just email us at hamp@water2power.com to let us know if you'd like to be added!
If the campaign does not reach $50,000, however, your donation will be refunded to you by Indiegogo, which means we would not be able to fulfill perks.
 
The Impact
We need to start thinking creatively about how to make clean energy accessible to individuals not only in our own country but also all around the world.
From observing the tides in my own backyard on the coast of Georgia, I estimate that useful power can be generated on an average of 20 hours per day.
Currently, there are about 50,000 homes on the east and west coasts of the United States that could benefit from this clean, safe energy source. And eventually, this could be used as a clean, affordable energy source all over the world.
If this campaign is successful, I will be able to build and test a working prototype and make strides in making tidal power accessible to individuals.
  Tidal changes in my backyard.
 

High and low tide on the marsh in my backyard. That's roughly a 10-foot difference 4 times a day, every day!
 
Risks & Challenges
All of my calculations and plans are based on observations I’ve made with the tides in my own backyard on St. Simons Island, GA. The effectiveness of the generator may vary from place to place, based on several factors. The difference in tidal changes and water speed, for instance, could affect the amount of power that a home could generate.
Our goal with this campaign is to raise enough funds to build a prototype and put it to the test. We want to make sure the testing period is long enough and thorough enough to diagnose problems, make improvements, and fine-tune the technology. Until we can build and test a prototype, we won't know how effective this home tidal power system will be. Other Ways You Can Help
If you aren’t able to contribute financially, you can still help turn this idea into a working prototype. Here’s what you can do:

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and here on Indiegogo.
Share this campaign with your friends and family.

It’s that simple to make a difference! Thank you!
Generate power. Generate awareness. Join the renewable energy adventure!Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube#water2power #themovingwaterco

story:
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION IS NOT ONLY ONE WORD FOR US. WE LIVE AND DEVELOP OUR PRODUCTS FOLLOWING THIS OBJECTIVE

 

Solar Frequency Vibration Insecticidal Lamp

The solar frequency vibration type insecticidal lamp utilizes the solar panel as a power source of electricity, which stores the solar energy in daytime (by battery bank) and power the insecticidal lamps and working at night. The light wave trapping and killing the pests, that is, the low-temperature plasma generated by the discharging forms a 365±50 nm wavelength light, lures the moth flutter lamp, and is contacted with a frequency-vibrating high-voltage grid to achieve killing of adult pests and reduction of field pest egg production , reduce the number of pests and reduce pesticide residues.

Solar frequency vibration type insecticidal lamp can trap and kill vegetable pests, rice pests, cotton pests, fruit tree pests, forest pests, wheat pests, miscellaneous grains pests, underground pests, grassland pests, storage pests.

                    

       
       

 

Working principle

Solar frequency vibration type insecticidal lamp utilizes solar energy produced by solar panels in daytime and storeit inside the maintenance-free battery bank. The lamp system intelligent controller has light control, time control, rain control, overcharge and over-discharge protection, and automatic Delay and other functions. The solar frequency vibration type insecticidal lamp was developed under the requirements of the prevention and control of agricultural pests and diseases. The low-temperature plasma generated by the discharge forms a 365±50 nm wavelength color light, which has a strong phototaxis, wave-like, and tropism characteristics for most of the insects, attracts the pests to the light source, and the light source is connected to a high-voltage power grid steel fence cover, which is wound around the UV light lamp. The insects around the cover will be killed or knocked immediately.

                         

       
   

 

 

Application area

Solar frequency vibration type insecticidal lamp can be widely used in agriculture line, forestry, vegetables, storage, tea, tobacco, gardens, orchards, greenhouses, vineyards, wine brewing, urban greening, aquaculture, animal husbandry and other applications, can trap:

(1) Vegetable pests: Spodopteraexigua, Spodopteralitura, Plutellaxylostella, Brassica juncea, Pterodactylus falciparum, Astragalusstriata, potato tuber moth, plus acarus, amaranth;

(2) Rice pests: rice blast, leafhopper, rice stem borer, rice borer borer, rice planthopper, rice leaf roller;

(3) Cotton pests: cotton bollworm, larvae, red bollworms, bridge-building insects, and blind worms;

(4) Pests of fruit trees: red-backed hawksbill turtles, borers, moths, fruit suckers, and peach aphids;

(5) Forest pests: American white moth, moth, moth, pine caterpillar, pine longicorn, shank longhorn, anoplophos pens longis, Begonia pilosula, leaf roller moth, spring beetle, white tree moth, big leaf beetle;

(6) Wheat pests: wheat moth, armyworm;

(7) Miscellaneous grains pests: Sorghum bark, corn borer, soybean borer, bean hawk moth, millet borer, apple orange moth;

(8) Underground pests: ground tigers, larvae, beetles, ladybird moths, ladybirds, and cockroaches;

(9) Grassland pests: Asian car bugs, grasshoppers, leafhoppers;

(10) Storage pests: 1326 species of major pests such as Otani, Xiaogu, Pith, moth, herbs, rice moths, legumes, and ladybugs.

Feature

1. Solar energy is unique, renewable, long-term energy source, in line with energy-saving emission reduction, low-carbon environmental protection.

2. Solar energy has the characteristics of being clean, safe, and non-polluting. It is a typical environment-friendly energy source. Compared with common grid power insecticidal lamps, solar energy insecticidal lamp is a low-voltage DC power supplying system which is safer to humans and animals. And not only reduce the pesticide residues, but also greatly increases the value of agricultural and sideline products.

3. The solar photovoltaic insecticide technology eliminates the need for wiring construction and saves investment greatly. It also saves the occupation of cultivated land by auxiliary circuits and facilitates farmer farming. It also avoids any damage to the human and animals, complete reduce the security risks of the farmers.

4. It is more convenient to install and disassemble the system, and the system has a wide range of applications. It can be applied to any flatlands, mountainous areas; crops, grain fields, fruit trees, and most of the industrial and commercial crop areas..

5,. This solar insecticidal lamp is designed according to the habit of pests, high-voltage electric shock is a physical method, pests will not produce resistance, but also protect the natural enemies of pests, maintaining the ecological balance.

6.Reduce labor cost, automatically light up at night and turn off in the morning, no manual operation, especially convenient for mountain areas.

7. The hunting and killing range aremore large, longer the service time, good insecticidal efficiency.

8. The product can be used as usual for max 7~10 rainy days (based on the power of solar panels and capacity of battery bank), in continuous rainy days, which is more suitable for rainy seasons.

9.The battery is hanging on the pole or buried under the ground, also the complete system can be transferred easily, no influence to the farm machines in harvest seasons.

10.Economic, once investment, benefit for many years.

Functions:

1. Solar insecticidal lamps adopt rain control, light control and timing control  (working time adjustable).

2. In the case of full power, it can work continuously for 2-5 days. (Optional)

3. The insect high-voltage net must be cleaned every time after raining.

4. If the lamp system is used for aquaculture industries such as fish farms and chicken farms, the lights can be hung directly on the ponds or farms without any insect bags so that the insects will fall into the water and the farm land directly.

5.Turn on and off time: automatically turn on the lights every night, according to local conditions to develop working hours.

6.Effective area: 20 acres - 30 acres / system, UV light power: 8/11/15/18w for choose.

7.Lamp lifetime up to 6000 hours, more than 3000 hours( LED lamps up to 50,000hrs), if the insecticidal effect is reduced, please replace the lamp.

8. High-voltage up to DC 2800V-4800V( flash DC high-voltage, harmless to human).

                                       

                                                

                                                                    Aquaculture
                                                            Industrial crop farms

 

OUR PRODUCTION EXPIRED

 

Basic frame for the UV lamp

 

Basic frame for the POLE

 

Basic frame for the SOLAR panels

 

FINAL CONTROL OF UV LAMPS

 

DELIVERY PARTNER

Delivery with insurance within 10 - 14 days worldwide

story:
Beautiful outdoor lighting.

We were frustrated by the lack of choice for outside lighting between cheap solar products with poor quality, design and light or mains powered, energy wasting products that require professional installation. In answer to this, we founded &Shade, a lighting company dedicated to producing products that combine the quality and brilliance of mains powered outdoor lighting but using the clean energy of our sun.

We create our products following three design principles:

Sustainable - not just by using the sun to power our lights, but also making sure we reduce environmental impact wherever possible. Minimal plastics, recycled materials, quality builds and replaceable parts all work towards meeting our goal of creating clean outdoor light.

Beautiful - our products are designed to be admired as objects as well as light sources.

Craftmanship - handmade by skilled metal workers and electrical engineers to exacting standards, our passion is to provide quality products that will provide you with years of trouble-free, clean light for your gardens and patios.

&Shade was founded by two friends, both named Dan, who met on holiday in 2002. Dan Heap is a lighting designer with over 20 years experience in lighting and product design. After graduating with an MSc in Lighting and BA in Product Design. Dan has worked on a diverse range of projects from Retail spaces, high-end hotels and private residences, through to houseboats, art galleries and health spas. Many of these projects have seen one-off or special fittings being developed specifically to deliver a specific visual effect or to light an object in a particular way. His understanding of how light works allows him to cleverly manipulate its use through his products.

The second Dan, Dan Daley, is a technologist and entrepreneur who has started and run several businesses including a record label and digital innovation agency. Having sold his agency, and having worked on many digital products, Dan wanted to work on a physical product that encapsulated his passions for beautiful design and renewable energy.

Key Features

  • A beautiful solar powered table light that provides more than 6 hours of bright, warm light.
  • An oversized solar panel relative to the battery will charge in 1-2 hours of sunlight so will even work on cloudy days.
  • 2700k LED's, this is the colour of an old-fashioned light bulb, not the cold white light typically associate with LED.

What We Need & What You Get

We already have some orders, but in order to make this a viable business and to allow us to continue designing new solar lighting products, we need to make production runs of 200 units.

By preordering an &Shade Solar Light Table, you will help us to realise our vision of creating a viable alternative for outdoor lighting that is sustainable and beautiful.  Simply choose a perk from the side menu and once we reach our goal we'll go into production.

Ways YOU Can Help

Reaching our goal is the best surefire way of ensuring we reach our minimum order and can push this through to production and then to your doorstep. 

Use the share buttons here to spread around on social media.

Risks & Challenges

Bringing any product to market has its inherent risks and challenges. Our production factory has already been determined, and the sample product provided, which we are very happy with. We're now ready to go into production.

story:
Everything started in a kitchen

Denise & Jean-Michel - an American mom and a Swiss architect - moved to Arizona. Our first concerns were how to find fresh, healthy food and how to get our children to participate more in our household activities. Gardening seemed to be the logical answer. Our question was, how do we make it easier, more productive, and beautiful?

HomY is the result. By connecting a greenhouse to a kid-friendly kitchen it is simple to control the produce quality and be involved in delivering living food from the ground to the table.

The benefits of the HomY ePlans don't only extend to energizing your body or teaching your children. HomY gives you a good, abundant life. 

 

Why does a good life begin with a new plan?

You won't find this kind of house on the market,  you must build it.

But don't think you're stuck with cookie-cutter blueprints. The HomY ePlans are electronic files that you can customize for any family or budget. Designed in feet or meters, sent anywhere with no charge.

We planned the chassis so that you can easily change the front facade, add more living space, and upgrade with many modern options.  The HomY ePlans can be implemented in stages to accommodate your needs and current budget. Or go big and fast.

HomY is also ready to go off-grid!

This is a new way to live and you need a plan to make it functional, uplifting and beautiful!

 

Reduce your footprint, fatten your wallet

With HomY, you'll be able to do more than produce energy for your family, house and electric car! Discover the advantages of reducing your environmental footprint. For those who are already green/sustainably-minded, this innovative plan offers something you've never seen before.

It's time to take the first step, this is the new plan. 

Numbers speak better than words...

It’s your most secure investment for the future: save money, promote good health, provide financial security, fortify against disasters, educate and enjoy your family.

And have time to think, therefore to be, and to be part of your own revolution.

 

More about HomY plans.

This innovative set of ready-to-build house plans will reflect your nature and your passions. All of the following functions, included in the plans, can be optional if they do not fit your vision.

  • about 800 to 2250 sqft / 80 m2  to 225 m2
  • 1 to 3 bathrooms
  • 1 to 6 bedrooms
  • + the greenhouse serves as additional multi-purpose living space

First, the greenhouse which is the heart of the project:

  • raised garden beds
  • hydroponics and aquaponics
  • solar food dehydrator
  • pizza/bread oven
  • large area for dining or relaxing
  • composting system
  • solar panels
  • reuse of rainwater and grey water
  • pond
  • jacuzzi
  • yoga place, grounding and more...

 

  • The front facade is fully customizable to reflect your personal style preferences. The original HomY facade design comes on the plans, but feel free to have your own architect change it. It includes :
    • a welcoming patio or entry
    • a spacious living room
    • Multi-use storage space on each side: package drop-box, yard equipment, bikes...
    • a panoramic terrace on the 2nd floor, that can be converted into additional bedrooms

  • The body or chassis is the center of the first floor which contains the vital functions. It is built in massive concrete to be a safe shelter. It includes:

    • a pantry organized for 6 months of food storage for a large family
    • a kitchen adapted to prepare, canning or freeze all of your homemade meals
    • a dining room as the heart of your home
    • a large family room (or living room + bedroom, if only building the chassis)
    • a bathroom (toilet, sink, and shower)
    • a garage, workshop area, mudroom, and an RV-carport
    • the technical facilities which can be managed from your phone

  • The 2nd floor is a traditional wood frame with:

    • 1 master bedroom and bathroom with skylight over the bathtub 
    • 2 bedrooms with shared common area
    • 1 bathroom (toilet, sink, and shower)
    • a spacious laundry room and storage
    • access to the rooftop terrace

  • And a private rooftop:

HomY is for you if you are...

A first-time homeowner or thinking of investing for your children

Don't start life with a huge loan, because with a 30-year loan you end up paying for the house twice in interest.  And avoid losing money in rent. With HomY you can start simple by only building the base (800 sqft/80 m2) without sacrificing any comfort.  HomY is ready to be extended when you have the finances.

A growing family

HomY can evolve as your family does.  You can start with a second floor (800 sqft/80 m2) with additional rooms, or add it later.  Need more space?  You can easily add a large living room (400 sqft/40 m2) on the front.

Need even more bedrooms? Transform the second-floor panoramic terrace (250 sqft/25 m2) into additional rooms. The sky is the limit, just do it! 

A homeschooling family

This is a great the place to teach the next generation on a better way of life; respect for our resources, gardening, etc. HomY is especially designed to be kid-friendly so they can assist, learn and discover in both the kitchen and the greenhouse.

Ready for retirement

Is it time to slow down the rhythm and reduce the expenses of your life?  Or need time to travel and visits your grandkids? HomY is your answer.

  • Rent your entire house with an integrated, easy-to-use control access system and Airbnb.
  • Use your parked RV as a room to rent to a student.
  • Connect with your neighbors by sharing fresh-baked goods or jelly prepared with ingredients straight from your greenhouse.

An off-grid dreamer

In the digital era, many jobs can be performed outside of an employer's office. Go seek out this perfect multi acres spot. First come, first served.

Don't wait until everyone turns back to nature, be part of this new "comfy-off grid" generation.

 

How to get involved?

Do you believe in this way of living? Join and sustain our campaign. We need you to make this dream home a reality! The design and concept are about 10% of the work; there is still 90% that needs to be finished. By investing in this project you are making it possible for HomY plans to be construction-ready for the price of a bike! It's one small step for you, and one giant leap for all!

 

Stretch goals: 

When these goals are reached we will be able to...

$ 25'000.- = prepare ePlans and Guidebook in English and French / metric and feet

$ 50'000.- = translate the ePlans and Guidebook into the 3 most-requested languages

$ 75'000.- = translate ePlans and Guidebook into more languages

$ 100'000.- = design additional facade styles that will be freely available for all backers

 

How to get started with HomY once we're backed?

It's very exciting because it's very simple. It's like when you buy a software; you purchase it online and we will send the drawings to you by email.

The house will be designed according to the lasted version of the International Residential Code (IRC) and the Swiss construction code which are both among the most complex of building codes.

  1. Invest in a HomY Perk: select the full set of house plans or greenhouse-concept only.
  2. Receive electronic plans directly in your email by estimated delivery date. Plans are in PDF and CAD (readable on Acrobat Reader and editable on Revit or AutoCAD).
  3. Choose and purchase your plot of land, if you have not already.
  4. Contact a local licensed architect/contractor to:  
    • make any personalized changes
    • give you a quote for construction
    • ask a licensed surveyor to integrate your plot plan into the house plan
    • and submit the finalized plans for a building permit!
  5. Begin building! Keep us informed of your successes and questions.

You and/or your specialist (architect, engineer or contractor) will be able to modify the ePlans on a professional software then insert the survey plan from your licensed surveyor. 

If you or your specialist have problems at any time during the process, you will be able to contact us online. Our architects will work on finding solutions and if it applies to everyone, we'll send out the update online. We are doing this project for you.

The HomY Guidebook is an online step-by-step do-it-yourself guide. We'll include some helpful tips to facilitate your HomY experience from dealing with the bank to using "grey waters" to irrigate your garden.

 

Special perks

1 set HomY ePlan + lot map

An EARLY BIRDS perk reserved for those who live in countries where precise lot plans (cadastral plan) or surveyors are not available.
When you find your piece of land, send us the address and we will integrate your lot into the electronic HomY plan for you; best to visualize how to situate HomY on your property, planning for parking + road access.

Energy Efficiency Report

We'll send you a personalized Energy Efficiency Report which is required in some countries to complete the building permit application.
Also useful for calculating the surface area of solar panels needed to maximize energy sufficiency in your location.
Now available for projects based in USA, Canada, Europe, England & Switzerland.

 

OK, what will the home cost?

We offer HomY ePlans at a fraction of the cost of other house plans you find on the market. Therefore, you will have the budget to build the special features incorporated in this sustainability-focused home.  All for about the same price as a regular same-sized home in your area, pricing varies by location and personal material choices. 

 

What is the minimum-sized lot I need?

+ consult your local zoning ordinances and lot coverage percentage, with your architect if needed.

 

Euh, I'm living in Morocco? Is it possible?

The structure and the insulation are adapted to most places you can reach with a car, like in the wild and hot Arizona Desert or the beautiful Swiss mountains with large loads of snow.

I can feel you asking: What? A greenhouse in Arizona? Oh yes, it's surprising but possible!

 

Meet the team 

Here at GroupYus, we are a husband-wife team that has many passions.  We see a great need in the world to reconnect to the basics of life: natural food, family time, reuse of resources, community-mindedness, etc.

Jean-Michel is a Swiss architect born, raised and educated in Geneva. He has worked for 25 years in real estate and on many quality projects for VIP clients, from conception to realization. He is now dedicated to promote a house that sustains life.

Denise's greatest joy is seeing her children learn about life through their experiences with books, people and nature. She also enjoys discovering, creating, and helping. She has a BA in French Studies from BYU.

We, like so many others, desire to contribute to making the world a better place and reduce our impact on the environment.  We want to join our voices to all those who see that there is a better way for our planet and families. And we hope this opens the door for some to reach their personal life goals.

 

 

Thank you!

Thank you for visiting our campaign. We know that not everyone will be able to make a pledge so if you aren't ready for a house like HomY, please help us make some noise on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, anywhere!  We know that there is a whole section of the population desiring sustainability; help us make the connection. It's free for you and valuable for the world!
story_txt:
Everything started in a kitchen
Denise & Jean-Michel - an American mom and a Swiss architect - moved to Arizona. Our first concerns were how to find fresh, healthy food and how to get our children to participate more in our household activities. Gardening seemed to be the logical answer. Our question was, how do we make it easier, more productive, and beautiful?
HomY is the result. By connecting a greenhouse to a kid-friendly kitchen it is simple to control the produce quality and be involved in delivering living food from the ground to the table.
The benefits of the HomY ePlans don't only extend to energizing your body or teaching your children. HomY gives you a good, abundant life. 

 
Why does a good life begin with a new plan?
You won't find this kind of house on the market,  you must build it.
But don't think you're stuck with cookie-cutter blueprints. The HomY ePlans are electronic files that you can customize for any family or budget. Designed in feet or meters, sent anywhere with no charge.
We planned the chassis so that you can easily change the front facade, add more living space, and upgrade with many modern options.  The HomY ePlans can be implemented in stages to accommodate your needs and current budget. Or go big and fast.
HomY is also ready to go off-grid!
This is a new way to live and you need a plan to make it functional, uplifting and beautiful!
 
Reduce your footprint, fatten your wallet
With HomY, you'll be able to do more than produce energy for your family, house and electric car! Discover the advantages of reducing your environmental footprint. For those who are already green/sustainably-minded, this innovative plan offers something you've never seen before.
It's time to take the first step, this is the new plan. 
Numbers speak better than words...

It’s your most secure investment for the future: save money, promote good health, provide financial security, fortify against disasters, educate and enjoy your family.
And have time to think, therefore to be, and to be part of your own revolution.
 
More about HomY plans.
This innovative set of ready-to-build house plans will reflect your nature and your passions. All of the following functions, included in the plans, can be optional if they do not fit your vision.

about 800 to 2250 sqft / 80 m2  to 225 m2
1 to 3 bathrooms
1 to 6 bedrooms
+ the greenhouse serves as additional multi-purpose living space

First, the greenhouse which is the heart of the project:

raised garden beds
hydroponics and aquaponics
solar food dehydrator
pizza/bread oven
large area for dining or relaxing
composting system
solar panels
reuse of rainwater and grey water
pond
jacuzzi
yoga place, grounding and more...

 

The front facade is fully customizable to reflect your personal style preferences. The original HomY facade design comes on the plans, but feel free to have your own architect change it. It includes :
a welcoming patio or entry
a spacious living room
Multi-use storage space on each side: package drop-box, yard equipment, bikes...
a panoramic terrace on the 2nd floor, that can be converted into additional bedrooms




The body or chassis is the center of the first floor which contains the vital functions. It is built in massive concrete to be a safe shelter. It includes:

a pantry organized for 6 months of food storage for a large family
a kitchen adapted to prepare, canning or freeze all of your homemade meals
a dining room as the heart of your home
a large family room (or living room + bedroom, if only building the chassis)
a bathroom (toilet, sink, and shower)
a garage, workshop area, mudroom, and an RV-carport
the technical facilities which can be managed from your phone




The 2nd floor is a traditional wood frame with:

1 master bedroom and bathroom with skylight over the bathtub 
2 bedrooms with shared common area
1 bathroom (toilet, sink, and shower)
a spacious laundry room and storage
access to the rooftop terrace



And a private rooftop:

HomY is for you if you are...
A first-time homeowner or thinking of investing for your children
Don't start life with a huge loan, because with a 30-year loan you end up paying for the house twice in interest.  And avoid losing money in rent. With HomY you can start simple by only building the base (800 sqft/80 m2) without sacrificing any comfort.  HomY is ready to be extended when you have the finances.

A growing family
HomY can evolve as your family does.  You can start with a second floor (800 sqft/80 m2) with additional rooms, or add it later.  Need more space?  You can easily add a large living room (400 sqft/40 m2) on the front.
Need even more bedrooms? Transform the second-floor panoramic terrace (250 sqft/25 m2) into additional rooms. The sky is the limit, just do it! 
A homeschooling family
This is a great the place to teach the next generation on a better way of life; respect for our resources, gardening, etc. HomY is especially designed to be kid-friendly so they can assist, learn and discover in both the kitchen and the greenhouse.

Ready for retirement
Is it time to slow down the rhythm and reduce the expenses of your life?  Or need time to travel and visits your grandkids? HomY is your answer.

Rent your entire house with an integrated, easy-to-use control access system and Airbnb.
Use your parked RV as a room to rent to a student.
Connect with your neighbors by sharing fresh-baked goods or jelly prepared with ingredients straight from your greenhouse.

An off-grid dreamer
In the digital era, many jobs can be performed outside of an employer's office. Go seek out this perfect multi acres spot. First come, first served.
Don't wait until everyone turns back to nature, be part of this new "comfy-off grid" generation.

 
How to get involved?
Do you believe in this way of living? Join and sustain our campaign. We need you to make this dream home a reality! The design and concept are about 10% of the work; there is still 90% that needs to be finished. By investing in this project you are making it possible for HomY plans to be construction-ready for the price of a bike! It's one small step for you, and one giant leap for all!
 
Stretch goals: 
When these goals are reached we will be able to...
$ 25'000.- = prepare ePlans and Guidebook in English and French / metric and feet
$ 50'000.- = translate the ePlans and Guidebook into the 3 most-requested languages
$ 75'000.- = translate ePlans and Guidebook into more languages
$ 100'000.- = design additional facade styles that will be freely available for all backers
 
How to get started with HomY once we're backed?
It's very exciting because it's very simple. It's like when you buy a software; you purchase it online and we will send the drawings to you by email.
The house will be designed according to the lasted version of the International Residential Code (IRC) and the Swiss construction code which are both among the most complex of building codes.


Invest in a HomY Perk: select the full set of house plans or greenhouse-concept only.

Receive electronic plans directly in your email by estimated delivery date. Plans are in PDF and CAD (readable on Acrobat Reader and editable on Revit or AutoCAD).

Choose and purchase your plot of land, if you have not already.

Contact a local licensed architect/contractor to:  
make any personalized changes
give you a quote for construction
ask a licensed surveyor to integrate your plot plan into the house plan
and submit the finalized plans for a building permit!



Begin building! Keep us informed of your successes and questions.

You and/or your specialist (architect, engineer or contractor) will be able to modify the ePlans on a professional software then insert the survey plan from your licensed surveyor. 
If you or your specialist have problems at any time during the process, you will be able to contact us online. Our architects will work on finding solutions and if it applies to everyone, we'll send out the update online. We are doing this project for you.
The HomY Guidebook is an online step-by-step do-it-yourself guide. We'll include some helpful tips to facilitate your HomY experience from dealing with the bank to using "grey waters" to irrigate your garden.
 
Special perks
1 set HomY ePlan + lot map
An EARLY BIRDS perk reserved for those who live in countries where precise lot plans (cadastral plan) or surveyors are not available.When you find your piece of land, send us the address and we will integrate your lot into the electronic HomY plan for you; best to visualize how to situate HomY on your property, planning for parking + road access.
Energy Efficiency Report
We'll send you a personalized Energy Efficiency Report which is required in some countries to complete the building permit application.Also useful for calculating the surface area of solar panels needed to maximize energy sufficiency in your location.Now available for projects based in USA, Canada, Europe, England & Switzerland.
 
OK, what will the home cost?
We offer HomY ePlans at a fraction of the cost of other house plans you find on the market. Therefore, you will have the budget to build the special features incorporated in this sustainability-focused home.  All for about the same price as a regular same-sized home in your area, pricing varies by location and personal material choices. 
 
What is the minimum-sized lot I need?

+ consult your local zoning ordinances and lot coverage percentage, with your architect if needed.
 
Euh, I'm living in Morocco? Is it possible?
The structure and the insulation are adapted to most places you can reach with a car, like in the wild and hot Arizona Desert or the beautiful Swiss mountains with large loads of snow.
I can feel you asking: What? A greenhouse in Arizona? Oh yes, it's surprising but possible!
 
Meet the team 
Here at GroupYus, we are a husband-wife team that has many passions.  We see a great need in the world to reconnect to the basics of life: natural food, family time, reuse of resources, community-mindedness, etc.
Jean-Michel is a Swiss architect born, raised and educated in Geneva. He has worked for 25 years in real estate and on many quality projects for VIP clients, from conception to realization. He is now dedicated to promote a house that sustains life.
Denise's greatest joy is seeing her children learn about life through their experiences with books, people and nature. She also enjoys discovering, creating, and helping. She has a BA in French Studies from BYU.
We, like so many others, desire to contribute to making the world a better place and reduce our impact on the environment.  We want to join our voices to all those who see that there is a better way for our planet and families. And we hope this opens the door for some to reach their personal life goals.
 
 Thank you!Thank you for visiting our campaign. We know that not everyone will be able to make a pledge so if you aren't ready for a house like HomY, please help us make some noise on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, anywhere!  We know that there is a whole section of the population desiring sustainability; help us make the connection. It's free for you and valuable for the world!

story:
We have created LONGWALK for those who live ON THE GO.
Those who can't imagine living without racing and pacing their life. Without creating, changing, developing and inspiring. Without a movement, innovatons and optimization - no interruptions by low battery needed. Without facing freedom - no limits - only comfort, even when getting out of your comfort zone.

This project stemmed from an idea my friends and I conceived several years ago. Among us there are designers, artists, photographers, businessmen, programmers and engineers. Travel plays a major role in all of our lives, and powerbanks have long since been the go to for our on the road power needs. It has always been a goal to somehow incorporate style, into the functionality of a powerbank. We tested numerous solutions on trips, however did not find the solution we were looking for. We decided to try to make a dream bag, a lifeline for traveling.

We took into consideration the flaws that powerbanks have, as well as how to seamlessly integrate them into a convenient bag design, from which point it took us a year to develop and establish the possibility of production.

And so, we present the first product in the line of battery/ bag hybrids under the brand LONGWALK. 

 

When designing the bag, we specifically aimed to minimize any negative aspects that could arise. The goal was to create a energizing bag that didn’t turn its carrier into a robot due to unnecessary additions. We chose natural materials and a slightly rough design for a casual feel. The bags dimensions are 28x18x8cm; this allows it to be unobtrusive during long walks or trips, and at the same time large enough to accommodate all the necessary gadgets and essentials (phone / keys / wallet and other traveling necessities). The LONGWALK Bags have a tracker and you always can to find your LONGWALK. Our production of bags is based in Europe, while power banks are developed in Hong Kong.

Our first production design was sewed in one color, but we have since developed a whole color range, which we want to implement based on the results of crowdfunding campaigns, within which we will offer the option vote for certain colors and configurations.

As for the electric aspect of the charging bag, we found a very interesting solution that exists on the market and tailored it to suit the needs of the project. The high performance powerbank has been integrated with a powerful solar panel that comes into play when the carrier cannot reach a physical outlet to recharge.

In the future, we plan to work both on new bag models, in which there will be a similar pocket for an electric block. One can order new bag models in the future, which opens the possibility of rearranging the common electric block between them, and as technology evolves within the powerbank world, one can order new banks separately and replace their existing powerbank. We hope our idea will suit the taste of the modern world and create a LONGWALK club, whose participants will not only take part in the development of new bags, but be the first to receive them once launched into production. You will be able to design the future bags yourself, choosing the colors and materials! 

Participants of our campaign on crowdfunding, we are offering preferential pricing to every suporter, along with a membership in LONGWALK club.

story:
Our bags are made of a biodegradable material. That is why they are non-polluting bags. In the production of our bags PVA is used, a polyvinyl alcohol that dissolves in water, as the chemical base and then replaced the oil derivatives to ensure the bag would degrade over time. It is the oil derivatives in plastic bags causing them not to break down but instead to remain in the environment, resulting in serious harm to marine life and natural environments.

Traditional plastic remains between 150 and 500 years in the environment and ours only lasts five minutes. It’s up to you when to destroy it.

Recently a new raw material has been invented based on a synthesis from calcium carbide and natural gas.

These bags, which are environmentally friendly, can be completely dissolved in five minutes in water without contamination instead of up to 500 years.

 

Such bags aim to replace reusable bags of all kinds.

Every year about five trillion plastic bags are used worldwide. The worst thing is that 70% of them end up in the environment.

DO YOU WANT TO PROTECT OUR NATURE AND ENVIRONMENT?

ARE YOU READY TO DO IT EVERY DAY??

BUT YOU DON’T KNOW HOW???

THE ANSWER IS TO ELIMINATE SINGLE-USE PLASTIC BAGS.

What is better: to replace plastic today, or to forget about our planet tomorrow?

The answer is clear.

JOIN US RIGHT NOW!               

USE THE BAGS WHICH ARE FRIENDLY TO THE ENVIRONMENT.

  • Just one million USD for this project will definitely help to improve our environment and clear our Nature of plastic pollution. If today one thousand people use our bags in their families instead of plastic bags thousands of lives will be saved tomorrow. Spread this idea among your friends and step by step together we will make a better world for our children tomorrow. The Nature will definetely benefit if there is no plastic pollution anymore. Our bags are just the right way to start this. Become the part of our team. Become the one who saves the world daily.

Our product is a perfect replacement for plastic bags.

No more plastic bags in our life!

  • Why is our product so amazing?
  • safe
  •  non-toxic
  • water-soluble
  • fully biodegradable PVAL materials and bio-based materials
  • harmless to people, animals and plants
  • caring for life
  • protecting environment with a functional eco-friendly material
  • protect against asphyxia, a cause of childhood accidents at home (The bags dissolve when they come into contact with a person’s tongue or tears)
  • the cost of InstaBags are likely to be similar to current prices of plastic bags
  • and finally our product saves the environment!

Our product properties:

  • It is really strong and can easily hold up to 8 kilos
  • It is soluble in water at temperature of 25ºC or  70ºC (you can choose from two options)
  • It comes in two colors: transparent and white (no colouring matters harmful to nature!)

Where can you use it?

Anywhere where you used plastic bags before!

- shopping bags

- linen bags

- kitchen bags

- laundry bags

- packing bags

- pet waste bags

- etc.

Looking for more information? Go www.instabag.eu or download the PDF brochure.

Our Company News

story:
“Facts not fiction” the contamination of the groundwater, the massive earthquakes to states that should never experience a quake, water waste usage in drought conditions, these are all proven to be dangers of “fracking methods.” These are just a few of the dangers. Finally there is a remedy; my product is more eco-friendly, single pipe hydraulic fracking system, uses no water and no chemicals, and has a patented vacuum pump. This system is also safer and less costly. My father always told me “keep it simple stupid” a phrase I am sure you have heard before. So imagine that your using a leaf blower for some fall cleaning, not getting anywhere with the leaves blowing around, but bring in a vacuum and all the leaves are sucked up and now you’re done with your yard work. Remember the movie Erin Brokovich, well she went up against the corporate world and found the truth, we can too!

 To start, let me give you a bit of background about hydraulic fracturing. Fracking is an extraction technique for oil and gas wells in which rocks are fractured artificially with the use of pressurized liquid. This technique dates as far back as the 1860’s. When this now full grown monster first started out they used nitro-glycerin and dynamite as their main technique. The current oil fracking method is chemicals in the water and explosions that leak into the aquifer, because you have 50,000 pounds pushing along existing pipes that went through soft dirt and shale. This is their so called safe method. So basically due to that 50k pounds pushing and making the pipes crack, those entire chemicals move down into our aquifer, therefore contaminating the groundwater.

My mother used to tell me a saying “Dennis there are three parts to every story, yours, mine, and the truth.” Well I am going to explain the truths to the dangers of these methods companies have been using to extract oil. Just like the pharmaceutical companies, they want us to take there drugs while minimizing the risks and side effects, hydraulic fracturing is just the same in that aspect. They would too like to minimize the dangers while convincing us to continue using it.  

The first danger I came across is the rise in earthquakes, Oklahoma averaged 2 quakes measuring over a 3.0 on the Richter scale per year, midway through 2014 a registered 230 earthquakes had occured. Disposing fracking fluid into the wells is what is causing these earthquakes. Next, the main topic talked about within this controversial subject is contamination of the groundwater. Water can be contaminated through a spill occurring, something within the system not being built properly, whether or not the fracking fluid is able to escape the formation that they are working on. The other contamination is air pollution. During the transport of the oil and gas, pollutants are released, pollutants such as benzene a cancer causing chemical.

Finally, we have come to the part of hope, we at The Inventors Depot have come up with a product , called eco-fracking; it is a single pipe hydraulic fracking system that uses a sealed vacuum pump, no harmful chemicals, in fact no chemicals at all. This revolutionary system also uses no water. So we would not be affecting the drought conditions in certain areas like the current method does today. We have designed a simple method system to draw the resources up from the ground using our patented sealed vacuum pump and special auger. An auger is basically a tool to make holes in something resembling a cork screw. As we are drawing those resources up from the wells our vacuum pump is filtering and condensing all the particles and fumes safely. Ensuring that there are no fumes or smells within proximity of the well and your homes. Our goal is not to stop fracking all together, but to build a better way! We want to do this by using a safer and less expensive method for extracting oil. We hope also that the oil industry will see the many benefits in our system and adapt them for their own. We are a non-profit group, who will use the proceeds that are donated towards this product being manufactured and sent into the market.  Every family living near a fracking site will greatly benefit from this product. We will also be implementing an agency to certify all and any companies that would like to use our product and method in the future, to ensure that it stays the way it was originally intended. This all started with the legendary Paul Neal “Red” Adair teaming up with Ed”Coots” and Asger”Boots” in the 50’s, between 8 oil experts who have helped us with this project and there 300 years combined of experience in the fracking field, I personally feel very confident in our product. We urge you to join our cause, any donations help we are looking for a minimum of 30k to get this onto the shelves. We are just a small group of inventors with some very large dreams and products. You can see our other products we are working on at our website:

www.theinventorsdepot.com

As we are drawing those resources up from the wells our vacuum pump is filtering and condensing all the particles and fumes safely. Ensuring that there are no fumes or smells within proximity of the well and your homes. Our goal is not to stop fracking all together, but to build a better way! We want to do this by using a safer and less expensive method for extracting oil. We hope also that the oil industry will see the many benefits in our system and adapt them for their own. We are a non-profit group, who will use the proceeds that are donated towards this product being manufactured and sent into the market.  Every family living near a fracking site will greatly benefit from this product. We will also be implementing an agency to certify all and any companies that would like to use our product and method in the future, to ensure that it stays the way it was originally intended. This all started with the legendary Paul Neal “Red” Adair teaming up with Ed”Coots” and Asger”Boots” in the 50’s, between 8 oil experts who have helped us with this project and there 300 years combined of experience in the fracking field, I personally feel very confident in our product. We urge you to join our cause, any donations help we are looking for a minimum of 30k to get this onto the shelves. We are just a small group of inventors with some very large dreams and products. You can see our other products we are working on at our website:
www.theinventorsdepot.com

story:
Turning salty sea water into clean

drinking water there - where, it is

impossible for Others

 

"Water Electrodialysis" - gives life.  

"Us - the inhabitants of the earth - can be compared with the passengers of the ship, which is given certain water supply. But this ship passenger can expect that in case of shortage of water, some other ship can help them; while we are alone in the universe, completely alone, with our small supply of water - so necessary for life." (said Jacques Cousteau)​

       "Water Electrodialysis" - this is a simple, modular, fully autonomous and innovative process unit for turning salty sea water into clean drinking water; it does not depend on external sources of energy, since solar panels and a diesel generator - on board.

      Delivered, installed - and after 60 min we get clean water!​         

                

       

       It's hard to imagine life on Earth without water. Water reserves in the world are enormous. They make up about 1.5 billion km3, and this is - 0.025% of the total mass of the Earth. However, the vast majority of this enormous mass - regrettably - salt water, unfit for drinking and technological uses of. The mass of fresh water - not more than 2% of its total quantity water. The main volume, about 96% of fresh water, is concentrated in the ice sheets of Antarctica and Greenland and the Antarctic, in mountain glaciers, icebergs and permafrost. Only about 1% of the total amount of fresh water is in the liquid state. This is - the rivers, freshwater lakes, part of the groundwater. It is this water is used by mankind and the animal world for their many needs.

       To date, the state of rivers is a major concern. For example; third of small rivers have dried up. Most of these rivers are degraded and no doubt will lead to degradation of large rivers.        

         There is a desperate need for a safe, more reliable way to sea water desalination. We need a solution that allows people to turning salty sea water into clean drinking water.

       Scientists have proved that each person simply need min 12 liters of fresh water per day, including - to 3 liters for drinking. Today, in many countries there is no such amount of water. From the thirst of hundreds of thousands of people are dying, including children’s.

        According to the UN: - consumption of fresh water in the world has doubled in the last 50 years. The expected sharp increase in population, which numbered in the next 50 years will reach 8 billion people, and is a problem not only to provide food, but also to ensure the water - at least minimally suitable for consumption.

       "Water Electrodialysis" - is the solution.

       We have developed a groundbreaking technology that harnesses the power of sunlight to turning salty sea water into clean drinking water.

       "Water Electrodialysis" is affordable, sustainably produced, and effective at turning salty sea water into clean drinking water without depending on infrastructure. By giving individuals the ability to easily clean the water they have on the seashore with only solar energy.

       In essence, "Water Electrodialysis" does more than provide clean water, it empowers.

What We Need & What You Get

     "We come to know the value of water, only when the well dries up completely." (said Benjamin Franklin)​

       As has always been in our world, a man follows the path of least resistance without thinking about their future and the future of their children and grandchildren, about the fate of those who are already dying of thirst. Nothing but disasters cannot force a person to treat the water carefully.

       Water - it the subject of a bid.

       Sooner or later, but somebody start the war over water resources.      

       Even in towns and villages located on the banks of rivers and lakes, there is already a shortage of fresh water.

      And what about those who live on the seaside, away from large infrastructure ... who wants to develop picturesque and ecological sites, build houses, cottages, mini hotels and boarding houses and etc. on the coast of the oceans ...?

Where it is very expensive to pull (through jungles, mountains or deserts) power lines and water pipes or drill very expensive deep wells - "Water Electrodialysis" is just NECESSARY!

      Our option - we suggest using water, but not drinking water.

      This is - sea water.

      It seems an incredible amount of sea water reserves - enough to live thousands of years. However, the production of fresh water from sea water is not such a simple problem.

       It seems an incredible amount of sea water reserves - enough to live thousands of years. However, the production of fresh water from sea water is not such a simple problem.

       In order to start production, the "Water Electrodialysis" devices and and start their supply to our partners on the coast of Australia, India, the countries of the Indochina Peninsula, the Malay Archipelago and other countries in Oceania, Central and South America, and so on; we need $200,000 to finalize our research, development and creation of 4 industrial samples of desalination plants.

      This step is essential in ensuring that "Water Electrodialysis" meets all global health standards of water sanitization and that our design is as intuitive as possible.

      Your gift will have lasting impact. Contributing to "Water Electrodialysis" now will ensure the longevity of this life-saving tool. All donations will go towards running our pilot program and bringing "Water Electrodialysis" into the hands of those suffering from lack of access to clean water.

And in exchange for a gift, you get perks! See the sidebar for what you get if you donate a gift of $5, $10, $25, $45, $50, $65, $70, $100, $110, $130, $140, $2000, $5000, or $32000.    

The Design

      "Water Electrodialysis" is designed for sustainable production, affordable and effective use when turning salty sea water into clean drinking water - the very water that is so desperately needed for drinking, bathing and irrigation.

      The already developed modular, fully autonomous installation "Water Electrodialysis" is capable of desalinating up to 20 m3 of clean drinking water per day; it does not depend on external sources of energy, since solar panels and a diesel generator - on board.

      Delivered, installedl - and after 60 min get clean water!   

                                     

      On the desalination of sea water has been known for a long time.

      And the most promising two methods - reverse osmosis and electrodialysis.

      Prior to the publication of our Invention shall be was considered, that the costs of construction and operation installations for the electrodialysis of water - the same as the cost of production and operation of reverse osmosis water plants.

      The main factor is the cost of the electrodes, especially anodes, which tended - dissolve.

      We have proposed (see our patent "UA 106302 U") to manufacture electrodes in electrodialyzers of chemically resistant and, most importantly, inexpensive carbon fabric, which eliminates this problem. 

      We offer desalination plants based on Electrodialysis for the following reasons:

      - materials and stuffs in electrodialysis installations easier and more reliable; reverse osmosis membrane - have over life of 1.5 years, while the electrodialysis membrane - have over life of 10 years; they can be washed, after which they recover their properties, but reverse osmosis membranes - not restored;

       - in reverseosmosis installations to protect membrane, at the presence in the desalina-tion water of bacteria should be provided bactericidal device (UV, chlorine generators, etc.), and this - additional costs;

       -  cost of reverse osmosis membranes is at least 80% of the total installation cost, while the cost electrodialysis membranes is not more than 30%;

       -  in electrodialyzers regulation of the depth of desalination (removing the salts degree) be produced by changing the interelectrode distance, the flow rate of water through desalination camera or power supply voltage level;

while in reverse osmosis plants depth change (regulation) of desalination possible only across change water supply pressure, which entails an increase in capacity of pumping equipment, so - occurs the increase its cost;

       - electricity in reverse osmosis plants - not less than 3.5 kWh / m3 - is used to create pressure for desalination of low-salt (up to 2-3 g / l salt content) water; with increasing salinity (26-30 and more gr/l - of salt content in sea water) power consumption increases rapidly and reaches 8.5-12 and more kWh / m3;

       - in electrodialysis installations the power consumption (even taking - into account the pumping equipment) is not more than 1.2 kWh/m3 and practically does not depend on salinity (% salt content), and, when combined with the desalination by ion exchange method is reduced to 0.8 kilowatt-hour/m3;

       - the cost of basic materials electrodialysis installations no less than 8 times lower than the reverse osmosis units.

     

 

The Impact

          By donating to "Water Electrodialysis", you will make a difference in (perhaps - even save) someone's life. Through harnessing our technical (know-how) developments we consume 8-12 times less energy than reverse osmosis, which allows us to use solar energy, which is produced by a mobile, easy-transportable, own (on board) solar power installation

           By not relying on gas or electricity, "Water Electrodialysis" fundamentally transforms the energy usage of households in developing nations. People can conserve the time, money, and energy that they would have used trying to desalinate sea water, and instead focus on long-term goals such as healthcare, education, and agriculture.

           The "Water Electrodialysis" device functions independently of infrastructure. Unlike reverse osmosis devices that rely on the constant replacement of expensive filters, our device can function on (provided - just - regular maintenance) for over a decade.

Consequently:

       At First, Given the trend of increasing freshwater consumption on the one hand and a sharp reduction in its quantity, on the other, which stimulates the movement of environmental scientists to develop the most effective methods of purification and desalination, which are most suitable for use in the household and in the household service sector.

       Electrodialysis desalination, in this sense, the most promising.

       And We are more than sure that the cost the membranes for electrodialysis, ie ion-selective, membranes can also be reduced, because the main component of the membrane - is the ion-exchange resin, whose production is connected with the processing of natural gas.        

       Secondly; All known methods of water desalination have little flexibility or, in other words, limited area applications. Unlike electrodialysis where parallel desalting process occurs producing hydrogen and oxygen as byproducts and the formation of acids and alkalis. Common sense suggests that these properties electrodialyzers give additional advantages of using electrodialyzers.

       Thirdly; Electrodialysis desalination water installation even in its principle of operation are it is flow straight-through, ie do not require pumping equipment high pressure (as such as in reverse osmosis) what, not least, to automate the process for safety reasons and does not require the use of complex devices.

       Our next important innovative development will be the creation (on the basis of "Water Electrodialysis") of installations for the complex cleaning of "filterable wastewater", which are formed on landfills for the disposal of food and household waste (garbage dumps); together with deironing and demanganization facilities.

This is a HUGE and COMPLEX PROBLEM!​

It applies to all countries of the World!​

Besides;

       "Water Electrodialysis" can be used both independently and together with other cleaning methods.

       1) First of all, for cleaning "mine water" and other industrial wastewater; together with deironing and demanganization facilities.

       2) Together with ion-exchange resins - to produce extremely pure water, in quality not inferior to distilled water.

       3) To obtain "live" and "dead" water without the use of reagents.

       4) To obtain "pure" salts, primarily sea salt.

       5) To produce hydrogen and oxygen as a by-product.

And so on.

Therefore:

Desalination of sea water by desalination plants based on electrodialysis - which we have perfected (see our patent "UA 106302 U") - the most promising way.

And more - important:

       We have many pay much attention to the issue of the structure of water.

       It is known that the desalination of water, violated the structure of water. Rather; after removal salts from of water, water is formed with a special structure which is very different from the structure of natural fresh water. In nature (as far as known to science), water structure is formed over the years, when in contact with various minerals.

       Especially important minerals that are involved in the formation of water structures are silicon-containing minerals: quartz sand, rock crystal, zeolites.

Therefore, in our future work, we are going to give due attention to this issue - the issue of the formation of the structure of desalinated water.

Who We Are

       "Water Electrodialysis" is an international team of scientists-practices, inventor engineers and entrepreneurial economists who seek to supply drinking water to many thirsty people and children who suffer and even die from the lack of "clean fresh water".

       We have come together around the common belief that we can cheaply and sustainably change the lives of millions of people around the world, using - as the "Engine of Progress" - almost unlimited, natural and - Most importantly - renewable natural resources: sea water and the power of sunlight.

       The original concept for the device was developed through a course at at the intersection of scientific disciplines: the science of electric welding and the science of water.

       "The heart" of our desalination installations - "Electrodializator flat" (see our patent "UA 106302 U") - was patented by our team in April 2015.

        I.e; "Water Electrodialysis" is based on our original invention.

        The original ideas were confirmed by extensive additional studies carried out to establish the scientific reliability of the device, identify target markets and establish links with industry experts. Thanks to the continued, generous support of patrons, "Water Electrodialysis" has moved towards commercialization.

       "Water Electrodialysis" has also participated in the Rutgers I-Corps program and conducting customer discovery interviews which provided many insights regarding the need for technologies of desalination of sea water.

       "Water Electrodialysis" actively participates in the Movement "Fresh Water - for Everyone!", using all the power of its energy to provide fresh water 10 and more million lives by 2025 to transform the lives of these people. We are competing in the international Hult Prize competition with other social entrepreneurs from all over the world, vying for the coveted $1-million-dollar prize.

       So, why are we the right people for this job?

       "Water Electrodialysis" - international team of scientists, engineers and entrepreneurs with diverse talents, backgrounds, and expertise.

   Oleksandr Kalmykov - General Manager of the company (Poland); Experienced participant and head of large hydrotechnical projects and team management; Practical engineer, prospector, experimenter and rationalizer.

       Master; graduated in 1993 from the Ukrainian National University of Water Management and Nature Management, specialty - Engineer Hydrotechnician
       Since 1984, he took an active part in the construction, installation of equipment, overhaul of many hydroelectric power stations, hydro-accumulating power plants, nuclear power plants and other hydraulic structures. Member of the liquidation of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant accident. Since 1994, he to engage in commercial activities; the main directions: the development, manufacture, assembly and installation process equipment of the systems of water purification, water treatment, water desalination, wastewater treatment, cleaning industrial effluents, and so on. 
       One of the main developers of "Electrodializator flat"(co-author of the Patent) and desalination installations "Water Electrodialysis".

    Vasily Guryn - scientific leader of the company (Ukraine); the leading Ukrainian scientist in the field of hydraulic engineering and hydrometeorology, a talented teacher.

       Professor of the department " Water-economic construction and meliorative systems" at the Ukrainian National University of Water Management and Nature Management, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Honored Worker of Science and Technology of Ukraine, Academician of the Academy of Higher Education of Ukraine and Academy of Engineering Sciences of Ukraine. During 1998-2002 - Vice-Rector and during 2005-2012 - Rector of the Ukrainian National University of Water Management and Nature Management. Co-author of the scientific discovery "Regularities in the distribution of dispersed particles in multiphase liquid media." The main areas of scientific research: improving the reliability and improvement of water management systems and hydraulic engineering; development of protection of steel pipelines against corrosion; methods and devices of pipeline network protection systems against water hammer, vibration; And so on. Author of more than 300 scientific works, 3 monographs, 9 manuals and so on. Since 2015, "Honorary Doctor of the Institute of Water Problems and Melioration of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine."

       One of the main developers of "Electrodializator flat" (co-author of the Patent) and desalination installations "Water Electrodialysis".

   Peter Onischenko - Technical manager of the company (Ukraine); engineer-researcher, experimenter and innovator.

     Master; graduated in 1979 from the Ukrainian National University "Lviv Polytechnic", specialty - Electrical Engineer. Starting from the student's bench, yet from 1974, in  research laboratories at the Ukrainian National University "Lviv Polytechnic" and in the design bureaus other research institutes, successfully engaged in research in such areas as: water treatment systems; technology and systems for cleaning industrial effluents, galvanic effluents, tannery sludge; technologies for the recycling of industrial waste, air purification technology at production sites, and so on.
       Since 2009 - on teaching activities; in Cherkassy Polytechnic College supervised the laboratory "Maintenance and repair of electrical equipment", taught the course "Automation of technological processes and control systems."
       One of the main developers of "Electrodializator flat" (co-author of the Patent) and desalination installations "Water Electrodialysis".

  Mariusz Beletski - Production Manager of the company (Poland);  successful businessman, manager and consultant.

       Master; in 1989 he graduated from the University of Wroclaw; specialty - philosophy and history specialization. Since 1990 he has been actively engaged in advisory activities of both companies and local authorities, funds and associations. The basic directions: new information technologies of products and processes, maintenance of management by programs, the analysis of business and technological consulting, other.
       Co-owner of the design studio Pavo Projekt Sp. z o.o. and the proxy in the "Foundation for the International Unified Environment of the F.O.R.M."
       Has strong leadership skills and an intuitive understanding of innovative technologies for the team.

  Oleg Bakovsky - Manager for Management of the company (Poland); successful entrepreneur, economist and manager.

       Master; in 1998 he graduated from the Ukrainian National Technical University in Lutsk  (Ukraine) ; specialty - economist-manager. Since 1998 he to engage in commercial activities. The basic directions: Economics and organization of the enterprise, the marketing analytics and production optimization, other.
       A talented musician; in 1996 he graduated from the Lviv National Academy of Music (Ukraine), on class - a trumpet. Dynamic marketing and professionalism of data, use of web analytics and disciplines of site optimization Oleg successfully applies in to solving business goals of the team.

Other Ways You Can Help

        Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help! Get the word about "Water Electrodialysis" out by e-mailing friends, sharing this link, and talking about "Water Electrodialysis" on social media. Join us in redefining liquid sunshine!

Learn More

         To learn more about "Water Electrodialysis" and our impact, check us out on Facebook.

https://www.facebook.com/WaterElectrodialysis/?modal=admin_todo_tour

And feel free to drop us a line!
