       It is known that the desalination of water, violated the structure of water. Rather; after removal salts from of water, water is formed with a special structure which is very different from the structure of natural fresh water. In nature (as far as known to science), water structure is formed over the years, when in contact with various minerals.
       Especially important minerals that are involved in the formation of water structures are silicon-containing minerals: quartz sand, rock crystal, zeolites.
Therefore, in our future work, we are going to give due attention to this issue - the issue of the formation of the structure of desalinated water.Who We Are       "Water Electrodialysis" is an international team of scientists-practices, inventor engineers and entrepreneurial economists who seek to supply drinking water to many thirsty people and children who suffer and even die from the lack of "clean fresh water".       We have come together around the common belief that we can cheaply and sustainably change the lives of millions of people around the world, using - as the "Engine of Progress" - almost unlimited, natural and - Most importantly - renewable natural resources: sea water and the power of sunlight.       The original concept for the device was developed through a course at at the intersection of scientific disciplines: the science of electric welding and the science of water.       "The heart" of our desalination installations - "Electrodializator flat" (see our patent "UA 106302 U") - was patented by our team in April 2015.        I.e; "Water Electrodialysis" is based on our original invention.        The original ideas were confirmed by extensive additional studies carried out to establish the scientific reliability of the device, identify target markets and establish links with industry experts. Thanks to the continued, generous support of patrons, "Water Electrodialysis" has moved towards commercialization.       "Water Electrodialysis" has also participated in the Rutgers I-Corps program and conducting customer discovery interviews which provided many insights regarding the need for technologies of desalination of sea water.       "Water Electrodialysis" actively participates in the Movement "Fresh Water - for Everyone!", using all the power of its energy to provide fresh water 10 and more million lives by 2025 to transform the lives of these people. We are competing in the international Hult Prize competition with other social entrepreneurs from all over the world, vying for the coveted $1-million-dollar prize.       So, why are we the right people for this job?       "Water Electrodialysis" - international team of scientists, engineers and entrepreneurs with diverse talents, backgrounds, and expertise.   Oleksandr Kalmykov - General Manager of the company (Poland); Experienced participant and head of large hydrotechnical projects and team management; Practical engineer, prospector, experimenter and rationalizer.       Master; graduated in 1993 from the Ukrainian National University of Water Management and Nature Management, specialty - Engineer Hydrotechnician       Since 1984, he took an active part in the construction, installation of equipment, overhaul of many hydroelectric power stations, hydro-accumulating power plants, nuclear power plants and other hydraulic structures. Member of the liquidation of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant accident. Since 1994, he to engage in commercial activities; the main directions: the development, manufacture, assembly and installation process equipment of the systems of water purification, water treatment, water desalination, wastewater treatment, cleaning industrial effluents, and so on.        One of the main developers of "Electrodializator flat"(co-author of the Patent) and desalination installations "Water Electrodialysis".    Vasily Guryn - scientific leader of the company (Ukraine); the leading Ukrainian scientist in the field of hydraulic engineering and hydrometeorology, a talented teacher.       Professor of the department " Water-economic construction and meliorative systems" at the Ukrainian National University of Water Management and Nature Management, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Honored Worker of Science and Technology of Ukraine, Academician of the Academy of Higher Education of Ukraine and Academy of Engineering Sciences of Ukraine. During 1998-2002 - Vice-Rector and during 2005-2012 - Rector of the Ukrainian National University of Water Management and Nature Management. Co-author of the scientific discovery "Regularities in the distribution of dispersed particles in multiphase liquid media." The main areas of scientific research: improving the reliability and improvement of water management systems and hydraulic engineering; development of protection of steel pipelines against corrosion; methods and devices of pipeline network protection systems against water hammer, vibration; And so on. Author of more than 300 scientific works, 3 monographs, 9 manuals and so on. Since 2015, "Honorary Doctor of the Institute of Water Problems and Melioration of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine."       One of the main developers of "Electrodializator flat" (co-author of the Patent) and desalination installations "Water Electrodialysis".   Peter Onischenko - Technical manager of the company (Ukraine); engineer-researcher, experimenter and innovator.     Master; graduated in 1979 from the Ukrainian National University "Lviv Polytechnic", specialty - Electrical Engineer. Starting from the student's bench, yet from 1974, in  research laboratories at the Ukrainian National University "Lviv Polytechnic" and in the design bureaus other research institutes, successfully engaged in research in such areas as: water treatment systems; technology and systems for cleaning industrial effluents, galvanic effluents, tannery sludge; technologies for the recycling of industrial waste, air purification technology at production sites, and so on.       Since 2009 - on teaching activities; in Cherkassy Polytechnic College supervised the laboratory "Maintenance and repair of electrical equipment", taught the course "Automation of technological processes and control systems."       One of the main developers of "Electrodializator flat" (co-author of the Patent) and desalination installations "Water Electrodialysis".  Mariusz Beletski - Production Manager of the company (Poland);  successful businessman, manager and consultant.       Master; in 1989 he graduated from the University of Wroclaw; specialty - philosophy and history specialization. Since 1990 he has been actively engaged in advisory activities of both companies and local authorities, funds and associations. The basic directions: new information technologies of products and processes, maintenance of management by programs, the analysis of business and technological consulting, other.       Co-owner of the design studio Pavo Projekt Sp. z o.o. and the proxy in the "Foundation for the International Unified Environment of the F.O.R.M."       Has strong leadership skills and an intuitive understanding of innovative technologies for the team.  Oleg Bakovsky - Manager for Management of the company (Poland); successful entrepreneur, economist and manager.       Master; in 1998 he graduated from the Ukrainian National Technical University in Lutsk  (Ukraine) ; specialty - economist-manager. Since 1998 he to engage in commercial activities. The basic directions: Economics and organization of the enterprise, the marketing analytics and production optimization, other.       A talented musician; in 1996 he graduated from the Lviv National Academy of Music (Ukraine), on class - a trumpet. Dynamic marketing and professionalism of data, use of web analytics and disciplines of site optimization Oleg successfully applies in to solving business goals of the team.Other Ways You Can Help        Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help! Get the word about "Water Electrodialysis" out by e-mailing friends, sharing this link, and talking about "Water Electrodialysis" on social media. Join us in redefining liquid sunshine!Learn More         To learn more about "Water Electrodialysis" and our impact, check us out on Facebook. https://www.facebook.com/WaterElectrodialysis/?modal=admin_todo_tourAnd feel free to drop us a line!

story:
Summary

Moved wood pellet plant to Bagley, MN. I started the business in 2008 and found that area would be a great location for production for wood pellet plant.  Due to recent economy finding it very hard to finish the final installation; as banks are not lending. I have transfer $250,000.00 from my Safety Training company to get plant moved, set up and now in final stages.  if I would have waited to get a loan to start I would still be waiting. 

We will be using the help of adult handicap persons in the area to help with production. Investing in dust free equipment will make this a friendly work environment. This will bring jobs to the area and opportunities to disabled individuals. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Final stages are here!  To complete the install and to be successful need to be able retain funds to bring everything together. Items would include
  • Yard Truck, walking floor trailer, final on electrical 
  • Everyday we are moving closer, without a loan has made it hard to finish in a more timely fashion any help would get us there. 

The Impact

  • Renewable Energy is a great impact for the US. In Northern Mn area alot of sawdust is available. We will be able to take this waste material to make renewable energy. Pellets are also used for BBQ and bedding.

Risks & Challenges

  • Most plants takes a minimum of a year to set up. We are doing it in under 6 months. With hard work 7 days a week has gotten us there.

Other Ways You Can Help

Pellets are at a shortage in the US; we have orders waiting and need to get to that finish line. We will be able to offer a more affordable wood pellet for farms, businesses and families. 

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! Get the word out.

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Bartolomeo the ASEAN Country man of Bestrade the innovative green technologies combination Autoclave+P2P. I have a background of more than 20 years in the bulk shipping industry and global logistic of petro-chemical product and industrial waste and since 2016 I joint the Bestrade team and find them technologies the real solution against garbage invasion.

            The campaign can make true the dream to start a pilot plant in the Philippines where any   kind of waste incineration is ban and show to the world that is possible to generate a greenergy with a remarkable output and solve the problem of MSW municipal solid waste at the same time without emission and more pollution. I will be proud of myself for the environment preservation pledge I promote/promise to save the last paradise in the earth before is too late.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding raise will be good to purchase the plant equipment turnkey contract where the site location and the shed will be acquire directly.

The pilot plant lump sum will cost about 60 million usd plus an other 2 M for the transportation/installation and startup including first 6 month of operation cost.

According with our vision the reward will be a (ECOSHARE) a donation of our compost/ fertilizer  (please see perk features) to  the local farmer with a chance to visit them upon request.

            In case the campaign cannot reach the goal the funds receive will be put as paid up        capital in order to grant a loan from the Bank.

The Impact

             Our unique assets make us stand out among other waste to energy solutions where No Incineration are practice and No Emission are place. The plant is Non- Pollutant and even the residues are Non-Harmful and will operate in full compliance with today's laws. Obvious benefits are not only for local community and the workers ( no more bad smell and no potential contaminant in the drinking water caused by landfill leachate contain even pollutant ash from incinerators; but most to the general health of people and animals prevent adult and childhood from cancer and also birth defects and other illnesses like ischemic heart disease and cardiopulmonary mortality. In fact also the compost we produce is good as natural fertilized and cannot affect the food chain.

Risks & Challenges

            The main risk will be that we cannot access to the huge volume of solid waste and consequently  stop the plant because of lack of feedstock. That will be not a problem to find the feedstock source where there are not a good alternative to a landfill.

             Our challenge will be to show to local municipality how we can easily go on zero waste without more pollution and with a great return on greenergy.

Other Ways You Can Help

            If you cannot help us with your coins please spread the message to stop waste incineration  because certainly it is not the most technologically advanced, and it is not the one that can make the most benefits in terms of MSWM, energy production, and environmental and social costs. This strategic approach is likely to denounce a weakness of vision rather than being able to use all the available and alternative technological resources, especially when it is not intended as assumptions or future opportunities.

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

Our company, Green Pigeon Co., is completely unconventional in that we are run by extremely passionate high school students. Our company's focus falls upon creating an automatic sorting wastebin for residential and commercial purposes to minimize our environmental impact. 

Recently, we learned that the recycling waste from most schools in our area actually gets rejected from recycling facilities due to the high prevalence of non-recycling waste making its way into the incorrect bin. Similarly, the trash leaving most schools is laden with recyclable products. This is due to both the rush that most students experience to get back to learning, or misunderstanding of what goes where. After learning this news, we were driven to make a product that could change this.

While our initial plan was for schools, we are expanding this product for residential, sidewalk, and commercial purposes. 

What We Need & What You Get

As we are high school students, this company is NOT for profit, rather for the improvement of our environment, to further leverage the under-used recycling system we already have in place. The money will go to multiple places as described below:

  1. Cover the costs of a new website to broadcast our product and mission.
  2. Further research and development of the product so we can create the most efficient product possible
  3. Reach out to design firms for an efficient manufacturing strategy

While the perks do not contain products as of now, you can reserve a First-Edition waste bin, which will be significantly discounted over the retail version.

Risks & Challenges

Yes, our biggest hurdle is that we are high school students, but not only are we supported by the staff at our school, but are also extremely passionate, driven, and knowledgeable about this topic. Each member of our team was hand-picked to contribute one specific skill, so that in the end we have one cohesive product. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't want to pay for a perk? No worries! Here are some other options to help our cause:

  • Make sure the "share" our campaign
  • Reach out to your local school or university to see if they would be interested
  • Contact a town mayor to implement these bins on the sidewalks
  • Ask any local business if they would utilize it

story:
SCAN AND TRACK THE EXPIRY DATES OF THE FOOD YOU BUY, WITH ONE DEVICE ONLY!

Take control of your grocery, avoid wasting food and save money!

COOKING TIPS!

Best Before Scanner will give you hints and recipes based on the food you have at home.

KCAL CALCULATOR

Keep your daily intake of Kcal under control, Best Before Scanner shows the Kcal of each scanned food.

TRACK YOUR HOME BUDGET!

Just add the price you pay for your grocery and know how much you are saving!

CONTROL

Keep an eye on your pantry and avoid buying the same food twice.

 

  FEATURES

  • SCANNING MODULE

The device is armed with smallest 2D scanning engine, allowing for seamless integration in the smartphone form factor.

  • BARCODE SCANNING

The device comes with a patented barcode scanner technology, allowing for 1D and 2D scanning at a remarkably high speed. Laser aiming provides additional accuracy and control.

  • HIGH-QUALITY DISPLAY

The device supports a 5.0” high definition display in daylight viewable color.

  • EFFECTIVE IN LIGHT AND DARK

Automatically adjusted illumination guarantees an excellent scanning performance no matter what the lighting conditions are.

  • HIGH-QUALITY PCAP TOUCH

The device supports both dry and moist hands, as well as gloved fingertip touch input.

  • DETACHABLE COLOR CAPS

Each product is supplied with a color cap, available in gray, yellow or blue. The detachable cover increases the ruggedness of the device.

  •  TECHNICAL SPECS

Physical Specifications

 Dimensions 146.7*73*9.3 mm Style Full touch screen Input English, pinyin, handwriting, soft-keyboard 

Product Performance

CPU Dual-core 1.2 GHz Screen IPS, 5.0″ qHD, 960*54 pixel Touch Multi-point PCAP (Projective Capacitive Touch) Memory ROM 4GB/8GB RAM 512MB/1GB 

Barcode Scanning

1D Code39, Codabar, Code128, EAN8, EAN13, UPC-A, UPC-E and more 

Network

Wi-Fi IEEE 802.11 b/g/n WCDMA/ GSM WCDMA: 900 MHz, 2100 MHzGSM: 900 MHz, 1800 MHz, 1900 MHz Bluetooth BT 3.0 + HS, BT v2.1 + EDR Camera High-definition, auto focus GPS GPS, AGPS 

Battery

Capacity 2500 mAh 

Endurance

Standby 300 hours

Ports & Accessories

T-Flash Micro SD/TF (up to 32 GB) SIM Mini-SIM card Jack Micro USB, 3.5mm Audio jack Others Adapter, Cable, Protection shell (optional) 

Certificates & Protection

 Industrial protection IP54 Certificates CTA, CCC, CE, RoHS Laser IEC2 / FDA II, IEC60825 / EN60825-1

How does the Best Before Scanner work?

Frame the barcode in the picture display, the laser will scan it automatically.

You can also use the photo camera to capture the expiry date.

In case, you could even enter the expiry date manually.

 

 

GET NOTIFICATIONS ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE 

Get notifications directly on your mobile, know what is about to expire and cool ways to cook what is left over.

 
 

Check your fridge and pantry 24/7 with Best Before Scanner

*patent application filed

FAQ

 

Can I only purchase the app and use it on my smartphone to scan the products’ barcode?

Actually not. The reason is simple: the whole system works only on a dedicated device that performs only barcode scanning. This device, that is our BBS, stays attached to the fridge door and will allow you to update constantly. In fact, thanks to its built-in accelerometer, the BBS will turn-on automatically every time the fridge door opens, asking if you've added or taken any item. 

Technically, the built-in laser scanner allows you to scan any barcode, in any light condition, in a faster and more reliable way than the camera of any smart-phone.  

How do the BBS estimate the Kcal?

The BBS can get the Kcal of food by scanning bar code, so that it can help you keep your daily intake under control.

And how can the BBS show me how to cook my food?

It’s easy: the BBS will show you the best recipes to cook the food that had been previously scanned, by looking into a vast recipes library in the net. One can than apply the filters and decide whether to cook only with the ingredients that are about to expiry, or by using just what it’s available in the pantry, or which food is better to help to keep Kcal under control.

What can I do with the app on the smartphone?
Basically, one can keep under control its own fridge or the pantry, being sure of what’s already in and of what’s about to expiry, and that while one is at work or commuting.
You can check the recipes available for what you have got available at home, so that you can go shopping only the ingredients that you are actually missing.
